anya-e0601n:4_0: Amataṃ amataṃ santaṃ, asamaṃ asamaṃ dadaṃ.
anya-e0601n:5_0: Saraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ lokaṃ, araṇaṃ araṇaṃ karaṃ;
anya-e0601n:6_0: Abhayaṃ abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ, nāyakaṃ nāyakaṃ name.
anya-e0601n:123_0: Sattappīno ca dīghaṅguli matha sugato lomakūpekalomo,
anya-e0601n:126_0: Nātho uṇhīsasīso itiguṇasahitaṃ taṃ mahesiṃ namāmi.
anya-e0601n:129_0: Loke tasmā vibhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ sādhavo patthayantā.
anya-e0601n:130_0: Iṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ vahantaṃ suranaramahitaṃ nibbhayaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:131_0: Lokānaṃ nandivaḍḍhaṃ dasabalamasamaṃ taṃ namassantu niccaṃ.
anya-e0601n:133_0: Puññenetena sohaṃ nipuṇamati sato samparāye ca titto,
anya-e0601n:135_0: Tikkho sūro dhitatto saparahitacaro dīghajīvī arogo,
anya-e0601n:136_0: Dhañño vaṇṇo yasassī atibalavadharo kittimā khantupeto.
anya-e0601n:141_0: Pāsaṃso pemavāco sujanaguṇavidū māmako so bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:162_0: Vandantānaṃ jinaṃ natvā, dhammaṃ suddhaṃ gaṇuttamaṃ.
anya-e0601n:165_0: Likhitvā ṭhapitaṃ puñña, buddhiyā tena vandinaṃ.
anya-e0601n:170_0: Vaṇṇantopi ca tassatthaṃ, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhakathādisu;
anya-e0601n:173_0: Namanaṃ namatītī vā, namatī tena vā namo;
anya-e0601n:179_0: Na diṭṭhaṃ katakāraṇaṃ, tasmā hitatthikehi ca;
anya-e0601n:181_0: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ viññūhī ca, vicāretvā vijānitanti.
anya-e0601n:184_0: Amataṃ amataṃ santaṃ, asamaṃ asamaṃ dadaṃ.
anya-e0601n:185_0: Saraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ lokaṃ, araṇaṃ araṇaṃ karaṃ;
anya-e0601n:186_0: Abhayaṃ abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ, nāyakaṃ nāyakaṃ name.
anya-e0601n:187_1: [Ka] idāni paṭhamaṃ tāva sugatantyādīhi aṭṭhārasahi guṇehi thometvā buddhassa vanditukāmena sugatantiādi gāthādvayaṃ āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:187_3: Taṃ pana yamakaṃ subodhālaṅkāre kiliṭṭhadosanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:191_0: Ayaṃ panettha patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādaguṇa saṅkhātena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttā hoti.
anya-e0601n:194_0: Tattha sugatanti sobhanagamanattā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sammā gatattā ca sugato,
anya-e0601n:194_1: so hi sobhanaṃ ariyamaggena gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:194_4: Ariyamaggagamanena parisuddhaṃ anavajjaṃ khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:194_7: Tattha bhagavato veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhassa nipphāda nato sobhanaṃ kāyena gamanaṃ kāyagamanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:194_8: Sayambhū ñāṇena pana sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanato ñāṇena gamanaṃ ñāṇagamanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:194_10: Aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ pana “sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:194_11: Sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti sugatoti ca vuccati,
anya-e0601n:194_13: Sammā aviparītaṃ cesa gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:194_15: Tena tena maggena ye kilesā pahīnā,
anya-e0601n:194_16: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:194_17: Atha vā sammā āgacchatīti sugatoti ca vuccati,
anya-e0601n:194_18: dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramipūrikāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbalokassa
anya-e0601n:194_19: hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathañcāti ime cante anupagacchanto āgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:194_20: Taṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ name namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:195_1: So hi sammā gadati bhāsatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:195_2: Supubbagadadhātu bhāsāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vā, ta, dassa to.
anya-e0601n:195_3: Chasu vācāsu yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva dvivācaṃ bhāsatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:197_1: “Rājakumāra yaṃ tathāgato taṃ vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_4: Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_7: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_9: tatrakālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya. 4.
anya-e0601n:197_10: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_13: Yampi tathāgato jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_16: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:197_18: Tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:198_0: Ettha pāḷiyaṃ panesā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅkhepena veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:198_1: Kathaṃ hesā abhūtā anatthasaṃhitā appiyā vācā ca,
anya-e0601n:198_3: bhūtā attha saṃhitā appiyā vācā ca,
anya-e0601n:198_6: bhūtā atthasaṃhitā piyā vācā cāti chabbidhā hotīti.
anya-e0601n:198_7: Tattha acoraṃyeva coro ayantiādivasena vattabbavācā paṭhamavācā nāma.
anya-e0601n:198_8: Coraṃyeva coro ayantiādivasena vattabbavācā dutiyavācā nāma.
anya-e0601n:198_10: idha pana ṭhatvāpi puna puññaṃ na karoti,
anya-e0601n:198_11: dutiyacittavāre kathaṃ catūhi apāyehi muccissatīti evaṃ mahājanassa atthapurekkhārena dhammapurekkhārena
anya-e0601n:198_14: mayhaṃ bho mātu mayi kucchigate kapiṭṭhaphaladohaḷo ahosi.
anya-e0601n:198_15: Sā aññaṃ kapiṭṭhahārakaṃ alabhamānā maṃyeva pesesi.
anya-e0601n:198_16: Ahaṃ gantvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ asakkonto attanāva attānaṃ pāde gahetvā muggaraṃ viya rukkhassa upari khipiṃ.
anya-e0601n:198_17: Atha sākhato sākhaṃ vicaranto phalāni gahetvā otarituṃ asakkonto gharaṃ gantvā nisseṇiṃ āharitvā oruyha mātu santike gantvā phalāni mātuyā adāsiṃ.
anya-e0601n:198_18: Tāni pana mahantāni honti cāṭippa māṇāni.
anya-e0601n:198_19: Tato me mātarā ekāsane nisinnāya samasaṭṭhiphalāni khāditānīti.
anya-e0601n:198_21: Āmisahetu cāṭukamyatādivasena nānappakārakaṃ paresaṃ thomanā vācā ceva rājakathaṃ corakathantiādinayappavattā tiracchānakathā ca pañcamavācā nāma.
anya-e0601n:198_23: Taṃ pana vassasatampi suṇantā paṇḍitā neva tittiṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0601n:198_24: Tāsu pana bhagavā tatiyachaṭṭhamā dvivācāeva bhāsati.
anya-e0601n:198_27: Visuddhimagga mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana sāratthadīpanīṭīkāyañca tadaññākārena vaṇṇito.
anya-e0601n:203_1: So hi pasatthānaṃ visesena pasatthoti seṭṭhoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:203_5: pasatthānaṃ paccekabuddhāriyasāvakādīnaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādi guṇehi visesena pasatthoti attho.
anya-e0601n:203_6: Atha vā sundare satipaṭṭhānādibhede dhamme esati gavesati esiṃ gavesinti vā seṭṭho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:203_10: Santehi sappurisehi esitabbo gavesitabboti vā seṭṭho.
anya-e0601n:203_14: Santehi sappurisehi icchiyati kantiya tīti vā seṭṭho.
anya-e0601n:203_16: Atha vā santānaṃ sappurisānaṃ hitasukhaṃ icchatīti seṭṭho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:203_18: Sundare satipaṭṭhānā dibhede dhamme eseti buddhetīti vā seṭṭho.
anya-e0601n:204_0: Kusalaṃkusalaṃ jahanti ettha kusalaṃ akusalaṃ jahanti padavibhāgo kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:204_1: Kucchitaṃ pāpadhammaṃ salayati calayati kampeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:204_4: Tattha kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tadaṅgappahānena pāpadhammaṃ salayati calayati,
anya-e0601n:204_6: lokuttara kusalaṃ samucchedappahānena salayati viddhaṃsetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:205_0: Atha vā kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:205_9: mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho.
anya-e0601n:205_15: Puññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjā bhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ kusalaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ akusalañca kusalaṃkusalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:206_0: Jahanti maggakkhaṇe samucchedappahānena phalakkhaṇe paṭippassambhanappahānena pajahantaṃ viddhaṃsentanti attho.
anya-e0601n:206_2: phalañāṇena jahiṃ pajahiṃ paṭippassambhinti vā jaho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:206_4: Kiñcāpi panettha kusalaṃ maggena pahātabbadhamme na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0601n:206_5: vaṭṭamūlabhūte avijjātaṇhādikilese pana arahattamagga ñāṇena jahite lokiyakusaluppattiyā mūlabhūtāya
anya-e0601n:206_6: avijjātaṇhāya abhāvā puññābhisaṅkhāro saṃsāre puna paṭisandhiyā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0601n:206_7: tasmā vaṭṭamūlabhūte kilese jahite phalūpacārena kusalampi jahitaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0601n:206_8: Rūpaṃ bhikkhave na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahathātiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:206_9: Arahantena hi abhisamācārikavattaṃ katampi kusalanti na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0601n:207_0: Vuttañhi nidānavaggasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khīṇāsavena hi kataṃ kammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti nākusalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:208_0: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca “arahattamaggo ca kusalākusala kammakkhayāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ tena taṃ bhijjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:209_0: Tena vuttaṃ cūḷaniddesapāḷiyaṃ “arahattamaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
anya-e0601n:209_1: etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhantī”ti.
anya-e0601n:210_1: So jino hi na mato amato,
anya-e0601n:210_2: maraṇadhammassa nibbattakānaṃ kilesānaṃ arahatta maggena samucchinditattā puna maraṇato virahitoti vā amato.
anya-e0601n:210_3: Atha vā nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena adhigate natthi mataṃ maraṇaṃ yassa jinassāti amatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:210_4: Jinena hi khandhamaccumāraṃ ajitopi kilesamāraṃ jayitvā tesaṃ avassaṃ jiyamānattā phalūpacārena amatoti vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:211_1: Natthi mataṃ maraṇaṃ etthāti amataṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:212_0: Vuttañhi milindapañhe nāgasenattherena “na kenaci kāraṇena nibbānaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:213_3: Assa jinassa catumaggañāṇena sacchikataṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ atthīti attho,
anya-e0601n:214_0: Santanti sabbakilesadarathehi ca vaṭṭadukkhehi ca suvūpasantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:214_1: So hi buddho sabbakilesadarathavaṭṭadukkhehi samittha vūpasamitthāti santoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:214_3: Dhātvantassa lopaṃ tapaccayassantoādesaṃ katvā padasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:214_4: Saṃsāravaṭṭe darathakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ bodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena samucchinditattā sītibhūto santakāyacittoti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:215_1: so hi buddho natthi sīlādiguṇehi samo sadiso etassāti asamoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:215_2: Imasmiṃ sattaloke sīla samādhipaññādiguṇehi buddhena sadiso koci manusso vā devo vā brahmā vā natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:215_3: Bhagavato hi asīti anubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍita bāttiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi vicitrarūpakāyo ca sabbākārehi
anya-e0601n:215_6: tasmā bhagavā sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asamo asadisoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:216_0: Asamaṃ dadanti lokiyadhammena asadisaṃ maggaphalanibbāna dhammaṃ veneyyānaṃ sattānaṃ desanāñāṇena dāyakaṃ.
anya-e0601n:216_1: Ettha ca asamanti natthi ettha etesaṃ vā samo sadiso lokiyadhammoti asamo,
anya-e0601n:216_3: Atha vā asamanti aññesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggabhāvato catubbidhena ariya maggena sacchikātabbaṃ nibbānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0601n:216_4: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā,
anya-e0601n:216_6: Tassa pana padassa dadantipadena kammabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:216_9: so kenaci lokiyadhammena asamaṃ asadisaṃ maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ mahākaruṇāppadhānena
anya-e0601n:216_10: amatādhigamapaṭipattidassanena desanāñāṇena veneyyānaṃ sattānaṃ dātāti attho.
anya-e0601n:217_0: (Kha) dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana saraṇanti sabbasattalokassa paṭisaraṇabhūto parāyaṇo leṇo tāṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:217_1: So hi buddho saranti paṭisaranti ettha sattalokāti saraṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:217_3: Atha vā saranti osaranti samosaranti ettha sattalokāti saraṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:217_4: Saranti cintenti ettha saddhā pasannā devamanussā saraṇamidanti saraṇoti ca.
anya-e0601n:217_5: Saranti paṭivijjhanti etthupagatā devamanussā saddhammanti saraṇoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0601n:217_7: Saraṇagamanaṭṭhāne pana sarati hiṃsati bhayaṃ santāpaṃ dukkhaṃ kilesañcāti saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:218_0: Puna saraṇaṃ lokanti sattasaṅkhārokāsasaṅkhataṃ lokaṃ sarantaṃ jānantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:218_1: Ettha hi lokayati patiṭṭhayati ettha puññāpuññañca tabbipāko cāti loko,
anya-e0601n:218_8: lokiyanti patiṭṭhiyanti ettha vā jaṅgamā ca thāvarā cāti loko,
anya-e0601n:218_11: Ettha ca sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne indriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho
anya-e0601n:218_12: santāno ca sattoyeva loko sattalokoti vacanatthena sattalokoti veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:218_13: Eko loko sabbe sattā āhā raṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne indriyabaddhānaṃ vā anindriyabaddhānaṃ vā khandhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:218_14: samūho santāno ca paccayehi saṅkhariyantīti saṅkhārā,
anya-e0601n:223_0: Āgataṭṭhāne anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho santāno ca avakasanti patiṭṭhahanti etthāti okāso,
anya-e0601n:223_1: soyeva loko okāsalokoti vacanatthena okāsa lokoti veditabbo,
anya-e0601n:223_3: Sarati jānāti ajānīti vā saraṇo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:223_13: āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokañcātiādimanekalokaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇena paṭivijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:224_2: Raṇasaddo ca kilesesu ca yuddhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe ca dissati.
anya-e0601n:224_3: Tathā hi saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammātiādīsu kilesesu dissati.
anya-e0601n:224_4: Te hi raṇanti kandanti sattā etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:227_4: dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā samantatoti chaddantajātake cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe dissati.
anya-e0601n:227_5: Raṇaṃ karontoti hi cuṇṇaṃ vicuṇṇaṃ karonto.
anya-e0601n:227_9: Raṇanti satte rāgādayo cuṇṇenti pīḷentīti raṇā,
anya-e0601n:227_10: raṇanti sattā etehi kandanti paridevantīti vā raṇā, kilesā.
anya-e0601n:227_12: Natthi raṇā kilesā etassāti araṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:227_13: Jinassa kilesamārassa bodhimūle jiyamānattā raṇā kilesā na santīti attho.
anya-e0601n:228_1: Ettha ca raṇanti etaṃ yehi abhibhūtā sattā kandanti paridavanti etesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:228_2: Tesaṃ abhāvaṃ veneyyasantāne desanāñāṇena karoti attho.
anya-e0601n:230_22: Tassa bhayānaṃ kāraṇa bhūtānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ arahattamaggena samucchinditattā sabbabhayaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:231_0: Puna abhayaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāyakanti ettha abhayantipadaṃ ṭhānantipade visesanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:231_3: Natthi sabbabhayaṃ ettha nibbāneti abhayaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:231_4: Buddhapaccekabuddha arahantā ṭhanti uppajjanti etthāti ṭhānaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:231_7: So buddho bhabbe kulaputte maggādhi gamappattiyā dhammadesanāya maggaphalañāṇaṃ adhigamento nibbānaṭṭhānaṃ netīti attho,
anya-e0601n:232_0: Puna nāyakaṃ nameti nāyakaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:232_1: Tattha nāyakanti veneyyasatte saṃsāraṇṇavato nibbānapāraṃ netīti nāyako, buddho.
anya-e0601n:232_2: So hi yathā nāviko jane nāvāya orimatīrato pārimatīraṃ neti,
anya-e0601n:232_3: evaṃ satte maggaṅganāvāya saṃsāraṇṇavato nibbāna pāraṃ neti pāpuṇetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:232_4: Atha vā nāyakanti tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvagamanattā nāyako jeṭṭha seṭṭhavuḍḍhataro.
anya-e0601n:232_5: So hi jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ neti gacchati pāpuṇātīti nāyakoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:232_7: So pana idha loke avijjaṇḍagatānaṃ sabbapajānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ arahattamaggena padāletvā
anya-e0601n:232_8: ariyāya jātiyā jātattā sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭhajeṭṭhavuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ gatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:232_10: Nameti ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ namāmīti attho.
anya-e0601n:232_11: Ettha hi vattamānamivibhattiyā kvacidhātutyādisuttena eādeso hoti.
anya-e0601n:235_1: Namudhātuyā vāccattho namanakriyā saṅkhāto kusalacittuppādo padhānavasena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:235_2: Mivibhattiyā vāccattho tena cittuppādena upalakkhito uppāda vanto tadākāro puggalo appadhānavasena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:235_3: Padasamudāyassa pana vāccattho kattukammabhāvesu kattubhūto atītādikālesu paccuppannakālabhūto dhātvattha kiriyāvisesova labbhati.
anya-e0601n:236_1: Namudhātuyā vaccaṃ sugatādi buddhaguṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vandanākārappavatto kāyavacī viññattisamuṭṭhāpako
anya-e0601n:236_2: saddhācetanāpaññāpadhāno kusala cittuppādo ca dve viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre vandanākārappavatto
anya-e0601n:236_5: Diṭṭhadhammi kasamparāyikasaṅkhātaṃ pacchimapacchimaphalaṃ rogādiantarāyānaṃ abhāvañca vā saggamokkhasampattisukhañca kāraṇūpacārena,
anya-e0601n:236_19: Mivibhattiyā vāccaṃ taṃmukhyādīhi lakkhito kattu kriyāvisesena ca vattamānavibhattisaṅkhātena vibhattivise
anya-e0601n:236_20: sena ca parassapadasaṅkhātena padavisesena ca uttamapurisa visesena ca amhayogavisesena ca sabbadhātuvisesena
anya-e0601n:236_21: ca ekavacanavisesena ca paccuppannakālavisesena ca dhātvatthakriyāvisesena ca aliṅga visesena ca bhūvādigaṇa
anya-e0601n:236_22: visesena ca novikaraṇavisesena ca bhāvakammakattūsukattuvisesena ca lakkhito ahaṃsaṅkhāto khandhasaṅkhato
anya-e0601n:236_24: Kriyāpadassa kriyāya padhānena vācakattā dhātvatthova padhānena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:236_25: Apaccayassa vāccaṃ bhūvādigaṇajotakā rūpasiddhimattā pada siliṭṭhatā labbhati.
anya-e0601n:237_0: Atha vā yo ahaṃ namāmīti so name.
anya-e0601n:237_3: Namanañcettha buddhassa sīlādianantaguṇesu ninnapabbhāratāvasena paṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā.
anya-e0601n:237_4: Sā ca vandaneyya vandanakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
anya-e0601n:237_5: purimakammassa anubalappadāna vasena tannibbattitavipākasantatiyā antarāyakarāni upapīḷakaupacchedakakammāni
anya-e0601n:238_1: Nametiiminā buddhassa sugatādiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattā tividhā paṇāmakusala cetanā mukhyena dasseti.
anya-e0601n:238_2: Taṃ dassanena tassā kāraṇabhūtā yonisomanasikārādayo ca catucakkasampattiñca buddhuppādanavamakhettañca
anya-e0601n:238_3: pubbabhāge pavattaṃ saddhāpaññāpadhānaṃ kusalacittuppādañca phalūpacārena dīpeti.
anya-e0601n:238_4: Taddīpanena tassā phalabhūtaṃ diṭṭhadhammarogādiantarāyavisosanañca saggamokkha sukhañca paṭhamakāraṇūpacārena pakāseti.
anya-e0601n:238_6: Taṃvibhāvanena vandakassa me khettaṅgatabhāvañca paṇāme tabbabhāvañca tatiyakāraṇūpacārena anubhāveti.
anya-e0601n:239_1: Nametivācakapadassa vāccabhūtā tividhā buddhapaṇāmakusalacetanā samaṭṭhāyī bhāvo nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:239_3: Atha vā tividhāya buddhapaṇā makusalacetanāya sampayutto samādhippadhāno mahā kusalacittuppādo samaṭṭhāyībhāvo nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:239_7: Buddhantipāṭhasesa padassa vāccabhūto buddhadabbo ārammaṇavibhāvo nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:239_11: Kāraṇabhūtaṃ taṃ samaṭṭhāyībhāvaṃ upādāya jānitabbo diṭṭhadhammarogā diantarāyābhāvo ca samparāye saggamokkhasukhasampatti ca ānubhāvo nāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:240_0: Tattha hi kiñcāpi ānubhāvadīpakaṃ padaṃ natthi.
anya-e0601n:240_1: Kāraṇassa pana phalena vinābhāvato kāraṇassa phalaṃ viññeyyanti.
anya-e0601n:240_2: Atha vā nametipadassa sāmatthiyato ānubhāvo dassitoyevāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:240_3: Āvibhūto ussuko ca buddhapaṇāmassa ānisaṃsapajānanā mati ca alasābhāvo ca cittappasādo ca samādhityādi ca byabhicārībhāvo nāma.
anya-e0601n:240_4: Lomahaṃsādibhāvo satvaṃkābhāvo nāmāti alaṅkāra nayo veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:241_1: Sugataṃ sobhanagataṃ sundaranibbānaṭṭhānaṃ gataṃ vā sammā gataṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:241_3: seṭṭhaṃ pasatthataraṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhede dhamme gavesantaṃ vā santehi gavesitabbaṃ vā sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ icchitaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:241_20: nāyakaṃ tilokānaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ buddhaṃ sakkaccaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ name namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:248_1: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gāthādvayena buddhassa namassitvā idāni nayanasubhagakāyaṅgantyādīhi pañcahi guṇehi thomitvā
anya-e0601n:248_3: Ayaṃ pana na na magaṇayuttattā navakkharehi lakkhitā bhujagasu sugāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:249_1: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ nā ca dve nagaṇāmo ca magaṇo ca yadi siyā.
anya-e0601n:249_3: Tattha pana nayanasubhagakāyaṅganti sabbasattānaṃ cakkhussa sobhanaṃ gatena kāyaṅgenasamannāgataṃ.
anya-e0601n:249_4: Ettha hi nayananti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nayanaṃ,
anya-e0601n:249_14: taṃ kāyaṅgaṃ yassa buddhassāti nayanasubhaga kāyaṅgo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:249_15: So hi rūpakāyassa dassanā nuttariyaguṇayogato sabbasattānaṃ pasādacakkhussa sobhanaṃ gatena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:249_16: ca asītyā nubyañjanalakkhaṇehi ca lakkhitena kāyaṅgena samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:250_1: so hi bhagavā madhiyati piyati pemiyati vāti madhuro.
anya-e0601n:250_5: madhati sabbasattānaṃ pītiṃ undeti vaḍḍhetīti madhuro,
anya-e0601n:250_8: Varitabbo icchitabbo patthitabbo vāti varo, saro.
anya-e0601n:250_17: Madhuro ca varo ca so saro cāti madhuravarasaro,
anya-e0601n:250_18: tena upeto sampanno samannāgatoti madhuravarasaropetoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:250_19: Bhagavato pana hadaya vatthuno suvisuddhattā pittasemhādīhi apalibuddhattā deva manussehi madhurena piyena
anya-e0601n:250_20: manāpiyena varena icchitapatthi tena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena sarena saddena upeto sampanno samannāgatoti
anya-e0601n:251_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi saropetanti sāmaññavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0601n:251_1: bhagavato saro pana visaṭṭho ca, viññeyyo, mañju, savanīyo, bindu, avisārī, gambhīro,
anya-e0601n:251_2: ninnādi cāti visesena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:251_3: Vuttañhi majjhima paṇṇāse brahmāyusutte “aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho panassa gotamassa mukhato ghoso niccharati visaṭṭho ca,
anya-e0601n:251_9: Yathāparisaṃ kho pana so bhavaṃ gotamo sarena viññāpeti,
anya-e0601n:251_10: na cassa bahiddhā parisāya ghoso na niccharatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:252_13: Bahiddhāti aṅgulimattampi parisato bahiddhā na gacchati. Kasmā.
anya-e0601n:252_14: So evarūpo madhurasaro akāraṇā mā nassīti.
anya-e0601n:252_15: Iti bhagavato ghoso parisāya mattakeneva caratīti vaṇṇitoti.
anya-e0601n:255_0: Yathā hi brahmuno saro pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā visuddho madhuro hoti.
anya-e0601n:255_1: Yathā ca sīhabyagghādīhi vāḷamigehi anubandhā dhāvantā khuddakamigā karavīkasakuṇassa vikūjamānaṃ saddaṃ
anya-e0601n:255_2: sutvā sarassa madhurattā maraṇabhayaṃ hitvā adhāvitvā ukkhittapādaṃ anikkhipitvā tiṭṭhantā suṇanti,
anya-e0601n:255_3: evaṃ karavīkassa saddo dhammatābhāvena madhuro piyo manāpo hoti.
anya-e0601n:255_4: Evaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ kammaṃ vatthuṃ sodheti,
anya-e0601n:255_5: vatthussa suddhattā pittasemhehi ca apalibuddhattā bhagavato nābhito samuṭṭhahanto saropi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato
anya-e0601n:255_8: bhagavato hi saro tehi saddehi satabhāgena sahassabhāgena atimadhuro atipiyo atimanāpo hoti,
anya-e0601n:255_9: tathā hi dhammāso karañño asandhimittā devī karavīkasakuṇassa madhurasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “imassa tiracchānassa madhuro saddo,
anya-e0601n:255_10: ko nāma sabbaññutañāṇasiriṃ pattassa bhagavato atimadhuro saddo”ti,
anya-e0601n:255_11: pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0601n:256_5: Te hi guṇenti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ pakāsentīti guṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:256_7: Maṇisāramañjūsāṭīkāyaṃ pana “guṇanti attano ādhāraṃ pākaṭaṃ karontīti guṇā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:257_3: goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca icchantehi janehīti guṇo.
anya-e0601n:257_4: Ettha kiñcāpi sīlādi dhammānaṃ āmantāpanaṃ natthi,
anya-e0601n:257_5: tathāpi taṃhetu āmantanaṃ nimantanañca teyeva karonti nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:257_6: Aññe pana guñjante abyayante iti guṇāti atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0601n:257_14: So pana samuddodakaṃ nāḷipattena aparimitaṃ viya kenaci aparimitānaṃ sīlādiguṇasamūhānaṃ ādhāro patiṭṭhānabhūtoti attho.
anya-e0601n:258_1: Ettha hi balanti kehici viruddhehi kāraṇe hi balanti na kampenti thirantīti balaṃ,
anya-e0601n:258_2: dasa balāni yassa soti dasabalo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:258_3: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti tathā gatassa dasabalaṃ kāyadasabalañca,
anya-e0601n:261_28: Idaṃ pana tāsu tāsu pāḷīsu na āgataṃ.
anya-e0601n:261_30: Tena vuttaṃ dasaka nipāta aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ “dasa balañāṇaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
anya-e0601n:261_31: Na kāyabalaṃ viya aṭṭha kathārūḷhamevāti adhippāyo”ti.
anya-e0601n:261_32: Ettha ca nārāyana saṅghāta balanti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo,
anya-e0601n:261_33: tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ.
anya-e0601n:262_0: Ñāṇadasabalaṃ pana vibhaṅgapāḷiyañca mūlapaṇṇāse mahā sīhanādasutte dasakanipātaaṅguttarapāḷiyañca vitthārena āgatameva.
anya-e0601n:263_0: Cutūpapātañāṇaṭṭhāne pana mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷiyaṃ mahāsīhanādasutte ca dasakanipātaaṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ āgataṃ.
anya-e0601n:263_1: Atthato pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena cutūpapātassa passitattā sadisamevāti.
anya-e0601n:263_2: Tattha hi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇanti kāraṇākāraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:263_3: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
anya-e0601n:263_5: Kammasamādānānaṃ vipākañāṇanti samādiyitvā katānaṃ atītānāgata paccuppannānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ sugatiduggatipaṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:263_7: Sabbattha gāminipaṭipadaṃ ñāṇanti sabbagatigāminiñca paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:263_8: Tattha ca paṭipadanti paṭipajjati pāpuṇāti etenāti paṭipadaṃ, maggaṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_0: Anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ ñāṇanti ettha aneka dhātūti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātūhi vā bahudhātuṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_1: Nānādhātūti tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ vilakkhaṇattā visadisa sabhāvattā nānāppakāradhātuṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_4: Sattānaṃ adhimuttikataṃ ñāṇanti sattānaṃ hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_5: Parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattiñāṇanti ettha parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_7: Ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena dvedhā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:264_8: Indriyaparopariyattiñāṇanti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvaṃ vaḍḍhañca aparabhāvaṃ hāniñca yathābhūtaṃ pajānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:265_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇanti ettha jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:265_10: Sattānaṃ cutūpapātaṃ ñāṇanti sattānaṃ cutiñca upapātañca pajānanaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:265_11: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ āsavanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānana ñāṇanti.
anya-e0601n:265_12: Imāni pana ñāṇāni aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatassa dasabalañāṇānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0601n:268_0: Anekadhātulokañca, sattānaṃ adhimuttikaṃ. [sā panesā setavavipulāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā;]
anya-e0601n:272_0: Dasimāni buddhassa cā, sādhāraṇāni ñāṇānī”ti. [sā panesā sāmaññagāthāti daṭṭhabbā;]
anya-e0601n:273_2: atha kasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ dasabhedena vuttanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0601n:273_6: Sabbaññutañāṇaṃ pana tampi tato avasesampi pajānāti.
anya-e0601n:273_17: Sabbaññutañāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti.
anya-e0601n:273_18: Etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:273_19: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0601n:273_21: Maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0601n:274_0: Atulanti sīlādīhi guṇehi kenaci puggalena asadisaṃ.
anya-e0601n:274_5: Atha vā tuliyati pamiyati etāyāti tulā,
anya-e0601n:274_13: Sīlādiguṇehi kenaci puggalena asadiso bhagavā labbhati.
anya-e0601n:274_14: Atha vā natthi tulo sadiso puggalo etassāti atulo, bhagavā.
anya-e0601n:274_18: Yathāha “yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā,
anya-e0601n:274_22: Vandeti buddhassa nayanasubhagakāyaṅgādiguṇaṃ anussaritvā tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ ahaṃ vandāmīti attho.
anya-e0601n:274_23: Ettha ca mivibhattiyā mahāvisayasuttena ekārā desoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:275_0: Tattha yoniso manasikāracittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvayakapparadvayanalāṭasaṅkhātāni pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:275_1: patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānaṃ abhimukhaṃ nipatanto kāyena vandati nāma.
anya-e0601n:275_2: Yaṃ sandhāya “pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā”ti aṭṭha kathādīsu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:275_3: Buddhaguṇapadāni vācāya pavattento vācāya vandati nāma.
anya-e0601n:275_11: Buddhādi guṇāni anussaranto manasā vandati nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:276_1: Nayanasubhagakāyaṅgaṃ sabbasattānaṃ cakkhussa sobhanaṃ gatena kāyaṅgena samannāgataṃ,
anya-e0601n:276_2: madhuravarasaropetaṃ piyapemanīyena assādi yena uttamasaddena samannāgataṃ,
anya-e0601n:276_4: dasabalaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena tathāgatassa kāyañāṇadasa balena samannāgataṃ,
anya-e0601n:276_5: atulaṃ sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ buddhaṃ tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:283_1: Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya buddhassa vanditvā idāni samādhi ādīhi catūhi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo yo buddho dhitimāññadhārako tiādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:283_2: Ayaṃ pana masajagaṇa garuyuttattā dasakkharehi lakkhitā suddhavirā jitagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:283_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ msā masagaṇā ca jgā jagaṇagarukā ca ce siyyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:283_8: Dhitimā aññadhārako yo buddho lokato saṃsāre kāyikaṃ dukkhañca cetasikaṃ dukkhañca anubhosi naradevamaṅgalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:284_2: Tassa ca aniyamavācaka sabbanāmapadattā vacanattho na kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:284_3: Tassa pana ya oti padavibhāgo kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:284_4: Tesu ca yasaddassa vāccaṃ aniyamo buddhadabbo appadhānena labbhati,
anya-e0601n:284_5: tassa yādisayuttajaccanāmagottasīlavihārī gocarasaṅkhātaṃ aniyamasāmaññākārattaguṇameva padhānena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:284_6: Paṭhamāsivibhattiyā kāriyabhūtassa okārassa vāccaṃ pakatūpanissayasaṅkhātaṃ kattukārakekavacanasaṅkhyaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:284_7: Atha vā sabbanāmabhāvaṃ yāti gacchatīti yo,
anya-e0601n:284_9: sabbanāma bhāvena yāti pavattatīti vā yo,
anya-e0601n:284_11: yātabbo ñātabbo etena vā aniyamatthoti yo.
anya-e0601n:288_8: Atha vā anaññabodhito hutvā savāsanāya sammohaniddāya bujjhati jāgarotīti buddho,
anya-e0601n:288_9: dinakarakiraṇa samāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā vikasitamiva padumaṃ aggamaggañāṇasamāgamena
anya-e0601n:288_10: aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkata sabbaññutañāṇappattiyā bujjhati vikasatīti vā buddho,
anya-e0601n:288_11: nibbāna saṅkhātaṃ ekāyanamaggaṃ bujjhati gacchatīti vā buddho.
anya-e0601n:292_0: Atha vā sabbañeyyadhamme bujjhati jānātīti buddho,
anya-e0601n:292_1: pārami bhāvitāya paññāya sabbe saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhamme bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissatīti vā buddho,
anya-e0601n:292_2: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigatañāṇaguṇavisesehi bujjhitabboti vā buddho,
anya-e0601n:292_3: bhagavatā bujjhitabbaṃ ñātabbanti buddhaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ,
anya-e0601n:292_6: Atthato pana pāramitā bhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhasta niravasesakleso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutañāṇādiapari
anya-e0601n:292_8: Yathāha “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
anya-e0601n:293_4: Tattha kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā sambodhippatto sabbaññubuddho nāma.
anya-e0601n:293_5: Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sayambhūpatto paccekabuddho nāma.
anya-e0601n:294_0: Dhitimāññadhārakoti ettha dhitimā aññadhārakoti padacchedo kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:294_2: sampayutta dhamme ekārammaṇe dhāretīti dhiti, samādhi.
anya-e0601n:294_6: cittena yogeneveso ekā rammaṇe patiṭṭhāpanavasena cittassa ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena patiṭṭhāpetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:294_8: So hi yathā mahāmeru catūhi disāhi bhusaṃ āgatehi vātehi na samiñjati,
anya-e0601n:294_9: evaṃ paṭipakkhehi micchāvāda vātehi ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇehi ca lābhālābha yasāyasa nindā pasaṃsa sukhadukkhasaṅkhātehi lokadhammehi ca na samiñjati,
anya-e0601n:295_2: Jānāti paṭhama maggena diṭṭhasaccassa āmariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā vāti aññaṃ,
anya-e0601n:299_0: Khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ aññamaññasambandhena saṃpunappunaṃ sarati gacchati pavattatīti saṃsāro.
anya-e0601n:299_2: Atha vā khandhāyatanadhātuyo saṃ abbocchinnaṃ saranti gacchanti pavattanti etthāti saṃsāroti vacanattho kātabbo, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0601n:299_16: Lokiyanti pavattanti ettha puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko.
anya-e0601n:299_18: Atha vā kusalādīni lāti gaṇhātīti loko.
anya-e0601n:299_21: Dhitimā aññadhārako yo buddho saṃsāravaṭṭe nimuggānaṃ sattānamanudayāya saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato pamocetukāmo
anya-e0601n:299_22: kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni samatiṃsapāramiyo pañca mahā pariccāge ca
anya-e0601n:299_23: karonto sattalokahetu kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhaṃ anubhavasīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:300_4: Ariyamanusso pana bhūtapubbagatika nayena naro nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:300_8: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0601n:300_11: Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena puriucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:300_13: Puttabhātu bhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0601n:300_15: Tasmā idha pana naranti sāmaññena vuttampi visesena purisanaranti viññāyati padhānanayena gahaṇassa yuttattā.
anya-e0601n:300_19: Devā ca nāma tividhā honti sammutidevā,
anya-e0601n:300_22: Tattha mahāsammatakālato paṭṭhāya lokena devāti sammatattā rājāno deviyo rājakumārā ca sammutidevā nāma.
anya-e0601n:301_2: Maṅganti vaḍḍhenti sabbasampattīhi sattānaṃ etenāti maṅgalo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:301_5: taṃ veneyyānaṃ desanāya lunāti chindatīti maṅgalo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:301_9: So pana manussadevabrahmānaṃ pūjanīyattā ca saṅkhe, cakkaṃ,
anya-e0601n:301_12: sovattikañcāti aṭṭhahi lokiyamaṅgalehi seṭṭhattā uttamattā ca maṅgalo nāmāti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:302_1: Dhitimā samādhivanto aññadhārako arahattaphaladhārako arahattaphalase tacchattaṃ dhārento vā,
anya-e0601n:302_4: kāyikaṃ kāye pavattaṃ dukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca cetasi pavattaṃ dukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca,
anya-e0601n:302_8: taṃ tādisaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:309_1: Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya buddhassa natvā idāni bāttiṃsatilakkhaṇacitradehantyādīhi chahi guṇehi thomitvā munino
anya-e0601n:309_2: vanditukāmo bāttiṃsati lakkhaṇa citra deha ntyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:309_3: Ayaṃ pana ta ja ja gaṇa garudvaya yuttattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā upaṭṭhitā gāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:309_4: Vuttañhi vuttodaye tjā jgā garunāyamupaṭṭhitā sā”ti.
anya-e0601n:309_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ tjā tajagaṇā ca jgājagaṇagarū ca garunā pādantagarunā ce yuttā,
anya-e0601n:309_8: Ettha ca eka garuke satipi dvigarukepi lakkhaṇasamānattā upaṭṭhitā gāthā nāmāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:309_9: Tattha bāttiṃsati lakkhaṇa citra dehanti dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi vicitraṃ sarīravantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:309_10: Ettha ca dvīhi adhikaṃ tiṃsaṃ bāttiṃsati.
anya-e0601n:309_13: Dihati upacayati vaḍḍhati vā ettha kusalā kusalanti dehaṃ, sarīraṃ.
anya-e0601n:309_15: Bāttiṃsati mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi citraṃ vicitraṃ dehaṃ sarīraṃ yassa soti bāttiṃsatilakkhaṇacitradeho,
anya-e0601n:310_8: ṭhitakova anonamanto ubhohi pāṇitalehi jāṇu kāni parimasati parimajjati,
anya-e0601n:311_0: Tena vuttaṃ pātheyyavagge lakkhaṇasutte “katamāni tāni bhikkhave dvattiṃsamahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni,
anya-e0601n:311_1: yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dve gatiyo bhavanti, anaññā.
anya-e0601n:311_2: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavatti…pe…
anya-e0601n:311_4: arahaṃ hoti sammā sambuddho loke vivaṭacchado 1.
anya-e0601n:311_5: idha bhikkhave mahā puriso suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti.
anya-e0601n:311_6: Yampi bhikkhave mahā puriso suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti.
anya-e0601n:311_7: Idampi bhikkhave mahā purisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati 2.
anya-e0601n:311_8: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave mahāpurisassa heṭṭhāpādatalesu cakkāni jātāni honti sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabbā kāraparipūrāni.
anya-e0601n:311_9: Idampi bhikkhave mahāpurisassa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati 3.
anya-e0601n:311_10: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave mahāpuriso āyatapaṇhī hoti 4.
anya-e0601n:311_16: ṭhitakova anonamanto ubhohi pāṇitalehi jāṇukāni parimasati parimajjati 10.
anya-e0601n:311_19: sukhumacchavī hoti sukhumattā chaviyā rajojallaṃ kāye na upalimpati 13.
anya-e0601n:311_23: Uddhaggāni lomāni jātāni nīlāni añjanavaṇṇāni kuṇḍalā vattāni padakkhiṇāvattakajātāni 15.
anya-e0601n:311_42: uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā hoti odātā mudutūla sannibhā.
anya-e0601n:311_43: Yampi bhikkhave mahāpurisassa uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā hoti odātā mudutūlasannibhā.
anya-e0601n:311_45: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave mahāpuriso uṇhīsasīso hoti.
anya-e0601n:311_48: Imāni kho tāni bhikkhave dvattiṃsamahāpurisassa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇānī”ti.
anya-e0601n:311_49: Etesaṃ pana dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ attho pacchā āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0601n:312_0: Dehajjutiniggatapajjalantanti bhagavato rūpakāyato nikkhantehi chabbaṇṇaraṃsīsaṅkhātehi obhāsehi parisamantato vijjotavantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:312_6: Ettha ca dehaniggatajutīti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ padavipariyāyena dehajjutiniggatanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:312_7: Tasmā dehato niggatā jutīti samāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:312_8: Dehato rūpakāyato niggatehi niccharehi jutīhi raṃsīhi pajjalantaṃ yassa soti dehajjuti niggatapajjalanto,
anya-e0601n:312_10: Munino hi puratthimakāyato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ agga hesi.
anya-e0601n:312_11: Pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇahatthato vāmahatthato chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
anya-e0601n:312_12: Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesavattehi moragīvavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
anya-e0601n:312_13: Heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi,
anya-e0601n:312_14: evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi
anya-e0601n:312_15: niccharitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandajālā viya catuddīpika mahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya vidhāviṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:313_0: Paññādhiti sīla guṇoghavindanti ettha paññāti sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:313_2: Sīlanti pacceka buddhāriyasāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ suvisuddhaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:313_5: Pakārena yathāsabhāvaṃ sabbañeyyadhammaṃ vā jānāti paṭivijjhatīti paññā.
anya-e0601n:313_8: Sā panesā pajānanalakkhaṇā paṭivedhalakkhaṇā obhāsanalakkhaṇā ca,
anya-e0601n:313_14: Kāyavacīkammāni sammā dahati sammā ṭhapetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:313_15: Atha vā sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susilya bhāvena na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:313_16: sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti vā sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:313_24: Uhanati samūhaṃ karoti ettha avayavanti ogho, samūho.
anya-e0601n:313_27: Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ pana “avayavaṃ byapiyati gacchatīti ogho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:313_30: paññā ca dhiti ca sīlañca taṃ guṇañcāti paññādhitisīlaguṇā,
anya-e0601n:313_32: taṃ vindaṃ labhanaṃ yassāti paññādhitisīlaguṇoghavindo, muni.
anya-e0601n:313_33: Atha vā vindaṃ labhitabbaṃ paññādhitisīlaguṇoghaṃ yenāti paññādhitisīlaguṇoghavindo.
anya-e0601n:313_35: Vindānaṃ labhitabbānaṃ paññādhitisīla saṅkhātānaṃ guṇānaṃ samūho atthīti attho. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:314_2: Munāti jānāti paricchindati vā hitāhitanti muni, buddho.
anya-e0601n:314_4: Atha vā munāti jānāti ubho attheti muni,
anya-e0601n:314_5: khandhādi loke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya ime ajjhattikā khandhā ime bāhirātiādinā nayena idhalokatthañca paralokatthañca bhagavā jānātīti attho.
anya-e0601n:314_32: Āyatiñhi tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakānaṃ sabba kilesānaṃ bodhipallaṅkeyeva aggamaggena samucchinditattā bhagavato anāgate punabbhavo natthi,
anya-e0601n:314_33: tasmā ayaṃ ariyajāti pacchimattabhāvayuttoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:316_0: “Ñāṇañca medassanaṃ udapādi, akuppāme vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthidāni punabbhavo”ti.
anya-e0601n:317_2: dehajjutiniggata pajjalantaṃ rūpakāyato niggatehi chabbaṇṇaraṃ sīhi parisamantato vijjotavantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:317_3: paññādhitisīlaguṇo ghavindaṃ paññādhitisīlasaṅkhatānaṃ guṇānaṃ samūhaṃ labhanavantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:317_5: antimajātiyuttaṃ carimabhavena carimattabhāvena vā yuttaṃ muniṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi sakkaccaṃ vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:324_1: Evaṃ catutthagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni sirīhi lalitantyādīhi catūhi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo pātodayantyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:324_2: Ayaṃ pana ta ta ja gaṇadvigarūhi yuttattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā indavajirā gāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:324_5: yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ tā dveta gaṇā ca jagā jagaṇa garu ca go garu ca ce bhavanti,
anya-e0601n:324_6: sā indā dikā indasaddaādikā vajirā vajirāgāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:325_0: Tattha pātodayanti ettha pāto udayanti padacchedo kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:325_2: Pāto page pācīnalokadhātuto udeti uggacchatīti pātodayo, sūriyo.
anya-e0601n:325_7: Ettha ca bāloti sampati jāto taruṇadārako potako vā.
anya-e0601n:325_8: So hi balati assasitapassasitamattena jīvati na seṭṭhena paññājīvitenāti bālo,
anya-e0601n:325_13: Atha vā dīyati khīyati andhakāro etenāti divā.
anya-e0601n:325_16: divā divase vā karo ābhā yassāti divākaro, sūriyo.
anya-e0601n:325_18: Atha vā bālo iva divākaroti bāladivākaro,
anya-e0601n:325_20: So pana ākāse nakkhattatārānaṃ majjhe sahassaraṃsīhi lalati vilāsati viyāti attho.
anya-e0601n:326_1: Te hi yatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti kusale dhammeti yatīti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:326_2: Yata dhātu patiyatane vāyāme vā i.
anya-e0601n:326_3: Atha vā yamanti uparamanti akusale dhammeti yatīti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:326_13: Sidhātu sevāyaṃ rapaccayo itthi liṅgajotakaīpaccayo ca.
anya-e0601n:326_15: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sirīti paññāpuññāna metaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:326_16: Yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe sirīhi lalitaṃ vilāsitanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:326_18: yathā pāto udito uggato sūriyo ākāse nakkhattatārānaṃ majjhe sahassaraṃsīhi lalati vilāsati,
anya-e0601n:326_19: evaṃ muni loke yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe bāttiṃsalakkhaṇā sītyānubyañjanachabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi alaṅkatehi
anya-e0601n:327_1: Yathā hi cando kāḷapakkhe pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya dine dine ūno hoti,
anya-e0601n:327_2: evaṃ na munino mukhaṃ ānanaṃ ūnaṃ.
anya-e0601n:327_3: Bhagavato pana mukhaṃ niccaṃ paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya anūnaṃ hutvā sobhati,
anya-e0601n:331_0: Puṇṇacandaṃ viya mukhati sobhatīti mukhaṃ, ānanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:331_2: Puṇṇindunā saṅkāsaṃ sadisaṃ mukhaṃ ānanaṃ yassa soti puṇṇindusaṅkāsamukho, munindo. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:331_3: Munindassa pana puṇṇa candassa sahassaraṃsīhi sassiriko viya bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe bāttiṃsa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇāsītyānubyañjana
anya-e0601n:331_4: paṭimaṇḍitehi sirīhi ca byāmappabhāparikkhittehi āveḷāveḷā yamakāyamakā gumbāgumbā hutvā viniccharantīhi
anya-e0601n:331_5: ghanabuddharasmisaṅkhātehi alaṅkito sassirikamukho hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:332_1: Lābhālābhādiṃ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, taṇhā.
anya-e0601n:332_4: Vuttañhi mahāniddesapāḷiyaṃ “lābhālābha yasāyasa nindāninda sukhadukkhehi na iñjatīti anejo,
anya-e0601n:333_1: Saṅkharavikāralakkhaṇanibbāna paññattivasena pañcavidhaṃ sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ jānāti paṭivijjhati sīlenāti sabbaññū, munindo.
anya-e0601n:333_3: Ettha ca sabbe saṅkhatadhammā saṅkharā nāma sakasakapaccayehi saṅkhariyantīti katvā.
anya-e0601n:333_4: Viññattidvayaṃ lahutādittayañca vikāro nāma catūhi mahābhūtehi virūpaṃ kariyatīti katvā.
anya-e0601n:333_5: Viññattidvayassa yathākkamaṃ cittajavāyodhātu cittajapathavī dhātūnaṃ visesaguṇattā,
anya-e0601n:333_12: aniccatādittayāni ca upacayādicattāri lakkhaṇarūpāni ca lakkhaṇāni nāma lakkhiyanti etena lakkhitabbā dhammāti katvā.
anya-e0601n:333_15: Paricchedarūpaṃ itthipurisādighaṭapaṭādayo sabba vohāratthā ca paññatti nāma paññāpiyati pakārena ñāpiyatīti katvā.
anya-e0601n:333_17: Vikārādīsu pana vikāralakkhaṇāni paññattivisesattā visuṃ vuttāni.
anya-e0601n:333_18: Imehi dvīhi vinimuttā pana paricchedarūpā sabbavohāratthā paññattīti vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:333_19: Apadāna aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ atītādibhedaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya jānātīti sabbaññū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:334_5: Tattha yathākkamaṃ sabbaṃ jānanadhammo kamasabbaññū nāma.
anya-e0601n:334_6: Ekāvajjanena javanavārena jānitabbaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ jānanadhammo sakiṃsabbaññū nāma.
anya-e0601n:334_8: Ekappahārena sabbadhammaṃ jānanasamattho dhammo sattisabbaññū nāma.
anya-e0601n:334_9: Āvajjanābhedena jānitabbaṃ sabbadhammaṃ jānanadhammo ñātasabbaññū nāma.
anya-e0601n:334_10: Tesu ca sakiṃ sabbaññū sattisabbaññūvasena dve dhammā maggañāṇāniyeva.
anya-e0601n:335_0: Munindanti ettha munisaddassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:336_3: yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe sirīhi bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇā sītyānubyañjanasampattisaṅkhātehi sirīhi lalitaṃ vilāsitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:336_8: munindaṃ buddhaṃ sakkaccaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:343_1: Evaṃ pañcamagāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni mārajinaguṇena thomitvā vanditukāmo upetapuñño tyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:343_2: Ayaṃ pana ja ta ja gaṇa dvigaruyuttattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā upendavajirāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:343_3: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “upādikā sāva jatā jagā go”ti.
anya-e0601n:343_5: yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ jatā jagaṇa tagaṇā ca jagā jagaṇagarū ca go garu ca ce siyā,
anya-e0601n:343_6: sāva sāgāthāeva upādikā upasaddādikā indavajirāgāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:344_0: Upetapuñño yo sugato varabodhimūle sasena māraṃ jinitvā aruṇodayamhi bodhiṃ abojjhi mārajinaṃ abhaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0601n:344_4: Dānasīlādipāramīpuññena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:344_6: upanno sampanno hutvā eti gacchati pavattatīti upetaṃ, puññaṃ.
anya-e0601n:344_10: Pudhātu pīṇane sodhane vā ṇyo. Tassa ño.
anya-e0601n:344_11: Tattha attano kārakanti punappunaṃ pavattiyā sacittasantatiñca saṃjanitapaṇītarūpavisaṭena sanissaya rūpasantatiñca punāti pīṇeti sodheti vāti attho.
anya-e0601n:344_15: Yo puggalo puññaṃ karoti tassa ajjhāsayaṃ pūretīti attho.
anya-e0601n:345_0: Atha vā pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattetīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0601n:345_5: Tena vuttaṃ sammohavinodanī aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “punāti attano kārakaṃ pūreti cassa ajjhāsayaṃ pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattetīti puñño”ti.
anya-e0601n:345_6: Mūlaṭīkāyañca “punātīti sodheti apuññaphalato dukkhasaṃkilesato ca hitajjhāsayena puññaṃ karotīti taṃ nipphādanena kārakassajjhāsayaṃ pūretīti puñño.
anya-e0601n:345_7: Pūrako pujjanibbattako ca niruttilakkhaṇena puññoti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:345_9: “punāti attano santānaṃ apuññaphalato dukkhasaṃkilesato ca visodhetīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0601n:345_10: Hitasukhajjhāsayena puññaṃ karotīti taṃnipphādanena kārakassa ajjhāsayaṃ pūreti,
anya-e0601n:345_12: Iti pūrako pujjanibbattako ca niruttinayena puññanti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:345_13: Upetaṃ sampannaṃ puññaṃ pāramīpuññaṃ yassa soti upetapuñño,
anya-e0601n:346_1: Tattha varoti varitabbo patthitabbo icchitabboti vā varo.
anya-e0601n:346_2: Bodhimūleti ettha bodhīti vuccati rukkhopi, maggopi,
anya-e0601n:346_5: Tattha hi bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhi sambuddhoti ca,
anya-e0601n:346_6: antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gayanti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho.
anya-e0601n:346_7: Bodhīti vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇanti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
anya-e0601n:346_8: Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūri medhasoti āgataṭṭhāne sabbaññutañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:346_9: Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhatanti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ bodhīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:346_12: Bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissati cattāri ariyasaccāni sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammampi etthāti bodhi,
anya-e0601n:347_4: Anatthe niyojento guṇamāraṇena satte māretīti māro.
anya-e0601n:347_6: Sattānaṃ kusalaṃ māreti vināsetīti vā māro.
anya-e0601n:347_7: Saseno ca so māro cāti sasenamāro, mārarājā. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:348_0: Jinitvāti visākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ buddhadine anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye pāramīpuññatejena vijayitvāti attho.
anya-e0601n:349_2: Tattha āsamantato ālokaṃ karonto unati gacchatīti aruṇo.
anya-e0601n:349_6: Sūriyassa udayato pubbe uggataraṃsi aruṇo nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:349_7: Vuttañhi dasakanipāta aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “sūriyassa bhikkhave udayato etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ etaṃ pubbanimittaṃ yadidaṃ aruṇuggaṃ,
anya-e0601n:349_8: evameva kho bhikkhave kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ etaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ etaṃ pubbanimittaṃ yadidaṃ sammādiṭṭhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:349_11: Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ pana “aruṇavaṇṇatāya arati gacchatīti aruṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:350_0: Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mārabalaṃ vidhametvā cīvarūpari patamānehi bodhirukkhaṅkarehi
anya-e0601n:350_1: rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjayamāno rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
anya-e0601n:350_2: visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasikaritvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
anya-e0601n:350_3: tadeva pādakaṃ katvā mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena catutthamaggañāṇena
anya-e0601n:350_5: tadā sabbaññutañāṇādisabba buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhi adhigamīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:351_1: Devaputta kilesābhi saṅkhārakhandhamaccusaṅkhāte pañcamāre jināti ajini jinissatīti mārajino, sugato.
anya-e0601n:351_7: Yassa kassaci bhañjituṃ viddhaṃsituṃ asamatthaṃ vā.
anya-e0601n:351_9: Mārena yena kenaci bhañjituṃ na sakkotīti abhaṅgo,
anya-e0601n:351_10: tena vā na bhañjiyati na viddhaṃsiyatīti abhaṅgo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:351_13: Atha vā bhanjati viddhaṃsatīti bhaṅgo, māro.
anya-e0601n:351_15: Natthi bhaṅgo māro yo koci vā yassāti abhaṅgo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:351_18: Mārajinaṃ abhaṅgaṃ taṃ sugataṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:352_1: apadānaṭṭhakathāyañca āgatanayena buddhassa māravijayādiṃ sotujanānaṃ bahussutatthaṃ saṅkhepena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:352_2: Bodhi satto hi mahāsampattiṃ anubhavitvā hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaṭṭetvā
anya-e0601n:352_3: ekūnatiṃsavasse āsaḷhipuṇṇamāya uttarasaḷhanakkhattena yutte mahābhinikkhamaṃ nikkhamitvā anomanadītīre
anya-e0601n:352_4: ghaṭīkārabrahmunā dinnaṃ arahatta dhajabhūtaṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā nivāsetvā samaṇapabbajjaṃ
anya-e0601n:352_5: katvā chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā nigrodharukkhamūle senanigame senakuṭumbikassa dhītarāya sujātāya
anya-e0601n:352_6: saha satasahassagghiyā suvaṇṇapātiyā dinnaṃ sabbaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ ekaṭṭhitālapakkappamāṇaṃ ekūnapaññāsālopaṃ
anya-e0601n:352_7: paribhuñjitvā sāyanhasamaye devatāhi alaṅkatena maggena bodhirukkhābhimukho gacchante antaramagge sotthiyena
anya-e0601n:352_8: nāma tiṇahārakena dinnaṃ aṭṭhamuṭṭhikatiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ
anya-e0601n:352_9: acalaṭṭhānaṃ kilesabhañjanaṭṭhānanti ñatvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
anya-e0601n:352_11: Tānipi tiṇāni tathārūpena saṇṭhānena santhariṃsu saṇṭhahiṃsu vā.
anya-e0601n:352_12: Yathārūpaṃ sukusalopi vicittakāro vā potthatāro vā ālikhitumpi samattho natthi.
anya-e0601n:352_13: Bodhi satto bodhikhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā puratthābhimukho daḷhamānaso hutvā –
anya-e0601n:353_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasussatu;
anya-e0601n:355_0: Na tveva sammāsambodhiṃ apatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti asanisatasannipātenapi abhejjarūpaṃ taṃ pallaṅkaṃ abhañjitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0601n:355_1: Tasmiṃ samaye māro devaputto siddhatthakumāro “mayhaṃ vasaṃ atikkamitukāmo,
anya-e0601n:355_2: na dāni assa atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti mārabalassa santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocetvā māraghosanaṃ nāma ghosāpetvā mārabalaṃ ādāya nikkhami.
anya-e0601n:355_3: Sā mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasa yojanā honti.
anya-e0601n:355_4: Dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca dvādasa yojanā.
anya-e0601n:355_7: Yassā unnādantiyā unnādasaddo yojanasahassato paṭṭhāya pathavīundriyasaddo viya suyyati.
anya-e0601n:355_8: Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma hatthiṃ abhirūhitvā bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni aggahesi.
anya-e0601n:355_9: Avasesāyapi māraparisāya dve janā ekasadisaṃ āvudhaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:355_10: Nānappakāravaṇṇā nānappakāra mukhā hutvā mahāsattaṃ ajjhottharamānā āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:356_0: Dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā pana mahāsattassa thuti yo vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:356_3: Sakiṃ vātaṃ gāhāpetvā dhamanto cattāro māse saddaṃ karitvā nissaddo hoti.
anya-e0601n:356_4: Mahākāḷanāga rājā atirekapadasatena vaṇṇaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0601n:356_6: Māra bale pana bodhimaṇḍalaṃ upasaṅkamante tesaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0601n:356_8: Kāḷo nāma nāgarājā pathaviṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ mantirakanāgabhavanaṃ gantvā ubhohi hatthehi mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipanno.
anya-e0601n:356_9: Sakko vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ katvā cakkavāḷamukha vaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0601n:356_10: Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ koṭiyaṃ gahetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
anya-e0601n:356_13: Māropi attano parisaṃ āha “tāta suddhodanaputtena siddhatthena sadiso añño puriso nāma natthi,
anya-e0601n:356_14: mayaṃ sammukhā yuddhaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāma,
anya-e0601n:356_16: Mahāpurisopi tīṇi passāni oloketvā sabbadevatānaṃ palāyitattā suññāni addasa.
anya-e0601n:356_17: Puna uttarapassena mārabalaṃ ajjhottharamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ettako jano maṃ ekakaṃ sandhāya mahantaṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti,
anya-e0601n:356_18: imasmiṃ ṭhāne mayhaṃ mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā añño koci ñātako vā natthi,
anya-e0601n:356_19: imā pana dasa pāramiyova mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ puttaparijanasadisā,
anya-e0601n:356_20: tasmā mayā pāramiyova phalakaṃ katvā pāramisattheneva paharitvā ayaṃ balakāyo mayā viddhaṃsetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasa pāramiyo āvajjamāno nisīdi.
anya-e0601n:357_0: Atha māro devaputto eteneva siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmīti vātamaṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0601n:357_1: Taṅkhaṇaññeyeva puratthimā dibhedā vātā samuṭṭhahitvā aḍḍhayojanaekayojana dviyojanatiyojanappamāṇāni
anya-e0601n:357_2: pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni uddhaṃ mūlāni katvā sāmantā gāmanigame cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0601n:357_3: samatthāpi mahāpurisassa puññatejena mahānubhāvena bodhisattaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:357_4: Tato udakena ajjhottharitvā māressāmāti mahāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0601n:357_5: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā vaḷāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:357_7: Vanarukkhādīnaṃ uparibhāgena mahāmegho āgantvā mahā sattassa cīvare ussāvabinduggahaṇamattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0601n:357_9: Mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbamālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:357_11: Ekatodhārā ubhatodhārā asisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0601n:357_13: Kiṃsukavaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibba pupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu.
anya-e0601n:357_15: Accuṇho aggivaṇṇo kukkuḷo ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbacandanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipatati.
anya-e0601n:357_17: Atisukhumavāḷikā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:357_19: Taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāse nāgantvā bodhisattassa pādamūle dibbavilepanaṃ hutvā patati.
anya-e0601n:357_20: Tato iminā bhiṃsetvā siddhatthaṃ palāpessāmīti andhakāraṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0601n:357_21: Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ andhakāraṃ viya mahātamaṃ hutvā bodhisattaṃ patvā sūriyappabhā vihataṃ viya antaradhāyati.
anya-e0601n:358_0: Evaṃ māro imāhi navahi vātavassapāsāṇapaharaaṅgāra kukkuḷavāḷuka kalalaandhakāravuṭṭhīhi bodhisattaṃ
anya-e0601n:358_1: palāpetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ bhaṇe tiṭṭhatha imaṃ siddhatthakumāraṃ gaṇhatha hanatha palāpethā”ti parisaṃ
anya-e0601n:358_2: āṇāpetvā sayampi girimekhalassa hatthino khandhe nisinno cakkāvudhaṃ ādāya bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0601n:358_6: Mahāsatto tassa vacanaṃ sutvā avoca “māra neva tayā dasapāramiyo pūritā,
anya-e0601n:358_7: na upapāramiyo na paramattha pāramiyo nāpi pañcamahāpariccāgā pariccattā na ñātatthacariyā na lokatthacariyā na buddhatthacariyā pūritā,
anya-e0601n:358_11: Māro kuddho kodhavegaṃ asahanto mahāpurisassa cakkāvudhaṃ vissajjesi.
anya-e0601n:358_12: Taṃ tassa dasapāramiyo āvajjantassa uparibhāge mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0601n:358_13: Taṃ kira khuracakkāvudhaṃ aññadā tena kuddhena vissaṭṭhaṃ ekaghanapāsāṇa thambhe vaṃsakaḷīre viya chindantaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0601n:358_14: Idāni pana tasmiṃ mālāvitānaṃ hutvā ṭhite avasesā māraparisā idāni pallaṅkato vuṭṭhāya palāyissatīti mahantamahantāni selakūṭāni vissajjesuṃ.
anya-e0601n:358_15: Tānipi mahāpurisassa pāramiyo āvajjantassa mālāguḷabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:359_0: Devatā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhitā gīvaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “naṭṭho vata bho siddhatthakumārassa rūpaggappatto attabhāvo,
anya-e0601n:359_2: Tato mahāpuriso pūritapāramīnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ abhi sambujjhanadivase pattapallaṅko mayhaṃva pāpuṇātīti
anya-e0601n:359_3: vatvā ṭhitaṃ māraṃ āha “māra tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko sakkhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:359_4: Māro “ettakā janā sakkhino”ti māra balābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāreti.
anya-e0601n:359_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māraparisāya “ahaṃ sakkhī ahaṃ sakkhī”ti pavattasaddo pathavīundriyasaddasadiso ahosi.
anya-e0601n:359_6: Atha kho māro mahāpurisaṃ āha “siddhattha tuyhaṃ dānassa dinnabhāve ko sakkhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:359_7: Mahāpuriso “tuyhaṃ tāva dānassa dinnabhāve sacetanā sakkhino.
anya-e0601n:359_8: Mayhaṃ pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne sacetano koci sakkhī nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:359_10: vessantarattabhāve pana ṭhatvā mayhaṃ sattasattaka mahādānassa dinnabhāve acetanāpi ghanamahāpathavī
anya-e0601n:359_11: sakkhī”ti cīvaragabbhantarato dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā vessantarattabhāve mayhaṃ sattasattakamahādānassa
anya-e0601n:359_12: dinnabhāve tvaṃ sakkhi na sakkhīti mahāpathaviyābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
anya-e0601n:359_13: Mahā pathavī “ahaṃ te dānassa sakkhī”ti viravasahassena viravasatasahassena mārabalaṃ avattharamānā viya unnadi.
anya-e0601n:360_0: Tato mahāpurise dinnaṃ te siddhattha mahādānaṃ uttama dānanti vessantaradānaṃ sammasante diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko girimekhalo hatthī jāṇukehi patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0601n:360_3: Sīsābharaṇāni ceva vatthābharaṇāni ca pahāya sammukha sammukhaṭṭhāne disāvidisāhiyeva palāyiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:360_4: Tato devasaṅgho palāyamānaṃ mārabalaṃ disvā mārassa parājayo jāto.
anya-e0601n:360_9: brahmāno brahmānaṃ pesetvā gandhamālādi hatthā mahāpurisassa santikaṃ bodhipallaṅkaṃ āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:377_0: Avasesesu dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā mālāgandhavilepanehi ca pūjayamānā nānappakāra thutiyo ca vadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:377_1: Evaṃ anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye mahāpuriso mārabalaṃ vidhametvā cīvarūpari pata mānehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi
anya-e0601n:377_2: rattapavāḷapallavehi viya pūjayamāno paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
anya-e0601n:377_3: visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭicca samuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāresi.
anya-e0601n:377_4: Athassa dvādasapadikaṃ paccayā kāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena anulomato paṭilomato sammasantassa dasasahassilokadhātu
anya-e0601n:377_6: Mahāpurisena pana dasasahassi lokadhātuṃ unnādetvā aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:377_7: Idha pana vuttāvasesaṃ tāsu ca oloketvā gahetabbanti.
anya-e0601n:378_1: Upetapuñño sampanna dānādipāramīpuññavā dānādipāramīpuññena sampanno vā,
anya-e0601n:378_2: yo sugato varabodhimūle uttamassa bodhirukkhassa samīpe,
anya-e0601n:378_9: abhaṅgaṃ sasenamāro yo koci vā bhindituṃ asamatthaṃ taṃ sugataṃ ahaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:385_1: Evaṃ chaṭṭhamagāthāya sugataṃ vanditvā idāni arahatta maggañāṇādīhi catūhi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo rāgādityādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:385_2: Ayaṃ pana indavajira upendavajira gāthādvayassa lakkhaṇassa missakattā ekādasakkharehi lakkhitā upajātigāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:385_6: Yassā vuttiyā anantaro dīritalakkhaṇā anantare udīritaṃ vuttaṃ indavajiropenda vajiragāthānaṃ lakkhaṇavantā pādā vimissā saṃsaṭṭhā ce bhavanti,
anya-e0601n:386_0: Tattha rāgādichedāmala ñāṇakhagganti ettha rāgaādicheda amalañāṇakhaggantipadacchedo.
anya-e0601n:386_1: Rāgādikilesaṃ chindantaṃ malavira hitaṃ arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ asivantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:386_9: Atha vā malati saṃkilissati etenāti malaṃ.
anya-e0601n:386_15: Rukkhādiṃ khaggati chindati etenāti vā khaggaṃ,
anya-e0601n:386_18: Rāgādichedāmalañāṇasaṅkhataṃ khaggaṃ yassa soti rāgādichedāmalañāṇakhaggo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:386_19: Rāgādikilesaṃ chindantena malavira hitena aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhatena asinā samannāgatoti attho. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:387_7: Atha vā pamādaṃ sarati hiṃsatīti sati,
anya-e0601n:387_14: Satisamaññaṃ phalakaṃ abhidaḷhaṃ gaṇhatīti satisamaññāphala kābhigāho,
anya-e0601n:387_16: Yathā hi senāya phalakaṃ asiādisatthaṃ rakkhati,
anya-e0601n:387_17: evaṃ satisaṃvaro cakkhādi dvāresu rūpādiārammaṇaṃ pavisituṃ adatvā rakkhati.
anya-e0601n:387_18: Tasmā bhagavā satidhammo sabbākusalānaṃ rakkhakattā sabbakusala dhammānaṃ upakārattā sabbatthānaṃ sādhakattā
anya-e0601n:387_19: ca satiphalakaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:388_8: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātā dīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā.
anya-e0601n:388_16: Avītikkamo sīlaṃ nāma samādinnasīlassa kāyikavācasiko anatikkamoti.
anya-e0601n:388_21: Idha pana avītikkamo sīlaṃ nādhippetaṃ. Kasmā.
anya-e0601n:390_0: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo”tyādi.
anya-e0601n:391_0: Avahanati gacchati pavattati avayavaṃ etthāti ogho, samūho.
anya-e0601n:391_3: Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ pana “avayavaṃ katvā byāpiyati gacchatīti ogho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:391_6: Alaṃ vibhusaṃ taṃ samaṅgīpuggalaṃ karoti anenāti alaṅkāro, sīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:391_10: Tena pana aññehi asādhāraṇena lokuttarasīlālaṅkārena vibhūsito.
anya-e0601n:391_12: Sīlālaṅkārena hi sadiso alaṅkāro nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:392_0: Namāmibhiññāvaramiddhupetanti ettha namāmi abhiññāvaraṃ iddhi upetanti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:392_2: Abhiññāvaramiddhupetanti abhiññāsaṅkhātāya uttamāya iddhiyā samannāgatanti attho.
anya-e0601n:392_5: Tañhi iddhividhadibbasota paracitta vijānana pubbenivāsānussati cutūpapāta āsavakkhaya ñāṇavasena chabbidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:392_6: Tattha iddhividhañāṇanti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādinayappavatte iddhividhe jānana ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:392_9: Pubbenivāsā nussatiñāṇanti attasantāne vutthavasena ceva gocara nivāsavasena ca pubbe atītabhavesu khandhādīnaṃ anussaraṇa satiyā sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:392_10: Cutūpapātañāṇanti sattānaṃ cutiyañca upapāte ca jānanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:392_11: Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāsu cutūpapātañāṇaṭṭhāne tassa sādhakattā dibbacakkhuñāṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:392_17: Abhiññāsaṅkhātāya varāya iddhiyā upeto samupeto samannāgatoti abhiññāvaramiddhupeto, buddho.
anya-e0601n:393_1: Rāgādichedāmalañāṇa khaggaṃ rāgādikilesaṃ chindantaṃ malavirahitaṃ arahattamaggañāṇa saṅkhātaṃ asivantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:393_4: abhiññā varamiddhupetaṃ abhiññāsaṅkhātāya varāya uttamāya iddhiyā upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:400_1: Evaṃ sattamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni mahākaruṇā dīhi navahi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo dayālayantyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:400_2: Ayaṃ pana ja ta ja ragaṇehi yuttattā dvādasakkharehi lakkhitā catupādantayamakā vaṃsaṭṭhagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:400_5: yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ jatā jatagaṇā ca jarā jaragaṇā ca ce bhavanti,
anya-e0601n:400_6: idaṃ vuttaṃ vaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vaṃsaṭṭhagāthā nāmāti munayo isayo vadantīti.
anya-e0601n:401_6: Dayāpannoti ettha mettāya mettacittataṃ āpannoti attho.
anya-e0601n:401_8: Tasmā dayā ca dayā ca dayāti saddasarūpekaseso kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:401_13: Yā karuṇā yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanipphattiṃ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0601n:401_15: Dayati hiṃsati apaneti paradukkhanti vā dayā.
anya-e0601n:401_16: Atha vā dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhāti sajjano etāyāti dayā,
anya-e0601n:401_17: dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi etāyāti vā dayā,
anya-e0601n:401_18: dayanti gaṇhanti bodhisattā sammāsambodhiṃ etāyāti vā dayā,
anya-e0601n:401_19: bodhisattā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇa kāle hatthagatampi aggaphalaṃ chaṭṭetvā mahākaruṇāya saṃsārasāgarato
anya-e0601n:401_20: satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsa karaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhañca pacchimabhave saha amata dhātupaṭilābhena
anya-e0601n:401_22: Dayati dadāti sattānaṃ abhayaṃ etāyāti dayā, mettā.
anya-e0601n:401_24: Dayati gacchati vibhāgaṃ akatvā sattesu samaṃ pavattatīti dayā.
anya-e0601n:401_25: Yathā udakaṃ sabbasattesu sītena samaṃ pharati rajomalañca pavāheti,
anya-e0601n:401_26: evaṃ mettā pāpakalyāṇajanesu vibhāgaṃ akatvā samaṃ pavattatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:402_2: sayaṃ vā anuddayati anuddayamattameva vā etanti dayā,
anya-e0601n:402_4: Tāya ālayati patiṭṭhati etthāti dayālayo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:402_5: Bhagavā hi devadattādīsu virodhi sattesu ca avirodhisattesu orase rāhule ca samaṃ niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatāya mahākaruṇāya mettāya ca ṭhito,
anya-e0601n:405_2: Dukkaranti dukkhena karitabbaṃ pañcamahāpariccāgādikammaṃ dukkhena karitabbanti dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0601n:405_9: Tattha hatthiassa dāsidāsādi saviññāṇakassa dhanassa vā muttāmaṇirajatādi aviññāṇakassa dhanassa vā pariccāgo dhanapariccāgo nāma.
anya-e0601n:405_11: Puttassa ca dhītuyā ca pariccāgo puttapariccāgo nāma.
anya-e0601n:405_14: Kiñcāpi pana dhanapariccāgā dayo dānapāramiyaṃyeva antogadhā,
anya-e0601n:405_15: tathāpi pariccāga visesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca mahāpariccāgavasena visuṃ katanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0601n:405_22: Tathāpi pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca mahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:406_7: Bahūhi ūmivegādīhi bhayehi okiṇṇo viya tividhopi bhavo bahūhi jātijarāmaraṇādīhi dukkhabhayehi okiṇṇo hoti,
anya-e0601n:406_10: Tassa hi gambhīre mahāudakakkhandhe mahāsamudde udakaṃ abbocchinnaṃ pavattati sandatiiva tibhavasaṅkhate
anya-e0601n:406_11: saṃsāre paṭisandhicutiyo abbocchinnaṃ nibbattakānaṃ diyaḍḍhasahassakilesānaṃ bodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena
anya-e0601n:406_12: asesaṃ viddhaṃsitattā tīsu bhavesu punabbhavo natthi.
anya-e0601n:406_13: Tasmā buddhaṃ bhavaṇṇavātikkamanti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:407_2: Tathā hesa ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatantiādīsu ādimhi dissati.
anya-e0601n:407_3: Teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyyātiādīsu koṭiyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:407_4: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetuntiādīsu koṭṭhāse.
anya-e0601n:407_7: Devamanussānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:407_8: Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena asamasamaṭṭhena ca aggo seṭṭho nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:407_9: Atha vā dullabhapātu bhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyaasahāyādibhāvato ca bhagavā loke aggo seṭṭho nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:407_10: Vuttañhi aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā,
anya-e0601n:408_1: Ettha ca lokasaddassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:408_10: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ekapaṭisaraṇo nāmāti attho.
anya-e0601n:409_2: Tattha yācane nāthati yācatīti nātho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:409_4: So pana veneyyasatte attano hitakaraṇe yācitvāpi niyojetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:409_5: Atha vā bhagavā sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyātiādinā sattānaṃ taṃ
anya-e0601n:409_6: taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācitvāpi karuṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
anya-e0601n:409_8: Upatāpe nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpetīti nātho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:409_11: Paramena pana cittissariyena samannāgato bhagavā sabbasatte dhammena isati abhibhavatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:409_13: Veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ mettāya navasena patthetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:410_1: Saṃsamaṃ ādhiyati ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme ṭhapeti etenāti samādhi.
anya-e0601n:410_8: Catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi acalamāno mahāmerupabbato viya bhagavā lābhālābhādilokadhammehi ca micchāvāda
anya-e0601n:410_9: vātehi ca acalamānena samādhinā samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:411_6: Hitadharanti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthāya uttara padalopena hitanti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:411_10: Yathā ca byādhiyā osamaṃ rogīnaṃ hitanti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:411_14: Yathā ca rudhiramaṃsādi dhātu vaḍḍhanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kissānaṃ hitanti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:411_17: So pana dhammadesanāya veneyyajanānaṃ dukkhāpanayanampi ñāṇaparipācanampi katvā lokiyalokuttarahitasukhaṃ dhāretīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:412_5: Tattha addasaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhave buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokentoti idaṃ buddhacakkhu nāma.
anya-e0601n:412_6: Virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhunti idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggatta yasaṅkhātaṃ dhammacakkhu nāma.
anya-e0601n:412_8: Samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇanti idaṃ samantacakkhu nāma.
anya-e0601n:412_9: Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhave dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenāti idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma.
anya-e0601n:417_1: Tassa tathāgatassa addiṭṭhaṃ apassantaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ idhaloke na atthi.
anya-e0601n:417_2: Atho aviññātaṃ aviditaṃ apākaṭaṃ vā ajānitabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ na atthi.
anya-e0601n:417_4: Sabbaṃ taṃ dhammajātaṃ tathāgato abhiññāsi paṭivijjhi.
anya-e0601n:418_0: Paṇamāmi taṃmitanti ettha paṇamāmi taṃ amitanti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:418_1: Amitaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ paṇamāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:418_2: Tattha amitanti aparimeyyaṃ ñāṇena aparicchinnaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:418_8: Yathā hi mahāsamudde na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā,
anya-e0601n:418_12: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0601n:418_13: evameva buddhassa na sukaraṃ sīlādiguṇassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ ettakaṃ sīlaguṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:418_16: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāguṇakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0601n:426_3: dukkaraṃ dukkhena karitabbaṃ pañcamahāpariccāgādikammaṃ karaṃ karontaṃ,
anya-e0601n:433_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni pāramisañcayaṃ cayantyādīhi pañcahi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo
anya-e0601n:433_3: Ayaṃ pana jatajara gaṇehi yuttattā dvādasakkharehi lakkhitā sabbapādādyantayamakā vaṃsaṭṭhagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:434_0: Tattha tahiṃ tahinti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave attabhāve vā,
anya-e0601n:434_1: buddhavaraṃ paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya tesu tesu bhavesu attabhāvesu vāti attho.
anya-e0601n:434_3: Ettha ca pāramī nāma dānasīlanekkhammapaññā vīriya khantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāvasena dasavidhā hoti.
anya-e0601n:437_2: Tassa ayaṃ bhāvo kammanti vā pāramī,
anya-e0601n:437_9: Pare satte mavati attani bandhati guṇavisesayogenāti vā paramo,
anya-e0601n:437_12: Paraṃ atirekaṃ majjati kilesamalatoti vā paramo.
anya-e0601n:437_15: Paraṃ seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchatīti vā paramo.
anya-e0601n:437_19: Paraṃ lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇa visesena idhalokamiva munāti paricchindatīti vā paramo.
anya-e0601n:437_21: Paraṃ ati viya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipatīti vā paramo.
anya-e0601n:437_24: Paraṃ attabhūtadhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti vā paramo,
anya-e0601n:437_30: Api ca pāre nibbāne majjati sujjhatīti pāramī,
anya-e0601n:437_33: Pārasaddūpapada majadhātu saṃsuddhiyaṃ kvi. Ī ca.
anya-e0601n:437_34: Pāre nibbāne satte majjati sodhetīti vā pāramī,
anya-e0601n:438_0: Pārenibbāne satte mavati bandhati yojetīti vā pāramī.
anya-e0601n:438_1: Pāraṃ nibbānaṃ mayati gacchati satte ca māyeti gameti vā pāramī.
anya-e0601n:438_2: Pāraṃ nibbānaṃ yāthāvato munāti paricchindatīti vā pāramī.
anya-e0601n:438_3: Pāre nibbāne satte minoti pakkhipatīti vā pāramī.
anya-e0601n:438_5: Pāre nibbāne sattānaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti vā pāramī,
anya-e0601n:438_7: Tassa ayaṃ bhāvo kammanti dānādikriyā pāramīti.
anya-e0601n:438_9: Kiñcāpi pana pāramīsaddassa nibbacanaṃ saṅkhepena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:438_10: Sotūnaṃ pana niruttinayakosallatthaṃ vitthārena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:439_3: Tattha saviññāṇāviññāṇakaṃ dhanaṃ pariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasapāramiyo nāma.
anya-e0601n:439_4: Hattha pāda kaṇṇa nāsādiaṅgapaccaṅgapariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasaupapāramiyo nāma.
anya-e0601n:439_5: Jīvitindriyapariccāgaṃ katvā pūritā bodhisambhārā dasa paramatthapāramiyo nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:439_7: Avayavaṃ saṅgahavasena cayati gacchati pavattatīti sañcayo,
anya-e0601n:440_5: Santehīti vattabbe smāhismiṃnaṃ mhā bhimhivāti suttena hivibhattiyā bhikāraṃ santasaddassa so bhe bo
anya-e0601n:440_6: canteti suttena bhakāre pare santasaddassa sakāraṃ katvā ante ca bakārāgamaṃ katvā sabbhīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:440_10: Tañhi devamanussehi gamiyati upagamiyati upasaṅkamiyatīti gatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:440_11: Taṃ buddhaṃ atthakāmehi sappurisehi devamanussehi sīlādianantaguṇikattā saraṇanti abhimānā payirupāsitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:440_16: tassa pajjati tiṭṭhati etthāti sukhappadaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:440_18: Tañhi buddhādīhi ariyehi pajjiyati gamiyatīti padanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:440_20: Dukkhādiasammissassa ekantasukhassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena apāpuṇinti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:441_3: narīyati sakena kammena niyatīti vā naro, manusso, satto vā.
anya-e0601n:442_6: Atha vā suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:442_8: Sambhavati sukhasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ anena puññenāti sambhavaṃ,
anya-e0601n:442_14: Taṃ sukhasambhavaṃ bhāveti nibbattetīti bhavo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:442_16: So hi mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamāya dhammadesanāya devamanussānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhassa labhanakāraṇabhūtaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ puññaṃ kāreti,
anya-e0601n:442_17: tasmā bhagavato narānarānaṃ sukhasambhavaṃ bhavanti thometīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:443_7: Tato namaṃ patimhālutte ca samāseti sutte samabhiniviṭṭhena caggahaṇena naṃvacanassa aṃ ādesañca goiccetassa
anya-e0601n:443_13: Jinapuṅgavanti jayantapurisuttamaṃ buddhaṃ name namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:443_14: Ettha ca puṅgava saddo kammadhārayasamāse seṭṭhatthavācako.
anya-e0601n:446_1: Kammadhārayasamāse uttarapade vattamānā byagghapuṅgavosabhakuñjarā byagghapuṅgavausabhakuñjarasaddā ca
anya-e0601n:446_2: sīha saddūlanāgādyā sīha saddūla nāgāsaddā ca pume seṭṭhattha vācakāti.
anya-e0601n:446_4: Go viya buddhaguṇe ajānante anamante aññadiṭṭhike bāle jināti ajinīti vā jino.
anya-e0601n:446_5: Pakaṭṭhabhāvaṃ padhānabhāvaṃ vā uddhaṃ gacchatīti puṅgavo.
anya-e0601n:446_8: Tassa kavaggantaṃ dhātvantalopañca yadādinā katvā rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:446_9: Jino ca so puṅgavo cāti jinapuṅgavo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:446_10: So pana gunnaṃ viya buddhānaṃ sīlādike appameyyaguṇe ajānantānaṃ anamantānaṃ agāravantānaṃ avandantānaṃ
anya-e0601n:446_11: añña diṭṭhigatikānaṃ bālānaṃ asatthena pāramīpuññatejena ajinīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:447_10: sukhasambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhassa kāraṇaṃ tividha sukhassa labhanakāraṇabhūtaṃ puññaṃ vā bhavaṃ nibbattentaṃ,
anya-e0601n:447_12: gavaṃ goṇasadisānaṃ bālānaṃ jinapuṅgavaṃ jayantapurisuttamaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:454_1: Evaṃ navamagāthāya buddhaṃ natvā idāni bahū satte tibhavasaṅkhātā saṃsārasamuddato tārentena guṇena ca
anya-e0601n:454_2: sattānaṃ dukkhappahānena guṇena ca thomitvā buddhaṃ vanditu kāmo maggaṅganāvantyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:454_3: Ayaṃ pana tata jara gaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi yuttā indavaṃsa gāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:454_4: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “sāyindavaṃsā khalu yattha tā jarā”ti.
anya-e0601n:455_1: Yattha yassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tā tagaṇadvayañca jarā jagaṇa ragaṇā ca ce siyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:455_2: sā gāthā khalu ekantaṃ indavaṃsagāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:456_1: Yo buddha saṅkhāto cheko nāvājeṭṭhakoti attho.
anya-e0601n:456_2: Tattha munīti ubho loke munāti jānātīti muni, bhagavā.
anya-e0601n:456_7: Vuttañhi ekanipāte vaṇṇapathajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:456_8: Kāya moneyyādīsu vā aññatarena samannāgatattā puggalo munīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:457_1: Samuddataraṇe dakkhati kusalattaṃ gacchatīti dakkho, nāviko.
anya-e0601n:457_3: Atha vā dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho,
anya-e0601n:457_7: Nītatthena pana buddho sattānaṃ saṃsārasamuddato uddhāraṇassa kāraṇaṃ dakkhati paricchindati ñāṇenāti dakkhoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:457_12: Nītatthena pana buddho nibbānaṃ pāraṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya taratīti nāvikoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:457_16: Atha vā dakkhanāviko viya dakkho munīti munidakkhanāviko, buddho.
anya-e0601n:457_18: Yathā hi samuddataraṇe cheko nāviko manusse samuddapāraṃ neti,
anya-e0601n:457_19: evaṃ buddho veneyyasatte nibbānapāraṃ netīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:458_3: Kilese mārento ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti maggo.
anya-e0601n:458_5: Mārenta goti vattabbe niruttinayena maggoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:458_6: Atha vā nibbānaṃ maggati gavesatīti maggo.
anya-e0601n:458_9: Ekantato jāti jarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi dukkhakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇatthāya maggitabbo gavesitabboti maggo,
anya-e0601n:458_11: Vuttañhi “maggoti kenaṭṭhena nibbānaṃ magganaṭṭhena nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena cā”ti.
anya-e0601n:458_15: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappa sammāvācā sammākammanta sammāājīva sammāvāyāma sammāsati sammāsamādhivasena aṭṭhamaggaṅgaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:458_18: Atha vā orato pāraṃ netīti nāvā,
anya-e0601n:458_22: Atha vā nāvā viya maggaṅganti maggaṅga nāvā.
anya-e0601n:458_23: Yathā hi nāvā attani āruḷhe manusse samudda nadīpāraṃ neti,
anya-e0601n:458_24: evaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgadhammā attānaṃ paṭipajjante nibbāna pāraṃ nentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:459_3: Īhati vāyamati cetayati etenāti vā īhā, vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:459_8: Atha vā phāyati gacchati nāvaṃ etenāti phiyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:459_14: Yathā hi phiyena nāvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0601n:459_15: evaṃ īhāsaṅkhātena vīriyena taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0601n:459_21: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karotīti karo, hattho.
anya-e0601n:460_7: Ettha hi aghasaddo dukkhe kilese ca vattati.
anya-e0601n:460_8: Tattha hi dukkhaṃ aghayati dukkhayatīti aghanti ca,
anya-e0601n:460_9: aghayati dukkhākārena pavattatīti vā aghanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0601n:460_10: Kileso pana aghayanti pāpaṃ karonti sattā etenāti aghoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:460_14: Buddho veneyyasattānaṃ dukkhañca kilesañca dhammadesanāya apanetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:460_15: Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe dukkhassa appahātabbadhammattā maggena appahātabbampi phalūpacārena dukkhappajahantanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:460_16: Tanti munidakkhanāvikaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:461_1: Yo munidakkhanāviko yo buddhasaṅkhāto cheko nāvājeṭṭhako,
anya-e0601n:461_2: maggaṅganāvaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha ārohitvā īhāphiyaṃ vīriyasaṅkhātaṃ dabbisārakaṃ,
anya-e0601n:461_4: gāhako daḷhaṃ gaṇhamāno hutvā tāya aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya,
anya-e0601n:461_7: buddhaṃ paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ aghappahaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaviddhaṃsentaṃ kilesa viddhaṃsentaṃ vā taṃ munidakkhanāvikaṃ ahaṃ name namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:468_1: Evaṃ dasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni samatiṃ satipāramisambharaṇādīhi pañcahi guṇehi thomitvā jinaṃ
anya-e0601n:468_3: Ayaṃ pana catūhi sagaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi yuttā toṭakagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:468_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ ambudhisehi catūhi sagaṇehi mitaṃ pamitaṃ racitaṃ lakkhitaṃ vā vuttaṃ idha jagatichande toṭakaṃ nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:469_4: Tāsaṃ pana viseso pāramisaddassa ca vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:469_8: Dīpaṅkarabuddhassa pādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato paṭṭhāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni samatiṃsapāramiyo pūrayitthāti attho.
anya-e0601n:469_11: Ettha ca varabodhisaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:469_12: Davati gacchati mūlakhandhatacasākha viṭapa pallava phalehi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullaṃ rajata suvaṇṇamaṇi santā rucīhi atisobhanaṃ vā pāpuṇātīti dumo,
anya-e0601n:469_13: bodhisattassa vijātadivaseyeva bodhisattena saddhiṃ saha jāto satahatthubbedho asatthadumarājā labbhati.
anya-e0601n:469_16: Dumati pūreti ākāsatalanti vā dumo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:469_18: varabodhi ca so dumo cāti varabodhidumo, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0601n:470_5: Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānātiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0601n:470_6: Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthītiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca,
anya-e0601n:470_12: Yathā hi aggīnaṃ sabhāvo ekantaṃ uṇhoyeva hoti,
anya-e0601n:470_14: evaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādi sabhāvaṃ ekantaṃ saccaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:470_19: Tattha dukkhasaccanti dukkhacchitaṃ khaṃ tucchanti dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:470_28: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:471_0: Samudayasaccanti ayati pavattati dukkhaphalaṃ etenāti ayo, lobho.
anya-e0601n:471_2: Saṃ avasesa paccayasaṃyoge sati u dukkhuppattiyā ayo kāraṇoti samudayo.
anya-e0601n:471_4: Vutteñhetaṃ sacca vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃiti ca ayaṃsaddo samāgamo sametantiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0601n:471_8: Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:471_14: Natthi tebhūmikavaṭṭadhammassa rodho caraṇaṃ etthāti nirodho, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:471_15: Atha vā nirujjhati saṃsāradukkhaṃ etthāti nirodho, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:471_17: Vuttañhetaṃ saccavibhaṅgaṭṭha kathāyaṃ “tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā nisaddo abhāvaṃ.
anya-e0601n:471_19: Tasmā abhāvo ettha saṃsāra cārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā.
anya-e0601n:471_20: Samadhi gate vā tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:471_22: Nirodho ca so saccañcāti nirodhasaccaṃ. Nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:471_23: Maggasaccanti dukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ maggati gacchati etenāti maggo.
anya-e0601n:471_26: Vuttañhetaṃ sacca vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena
anya-e0601n:472_13: Etesu pana catūsu saccesu paṭhamatatiyasaccāni phalāni honti.
anya-e0601n:473_0: Api ca kho pana dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ gambhīrañceva duddasañcāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:473_1: Ekekassa pana saccassa catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena soḷasa saccaṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0601n:473_2: Tena vuttaṃ paṭisambhidā maggapāḷiyaṃ “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho,
anya-e0601n:473_3: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0601n:473_6: ime cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0601n:473_9: ime cattāro nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0601n:473_12: ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0601n:474_4: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ assāti catusaccadaso, jino.
anya-e0601n:474_5: Atha vā cattāri saccāni adassi apassīti catusaccadaso, jino.
anya-e0601n:474_6: So cattāri saccāni catumaggañāṇena appaṭivijjhīti attho.
anya-e0601n:474_10: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati,
anya-e0601n:474_11: paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
