anya-e0601n:474_16: Catusaccapaṭivedhañāṇaṃ pana anubodhañāṇena vinā na pavattati,
anya-e0601n:474_17: tasmā anubodha ñāṇatthāya pubbe catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ paṇḍitena samārambhi tabbanti.
anya-e0601n:474_18: Nanu ca ariyasāvakā cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0601n:474_20: Bhagavā pana ariyasāvakehi visiṭṭhena anaññopadesena arahattamaggañāṇena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0601n:474_22: Tattha pana ṭhapetvā taṇhañca nibbānañca avasesadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:476_0: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato”ti.
anya-e0601n:477_2: Atha vā uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtanti attho.
anya-e0601n:477_6: Vuttañhi visuddhimagge “tathā nekkhammaṃ ijjhatīti iddhīti ca arahattamaggo ijjhatīti iddhī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:477_7: Atha vā ijjhanti sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi,
anya-e0601n:477_8: aṭṭhasamāpattiyo ca cattāro maggā ca labbhanti.
anya-e0601n:477_10: Atha vā tapaccayo itthiliṅgajotako īpaccayo ca.
anya-e0601n:477_12: Atha vā gacchati patiṭṭhahati etthāti gato,
anya-e0601n:477_13: varānaṃ uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ gato patiṭṭhānabhūtoti varamiddhigato, jino.
anya-e0601n:477_16: buddhā pana visesato etāya abhiññāya iddhā samiddhā vuddhā atiukkaṃsagatā honti,
anya-e0601n:477_17: tasmā buddhoyeva varamiddhigatanti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:478_0: Naradevahitanti manussadevānaṃ lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ hitaṃ payojanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:478_3: Punabbhavābhinibbattiyā abhāvato kāmarūpaarūpasaṅkhātehi tīhi bhavehi tīsu bhavesu punabbhavābhinibbattito vā upasamitaṃ nibbutaṃ niruddhanti attho.
anya-e0601n:478_8: Bhagavato pana bodhipallaṅkeva kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakānaṃ avijjātaṇhāmūlakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:478_9: puññādisaṅkhārānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇena niravasesaṃ pahīnattā punabbhavābhinibbatti natthi.
anya-e0601n:478_10: Tasmā bhagavantaṃyeva visesena tibhavūpasamanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:478_12: Paṇamāmīti ahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittena ādaraṃ vandāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0601n:479_3: catusaccadasaṃ cattāri ariyasaccāni maggañāṇena passantaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:479_4: varamiddhigataṃ uttamaṃ atīta buddhānaṃ iddhipattaṃ uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:479_7: kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu punabbhavā bhinibbattito upasamitaṃ nibbutaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:479_8: jinaṃ pañcamārajayantaṃ buddhaṃ paṇamāmi ahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittena ādaraṃ vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:486_1: Evaṃ ekādasamagāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni satapuññajalakkhaṇikantyādīhi chahi guṇehi thomitvā jinaṃ
anya-e0601n:486_3: Ayaṃ pana catūhi sa gaṇehi racitattā dvādasakkharehi yuttā toṭakagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:487_0: Tattha satapuññajalakkhaṇikanti anekapāramīpuññatejena jātena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇena sampannaṃ.
anya-e0601n:487_8: Taṃ assa atthīti satapuññajalakkhaṇiko, jino. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:487_9: Bhagavā hi anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ.
anya-e0601n:487_10: Ettakehi janehi kataṃ puññakammaṃ bodhisatto ekova ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbattena pāramīpuññatejena
anya-e0601n:487_11: jātehi dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asītianubyañjana lakkhaṇe hi ca sampannoti satapuññajalakkhaṇikanti
anya-e0601n:488_0: “Satapuñña lakkhaṇoti anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:488_1: ettakehi janehi katakammaṃ bodhisatto sayameva eko sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto.
anya-e0601n:488_3: Keci pana satena satena puññakammena nibbattaṃ ekekalakkhaṇoti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:488_4: Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0601n:488_6: Pātheyyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sata puññalakkhaṇanti satena satena puññakammena nibbattaṃ ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:488_7: Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyāti na rocayiṃsu.
anya-e0601n:488_8: Anantesu pana cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ kammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ.
anya-e0601n:488_9: Ettakehi janehi kataṃ kammaṃ bodhisatto ekova ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto.
anya-e0601n:489_6: Jino hi bodhipallaṅkeyeva sabbakilesamāra rajassa jayitattā vigatarajoti attho.
anya-e0601n:489_20: taṃ sadisaṃ dhī sabbaññutañāṇaṃ yassāti gaganūpamadhi, jino.
anya-e0601n:489_25: Yathā hi ākāso anantoti vuttattā ākāso ananto hutvā vittharati,
anya-e0601n:489_26: evaṃ bhagavato anantaṃ buddhañāṇanti vuttattā sabbaññutañāṇassa anantārammaṇattā ca ñāṇaṃ anantaṃ hutvā vittharati.
anya-e0601n:490_2: Dhiyati ṭhapiyati sampayuttadhamme ekārammaṇe etenāti dhiti,
anya-e0601n:490_11: uttarapassaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ hotīti vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:490_12: Atha vā mināti hiṃsati sabbe pabbate attano uccataraṭṭhenāti meru,
anya-e0601n:490_13: merunā samo dhiti samādhi yassāti dhitimerusamo, jino.
anya-e0601n:490_15: Yathā hi merurājā aṭṭhahi disāhi āgatehi vātehi na kampati na calati,
anya-e0601n:490_16: evaṃ jino kāmacchandādinīvaraṇe pajahitvā lokuttarajjhānasamādhinā samannāgatattā aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi
anya-e0601n:490_17: ca micchādiṭṭhivātehi ca na kampati na calatīti dhitimerusamanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:491_6: Jalajena padumena upamaṃ sadisanti jalajūpamaṃ, sīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:491_9: Atha vā sītaguṇaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti sītalaṃ, sīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:491_11: Udake pana jātaṃ padumaṃ udakena uṇhassa samitattā sītalaṃ viya.
anya-e0601n:491_12: Sīlaṃ pana buddhassa kilesatā panassa sametattā accantasītalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:491_13: Surakkhitañhi visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ kilesappahānena sattānaṃ kilesapariḷāhaṃ upasameti na haritacandanaṃ muttāhāro maṇi udakaṃ vāto candakiraṇo ca.
anya-e0601n:492_0: “Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
anya-e0601n:493_0: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā;
anya-e0601n:496_1: Surakkhitaṃ suṭṭhurakkhitaṃ ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ accantasītalaṃ idaṃ sīlaṃ idhaloke sattānaṃ yaṃ pariḷāhaṃ sameti,
anya-e0601n:496_2: taṃ pariḷāhaṃ sajaladā udakadadena meghena saha pavattā vātā sītavātā na samayanti haritacandanañcāpi na samayati.
anya-e0601n:496_6: Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:496_8: Atha vā sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:496_9: sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti ābhuso dhārenti sādhavoti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:496_19: Jalajūpamena padumasadisena sītalena accantasītalena sīlena asaṅkhyeyyasīlena yuttoti jalajūpamasītalasīlayuto, jino.
anya-e0601n:496_21: Yathā hi udake jātaṃ padumaṃ jalena sītalaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:496_22: evaṃ bhagavato maggasīlena kilesupatāpanassa pahīnattā taṃ sītalaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:496_23: Tena sampayuttoti jalajūpamasītalasīla yutanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:497_0: Pathavīsahananti pathavī viya khantisampannaṃ khantivantaṃ vā.
anya-e0601n:497_1: Pathanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha tarupabbatādayoti pathavī, bhūmi.
anya-e0601n:497_3: Atha vā puthu hutvā jātanti pathavī.
anya-e0601n:497_9: Pathavī viya sahanaṃ khamanaṃ yassa soti pathavīsahano, jino.
anya-e0601n:497_11: Yathā hi pathavī attano upari pakkhittaṃ sucimpi asucimpi sabbaṃ sahati,
anya-e0601n:497_13: evaṃ jino iṭṭhārammaṇampi aniṭṭhārammaṇampi sabbaṃ sahati,
anya-e0601n:497_14: na tattha paṭighānunayaṃ karotīti pathavīsahananti thometīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0601n:499_0: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:501_9: jinaṃ pañcamāravijayaṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ paṇamāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:508_1: Evaṃ dvādasamagāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni tāvatiṃsapure mātudevaputtappamukhānaṃ upapattidevānaṃ abhidhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:508_2: desaka guṇena abhitthavitvā vanditukāmo yo buddho sumatityādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:508_3: Ayaṃ pana ma na ja ra gaṇehi ca ekagarunā ca tīhi yatīhi ca dasahi yatīhi ca racitattā terasakkhara saṃyuttā pahassiṇīgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:508_4: Vuttañhetaṃ vuttodaye “mnā jarā go tidasayatippahassiṇī sā”ti.
anya-e0601n:509_1: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ mnā magaṇa nagaṇā ca jarā ja gaṇa ragaṇā ca go garu ca tidasayati tiyati ca dasayati ca ce siyā,
anya-e0601n:509_3: Tattha sumati yo buddho dhammaṃ devānaṃ adesīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:511_0: Sabbanāmanti etesu, na kato viggaho chasū”ti.
anya-e0601n:512_5: yātabbo ñātabbo etena aniyamatthoti vā yo.
anya-e0601n:512_13: Adesi dhammaṃ devānanti vuccamānattā hi idha sabbaññuta ñāṇaṃ sumatīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:512_14: Manati jānāti sabbañeyyadhammaṃ desetabbadhammaṃ vāti mati.
anya-e0601n:512_17: sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvajānanasamatthaṃ tesaṃ dese tabbappakārajānanasamatthaṃ bodhetabbapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0601n:512_19: Sumatīti iminā hi sabbaññutañāṇameva abhidhammakathāya samuṭṭhānabhāve samatthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:512_20: Nāññanti imamatthaṃ dīpento abhidhammakathāya anaññasādhāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:512_21: Sundarā mati assa asmiṃ vā atthīti sumati, buddho.
anya-e0601n:512_25: Vuttañhi pārājikaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:513_7: Atha vā divā divase karo raṃsi assāti divākaro.
anya-e0601n:513_13: Bhagavā hi chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi asītyānubyañjanalakkhaṇehi ca devānaṃ majjhe sobhati virocatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:514_1: pāricchattakamūle jāte nikkhitte vā dīghato saṭṭhiyojane vitthārato paṇṇāsa yojane puthulato pannarasayojane
anya-e0601n:514_2: vaṇṇato jayasumanapupphasadise rattakampalavaṇṇe vā saṇhasukhume paṇḍukampa lanāmake silāsane.
anya-e0601n:514_6: Atha vā āgantvā seviyati etthāti āsanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:514_11: Āsīnoti dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devānaṃ gaṇena parivārito hutvā nisīdanto.
anya-e0601n:514_14: Abhidhammakathābhimukhaṃ sīdati nisajjatīti vā āsīno, buddho.
anya-e0601n:514_23: Atha vā rāgaggiādīhi samati upasamati etthāti sivaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:514_31: Atha vā suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:515_0: Adesi dhammaṃ devānanti devānaṃ dhammaṃ adesīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:515_1: Ettha ca dhammanti nānānayavicittaṃ gambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ duddasaṃ abhidhamma dhammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:515_3: paṇḍitehi dhāriyati na bālehīti vā dhammo,
anya-e0601n:518_0: Ettha ca mātarantipadassa pubbe manussaloke mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:519_0: “Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna, gatā mātā sakaṃ gharaṃ;
anya-e0601n:521_0: Taṭṭīkāyañca “bodhisattamātā gabbhavuṭṭhānato sattame divase kālaṅkatvā tusitapure devaputto hutvā nibbattī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:521_2: Kāḷudāyī theragāthāaṭṭhakathāyañca “parivāritāti ca itthiliṅganiddeso purimattabhāvasiddhaṃ itthibhāvaṃ devatābhāvaṃ vā sandhāya kato.
anya-e0601n:521_4: Jātakaṭīkāyañca “devorohaneti mātudevaputtassa temāsaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desetvā devorohanakāle”ti mātudevaputtasaddena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:521_7: Sirīmahāmāyāsatthe ca “sirīmahāmāyā devīpi sattadivaseyeva vasitvā kālaṅkatvā attano puññānubhāvena tusitabhavane
anya-e0601n:521_9: Maṇidīpaṭīkāyañca “mātaranti pubbe manussaloke mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho.
anya-e0601n:521_10: Sirīmahāmāyā hi bodhisattaṃ vijāyitvā sattāhamattaṃ ṭhatvā ito cavitvā tusitabhavane purisabhāveneva nibbatto,
anya-e0601n:521_12: Tasmā mātarantipadassa mātubhūtaṃ devaputtanti attho mukhyena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:531_0: Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “parivāritāti ca itthiliṅganiddeso purimatta bhāvasiddhaṃ itthibhāvaṃ devatābhāvaṃ vā sandhāya kato.
anya-e0601n:531_1: Devūpapatti pana purisabhāvena jātāti vuttattā mātaranti manussattabhāvavasena vutta”nti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:531_4: Patthanākāle ca buddhamātā hutvā pacchā puriso homīti patthanā natthi.
anya-e0601n:531_6: Tasmā taṃ vīmaṃsitabbantipi vidū vadantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:531_8: saṃsayavacanena vīmaṃsitabbanti vidūvadantīti ca vuttattā ca yathāvuttaṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehi ujukaṃ viruddhattā ca.
anya-e0601n:531_9: Devatāsaddo hi devaputte brahme devadhītāya ca vattati.
anya-e0601n:531_10: Tathāhesa “atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu devaputte.
anya-e0601n:531_19: Sunītattheraapadāna pāḷiyaṃ āgatāsu “tathā tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā”tiādīsu brahme.
anya-e0601n:533_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti.
anya-e0601n:534_2: Tasmā ācariyadhammapālattherena katāya theraṭṭhakathāya vuttavacanaṃ jātakaṭīkāya vuttavacanañca ācariyasumaṅgalattherena
anya-e0601n:534_3: katāya abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya vuttavacanaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā mātudevaputtoti atthoyeva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:534_4: Etarahi pana keci ācariyā therāpāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ parivāritāsaddañca madhusāratthadīpanīṭīkāvacanañca paṭicca mātudevadhītāti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:534_10: Natthi etassa sadiso paṭipuggaloti asadiso, buddho.
anya-e0601n:534_11: Sadevake loke sīlādiguṇena buddhena sadiso koci puggalo natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:535_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0601n:537_2: Asadisaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ niccaṃ namāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:538_11: devānaṃ mātu pubbadevaputtappamukhānaṃ upapattidevānaṃ adesi kathesi.
anya-e0601n:538_12: Asadisaṃ appaṭipuggalaṃ taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:545_1: Evaṃ terasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni buddhassa pādatale vicittappavattehi aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:545_3: Ayaṃ pana ta bha ja ja gaṇehi ca garudvayena racitattā cuddasakkharehi yuttā vasantatilakāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:545_4: Vuttañhetaṃ vuttodaye “vuttā vasantatilakā ta bha jā jagā go”ti.
anya-e0601n:545_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ ta bha jā ta bha ja gaṇā ca jagā jagaṇagarukā ca go garu ca ce bhavanti,
anya-e0601n:546_0: Tattha pana yo nātho avikalehi nirākulehi pādapaṅkajamuduttalehitīhi lokehi nirupameyyataṃ sampāpuṇeeva
anya-e0601n:546_1: sabbalokamahitaṃ asamaṃ taṃ nāthaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:546_2: Ettha pana saddakkamena adassetvā atthakkamena vaṇṇanaṃ dassayissāma.
anya-e0601n:546_3: Yo nāthoti yo yādiso sabbasattānaṃ paṭisaraṇo buddho.
anya-e0601n:546_4: Taṃ pana padaṃ sampāpuṇeevātipade kattubhāvena sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:546_6: Avikalehīti kenaci avekallehi sabbapādacakkalakkhaṇehi sampuṇṇehīti attho.
anya-e0601n:546_9: Natthi kiñci vikalaṃ etissā rājiyāti avikalā, pādarāji.
anya-e0601n:546_10: Pādadvaye paribyattaṃ saṇṭhānarūpaṃ kiñci vikalaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:547_4: Atha vā ābhuso kulati āvarati sobhananti ākulaṃ,
anya-e0601n:547_5: natthi ākulaṃ aññamaññamissaṃ etissā pādarāji yāti nirākulā, pādarāji.
anya-e0601n:547_8: Pādapaṅkajamuduttalarājikehīti pādasaṅkhātapadumassa saṇha tale jātehi aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇarājikehi padati gacchati etenāti pādo.
anya-e0601n:547_22: Pādapaṅkaja muduttale jātaṃ aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ rājikanti pādapaṅkajamuduttalarājikaṃ, tehi.
anya-e0601n:548_34: dveparittadīpasahassāni antamaso cakkavatti rañño parisaṃ upādāya sabbo cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāroti
anya-e0601n:549_0: Jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pana “heṭṭhāpādatalesu cakkāni jātānīti cakkalakkhaṇaṃ nāma dvīsu pādatalesu dve cakkāni ekekasmiṃ sahassamattā arā yuttā honti.
anya-e0601n:549_3: Tasmiṃ majjhe ca nābhipariyante ca nābhimukhe ca vaṭṭalekhā majjhe chiddaṃ cakkapariyante nemito bahiddhā vaṭṭe. Satti,
anya-e0601n:549_56: soḷasa brahmalokāti ime ettakā aggamaṅgalalakkhaṇā pādatale paññāyantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:549_57: Iminā ca vacanena aṭṭhasata pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0601n:550_4: Tassa pana padassa nirupameyyāti padena kattubhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:550_10: Atha vā natthi upameyyaṃ etassa rājikassāti nirupameyyo,
anya-e0601n:550_13: Taṃ pana padaṃ sampāpuṇe evātipade kammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:550_16: Kasmā pana tīhi lokehi pādapaṅkajamudutalehi nirupameyyataṃ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0601n:550_17: Buddhato aññassa kassaci devamanussassa pādatalamajjhe pādacakkalakkhaṇassa abhāvato.
anya-e0601n:550_18: Bhagavato hi pādapaṅkajamudutale pāramipuññānubhāvena nibbattāni aṭṭhasatapādacakkalakkhaṇāni sampāpuṇanti,
anya-e0601n:551_1: Sabbena devamanussalokena mahitabbo pūjitabboti sabbaloka mahito,
anya-e0601n:551_3: Uppanne hi tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā buddhassa pūjenti,
anya-e0601n:551_5: Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratana dāmena tathāgataṃ pūjeti.
anya-e0601n:551_6: Yathābalañca aññepi devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājādayo nibbutampi bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ
anya-e0601n:551_7: vissajjetvā asoka mahārājā sakalajambudīpe caturāsītivihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0601n:551_8: Kā kathā pana aññesaṃ pūjāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:552_2: Natthi samo sadiso puggalo assāti asamo, nātho.
anya-e0601n:552_3: So pana asītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍita dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇa vicitrarūpakāyo.
anya-e0601n:552_5: Puññamahatta thāmamahattaiddhimahatta yasamahatta paññāmahattānaṃ paramukkaṃsa gato ca hoti,
anya-e0601n:552_6: tasmā tathāgatena samo sadiso nāma natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:553_1: Yo nātho yo yādiso sabbasattānaṃ paṭisaraṇo buddho,
anya-e0601n:553_4: pādapaṅkaja muduttalarājikehi pādasaṅkhātapadumassa saṇhatale jātehi aṭṭhasatacakkalakkhaṇarājikehi,
anya-e0601n:553_9: asamaṃ sabbamanussadevabrahmehi asadisaṃ taṃ nāthaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:560_1: Evaṃ cuddasamagāthāya nāthaṃ natvā idāni narānarasa mosaraṇantyādīhi sattahi guṇehi thomitvā buddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:560_3: Ayaṃ pana tabhajajagaṇehi garudvayena ca racitattā cuddasakkharehi yuttā vasantatilakāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:561_0: Tattha pana narānarasamosaraṇanti ettha naraanarasamaṃ osaraṇanti padavibhāgo.
anya-e0601n:561_3: Samaṃ avasaranti sannipatanti etthāti samosaraṇo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:561_6: Yathā hi mahānigrodho phalakāmānaṃ sakuṇa samūhānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:561_7: evaṃ buddho lokiya lokuttarasampattikāmānaṃ manussadevānaṃ samosaraṇo sannipatito paṭisaraṇo vā hoti.
anya-e0601n:562_1: Ettha attasaddo attasammā paṇidhi cātiādīsu attasaddo viya cittavācako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:562_2: Dhiyati ṭhapiyati ettha etena vā ekārammaṇe sampayutta dhammāti dhito, samādhi.
anya-e0601n:562_6: Dhitaṃ samāhitaṃ attaṃ cittaṃ yassāti dhitatto, buddho.
anya-e0601n:563_4: Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato sabbapakārehi dhammasabhāvaṃ dīpetīti paññāpadīpo.
anya-e0601n:563_10: ayaṃ pana samāso abhedabhedū pacārena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:564_6: Atha vā andhaṃ paññācakkhuandhaṃ karotīti andhakāro, moho.
anya-e0601n:564_8: Vihato andhakāro yena soti vihatandhakāro, buddho.
anya-e0601n:564_10: Yathā hi loke padīpo attano jutiyā andhakāraṃ hanati,
anya-e0601n:564_11: evaṃ buddhassa arahattamaggapaññāpi avijjandhakāraṃ hanatīti vuttā.
anya-e0601n:564_13: Paññāvato hi ekapallaṅkenapi nisinnassa dasasahassi lokadhātu ekapajjotā hoti.
anya-e0601n:564_21: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imesaṃ catunnaṃ pajjotānaṃ yadidaṃ paññā pajjoto”ti.
anya-e0601n:565_0: Paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāranti ettha pana paññāpadīpa jutiyātiiminā buddhassa arahattamaggañāṇaṃ mukhyena dasseti.
anya-e0601n:565_1: Taṃ dassanena pāramīñāṇañca vipassanāñāṇañca heṭṭhimamaggaphala ñāṇañca phalūpacārena dīpeti.
anya-e0601n:565_4: Taṃ vibhāvanena sabbaññutañāṇādisabbabuddhaguṇalabhanaṃ tatiya kāraṇūpacārena ānubhāveti.
anya-e0601n:566_0: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāratā sambhavati,
anya-e0601n:566_1: atha kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesa guṇena buddhassa thomanā katāti.
anya-e0601n:566_3: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāratte ariyasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ savāsanāya kilesappahānaṃ na vijjati.
anya-e0601n:566_4: Sammāsambuddhānaṃyeva savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayavasena avijjandhakārappahānena
anya-e0601n:567_0: Atthābhikāmanti sattalokassa lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ ativiya icchantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:567_3: Taṃ abhiatirekaṃ kāmeti icchatīti atthābhikāmo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:567_8: Atha vā nariyati sakena kammena niyyatīti naro, manusso.
anya-e0601n:567_20: Buddho hi sabbadevamanussānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasampattiatthaṃ dhammadesanāya dhāretīti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:567_22: Kāruṇikamaggamananta ñāṇanti ettha kāruṇikaṃ aggaṃ anantañāṇantipadacchedo.
anya-e0601n:568_2: Paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:568_3: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
anya-e0601n:568_9: Attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādhatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:568_11: Karuṇā assa atthīti vā kāruṇiko, buddho.
anya-e0601n:568_13: Agganti jātipuñña guṇamahattabhāvena sabbasattuttamaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:568_15: Buddho hi asambhinnakhattiyavaṃse jātattā jātivasena ca pūritapāramīpuññattā puññavasena ca aparimitanirupamasīlādi
anya-e0601n:568_16: guṇavisesena samannāgatattā guṇavasena ca anantalokadhātūsu sabbasattuttamabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aggo.
anya-e0601n:568_18: Atha vā ajeti khepeti kileseti aggo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:568_21: Anantañāṇanti gaṇanavasena ca sabhāvavasena ca visayavasena ca antavirahitañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:568_27: Anantaṃ ñāṇaṃ yassa soti anantañāṇo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:568_28: Buddhassa hi ñāṇaṃ koci manusso vā devo vā brahmā vā ettakanti paricchindituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0601n:568_29: tasmā anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:571_0: Natveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave”ti.
anya-e0601n:572_0: Kāruṇikamaggamanantañāṇanti ettha ca karuṇaggahaṇena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0601n:572_1: mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro
anya-e0601n:572_2: kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni anupubbena pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti
anya-e0601n:572_4: Agganti etena bhagavato aparimitanirupamasīlādiguṇasamaṅgītāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:572_8: Tassa ca sāmatthiyena catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ chaasādhāraṇañāṇāni ca chaabhiññā aṭṭhasu
anya-e0601n:572_9: parisāsu akampana ñāṇāni dasabalañāṇāni soḷasañāṇacariyā ca catucattārīsañāṇavatthūni sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni
anya-e0601n:572_10: cāti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇācāraṃ dassetīti.
anya-e0601n:572_11: Taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ vippasannena cetasā vandāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:573_3: paññāpadīpajutiyā arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhāta padīpobhāsena karaṇabhūtena vihatandhakāraṃ hanitabba avijjāsaṅkhātamohatamaṃ,
anya-e0601n:573_6: kāruṇikaṃ sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya yuttaṃ mahākaruṇavantaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:573_8: ananta ñāṇaṃ gaṇavasena ca sabhāvavasena ca visayavasena ca antavirahitañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:573_9: anantaṃ sabbaññutañāṇavantaṃ vā taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ vippasannena cetasā vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:580_1: Evaṃ pannarasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni isipatana migadāye dhammacakkapavattanādiguṇehi thomitvā
anya-e0601n:580_3: Ayaṃ pana nanamayayagaṇehi racitattā pannarasakkharehi yuttā mālinī gāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:580_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ bhogisīhi aṭṭhasattayatīhi yuttā ca nanamayayayutā nanagaṇamagaṇa yayagaṇehi yuttā ca ce siyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:581_0: Tattha akhilaguṇanidhānoti sabbalokiyalokuttara saṅkhātānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇasamūhānaṃ patiṭṭhāno.
anya-e0601n:581_5: Atha vā na khīyatīti akhilaṃ, sabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:581_17: pacceka munivasena pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indo issaroti attho.
anya-e0601n:581_19: Akhilaguṇanidhāno yo munindo saññatānaṃ niketaṃ isipatanaavhaṃ vanaṃ upagantvā tahiṃ akusalachedaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattoti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:582_2: Tañhi vivekakāmehi vanitabbaṃ sambhajitabbaṃ etthāti vananti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:582_4: Isipatanavhanti isipatananāmikaṃ isīnaṃ patanaṭṭhānattā isipatananti voharitabbaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:582_8: Te patanti sannipatanti etthāti isipatanaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:582_10: Atha vā isīnaṃ patanaṃ isipatanaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:582_22: Nikitati nivasati rammati vā etthāti niketaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:582_27: Akusalaṃ chindati samucchindati etena suttenāti akusalachedaṃ,
anya-e0601n:583_1: Ettha hi cakkasaddo sampattiyaṃ, lakkhaṇe, rathaṅge,
anya-e0601n:583_5: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānantiādīsu hi sampattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0601n:583_9: Dadaṃ bhuñja mā ca pamādo cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇīnanti ettha dāne.
anya-e0601n:583_12: Icchāhatassa posassa cakkaṃ bhamati matthaketi ettha khuracakke.
anya-e0601n:583_16: Tañhi satipaṭṭhānādidhammaṃ cakketi pavattetīti dhammacakkanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:583_18: Atha vā dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ āṇācakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ.
anya-e0601n:583_27: Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhinayasahassehi paṭivijjhi.
anya-e0601n:583_28: Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0601n:583_32: Pavattoti pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbātiādinā adesayi.
anya-e0601n:584_3: Natthi tulo sadiso puggalo etassāti atulo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:584_4: Tassa hi aparimāṇāsu loka dhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi sadiso puggalo natthi.
anya-e0601n:584_6: Abhikantanti sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kantaṃ kamanīyaṃ sarīravaṇṇavantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:584_8: Abhikkantavaṇṇanti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ kakāralopañca vaṇṇapadalopaṃ katvā vuttasandhivasena abhikantanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:584_10: Munindassa pana sarīravaṇṇaṃ sabbadevamanussehi ativiya atirekaṃ vā kamiyati tosiyatīti abhikantanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:584_12: Abhikantaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ yassa soti abhikanto, munindo.
anya-e0601n:584_13: Tassa hi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asītyānubyañjana lakkhaṇehi ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇena
anya-e0601n:584_14: ca samannā gatattā sarīrasobhaggappattito sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kamanīyo tuṭṭho sarīravaṇṇo atthīti
anya-e0601n:585_0: Atha vā devamanussehi vanditabbaṃ thomitabbanti vā vandaneyyo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:585_1: So hi ādimajjhapariyosāna guṇehi samannāgatattā sabbadevamanussānaṃ vandanāraho tehi vā vanditabbo hoti.
anya-e0601n:585_2: Tattha ca ādiguṇaṃ nāma karuṇānidānaṃ sīlaṃ pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito.
anya-e0601n:585_4: Pariyosānaguṇaṃ nāma paññā tato uttari karaṇīyābhāvatoti visesena bhagavato vandaneyyanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:585_5: Ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:586_1: Akhilanidhāno sabba lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇa samūhānaṃ patiṭṭhāno yo yādiso munindo pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indo issaro bhagavā,
anya-e0601n:586_6: upagantvā gamitvā tahiṃ tasmiṃ isipatananāmake migadāya vane,
anya-e0601n:586_11: abhikantaṃ sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kantaṃ kamanīyaṃ tuṭṭhi sarīravaṇṇavantaṃ,
anya-e0601n:586_12: vandaneyyaṃ deva manussānaṃ vandanārahaṃ tehi vā vanditabbaṃ,
anya-e0601n:586_13: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:593_1: Evaṃ soḷasamagāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni suciparivāritantyādīhi sattahi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo suciparivāritantyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:593_2: Ayaṃ pana na jabhajaragaṇehi ca ekagarunā ca racitattā soḷasakkharehi yuttāvāṇinīgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:593_3: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “najabhajarā yadā bhavati vāṇinī gayuttā”ti.
anya-e0601n:593_5: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ najabhajarā nagaṇa jagaṇa bhagaṇa jagaṇa ragaṇā yadā gayuttā pādantagarunā saṃyogā ce siyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:593_6: tadā sā vuttā vāṇinī vāṇinīgāthā nāma bhavatīti.
anya-e0601n:594_0: Tattha suciparivāritanti rāgādimalavisuddhāhi ariyasāvakādiparisāhi parikkhāritaṃ kilesamalavisuddhaṃ parikkhāravantaṃ vā.
anya-e0601n:594_3: Parisamantato ariyabhikkhuādīhi deva manussehi vāriyati parikkhariyatīti parivāro, sugato.
anya-e0601n:594_7: Bhagavato hi sadā rāgādimala visuddhehi ariyabhikkhuādīhi catūhi parisāhi aṭṭhahi parisāhi vā parivārito hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0601n:594_8: Atha vā suciparisuddhaṃ parivāritaṃ yassa soti suciparivārito, sugato.
anya-e0601n:594_9: Surucirappabhāhīti suṭṭhu kantitasarīranikkhanta byāmamattaraṃsīhi karaṇabhūtehi suṭṭhu ruciyati kamiyati tusiyatīti surucirā, raṃsi.
anya-e0601n:594_13: Surucirā ca sā pabhā cāti surucirappabhā,
anya-e0601n:594_18: Ratto kāyo yassa soti ratto, sugato.
anya-e0601n:594_22: Bhagavato hi sarīrato niccaṃ nikkhantehi byāmamattaraṃsīhi rañjitabbo rūpakāyo atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:595_4: katapuññehi vā siyati nissiyatīti sirīti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:595_9: Sirīti issariyanti ca sirīti rūpakāyasampattī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:595_13: Sirīti hi dīghavasena vattabbe gāthābandhattā chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rassavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:595_16: Visanti pavisanti avayavā yasmiṃ samūheti visaro, samūho.
anya-e0601n:595_18: Atha vā visaranti samosaranti avayavā yasminti visaro.
anya-e0601n:595_20: Potthakesu pana visayāla yanti yakārena pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0601n:600_6: Gupitamindriyehupetanti gopitabbehi saṃvaritabbehi cakkhādīhi chahi indriyehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ.
anya-e0601n:600_16: Kiñcāpi buddhato aññehi ariyasāvakādīhi puggalehi cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāni.
anya-e0601n:600_17: Buddhoyeva pana bodhipallaṅke saha vāsanāya sabba kilesānaṃ arahattamaggena viddhaṃsitattā visiṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:600_18: cakkhādi indriyaṃ rakkhito hotīti tassa gupitamindriyehupetanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:601_4: so hi ravati sīghaṃ gacchatīti ravīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:601_12: Abhidhāna ṭīkāyañca “ravanti etena sattā pabhāvitattāti ravī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:601_14: So hi sasati tiṇena pāṇati jīvatīti saso,
anya-e0601n:601_18: Atīte hi sasarājā brāhmaṇavesena āgantvā yācakassa sakkarañño aṅgārarāsimhi laṅghitvā jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kāyaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0601n:601_19: Atha pana sakko rājā tassa sasapaṇḍitassa jīvitapariccajitassa jīvitadānaguṇo sakalakappaṃ pākaṭo hotūti
anya-e0601n:601_20: pabbataṃ pīḷetvā pabbatarasaṃ ādāya candamaṇḍale sasarūpalakkhaṇaṃ likhitvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0601n:601_22: Tassa pana vitthāro sasapaṇḍitajātake passitvā gahetabbo.
anya-e0601n:602_0: Atha vā sasati hiṃsati uṇhaguṇanti sasīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:602_4: Atha vā maṇḍaṃ vibhūsanaṃ parisamantato lāti gaṇhātīti maṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:602_18: tena upacittaṃ ativicitraṃ pādaṃ yassa soti ravisasimaṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇopa citto, sugato.
anya-e0601n:602_19: Atha vā upacittaṃ ativicitraṃ ravisasi maṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇaṃ pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ assāti tathā, sugato. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:603_1: Suranti issariya kīḷādīhi dibbantīti surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:603_3: Atha vā surati isati devissariyaṃ pāpuṇāti virocati cāti surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:603_5: Sundarā rāvācā etesanti vā surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:603_6: Khandhasantānaṃ sakakammaṃ vā naranti niyantīti narā, manussā.
anya-e0601n:603_9: tehi pūjitabboti suranara pūjito, sugato. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:603_11: So hi sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:603_12: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:603_14: dosarahita mavahasita rājahaṃsausabha vāraṇa migarājagamanaṃ kāyagamanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:603_15: Ñāṇagamanañca vipula nimmala karuṇā sati vīriyādi guṇavisesa sahita abhinīhārato yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya sobhanamevāti.
anya-e0601n:604_0: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhi samayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
anya-e0601n:604_1: tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānātisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
anya-e0601n:604_2: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
anya-e0601n:604_3: lokanirodhagāminippaṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhi samayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato,
anya-e0601n:604_5: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugatotiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0601n:604_6: Atha vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0601n:604_7: Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ yuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0601n:604_8: tasmā sammā gadatīti sugato dakārassa takāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0601n:605_1: Suciparivāritaṃ rāgādimala visuddhāhi ariyasāvakādiparisāhi parikkhāritaṃ kilesamalavisuddhaṃ parikkhāravantaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:605_10: sugataṃ buddhaṃ ādaraṃ sakkaccaṃ ahaṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:612_1: Evaṃ sattarasamagāthāya sugataṃ vanditvā idāni saṃsāroghaṃ taritādīhi navahi guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo maggoḷumpenatyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:612_2: Ayaṃ pana ma bha na ta ta gaṇehi ca garudvayena ca racitattā sattarasakkharehi yuttā mandakkantāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:612_3: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mandakkantā ma bha na tata gā go yugutvassa kehī”ti.
anya-e0601n:612_5: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ yugutvassakehi catu cha sattayatīhi ma bha na ta ta gā magaṇa bhagaṇa nagaṇa tagaṇa tagaṇa garū ca go garu ca ce yuttā,
anya-e0601n:612_7: Yugutvassakehīti ettha ca yugasaddassa maggaphalacatubbidhapurisayugaḷavācakattā yugasaddo catusaṅkhyāvācako,
anya-e0601n:612_8: utūnaṃ hemantasisira vassanta gimha vassāna sarada utuvasena chabbidhattā utusaddo chasaṅkhyāvācako.
anya-e0601n:613_0: Tattha pana yo dhammarājā muhapaṭighāsādiullolavīciṃ saṃsāroghaṃ maggoḷumpena tari,
anya-e0601n:613_1: abhayaṃ pārapattaṃ pajānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ asamasaraṇaṃ ekatitthaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ puññakkhettaṃ paramasukhadaṃ taṃ dhammarājaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:613_9: sayaṃ vā paṭihaññati paṭihaññanamattamevetanti paṭigho, doso.
anya-e0601n:613_15: Muho ca paṭigho ca āsā ca muhapaṭighāsā,
anya-e0601n:613_18: Ettha ca ādisaddena māna diṭṭhi vicikicchā thina uddhacca ahirika anottappakilese ca akusalacittuppāde ca saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0601n:614_0: Mūlapaṇṇāsaṭṭhakathāyañca “kullo nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā bandho.
anya-e0601n:614_1: Pattharitvā baddhā pana padaracāṭi ādayo uḷumpo”ti vutto.
anya-e0601n:614_16: Atha vā ullolavīci viya muhapaṭighāsādi ullolavīci,
anya-e0601n:614_19: Yathā pana mahāsamudde bhāyitabbā mahātaraṅgaūmivegādayo ca saṃsumāra timi tipiṅgalādi macchamakārādayo ca okiṇṇā honti,
anya-e0601n:614_20: evaṃ mohādikilesā ca akusalacittuppādā ca tehi nibbattā bhayānakā bahū jātijarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādayo ca khandhādayo ca okiṇṇā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:614_22: Saṃpunappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ vā sarati gacchati pavattatīti saṃsāro.
anya-e0601n:617_0: Satte ottharitvā ajjhottharitvā heṭṭhā hanati haratīti ogho,
anya-e0601n:617_5: Attani patite satte heṭṭhā katvā haneti osīdāpetīti vā ogho,
anya-e0601n:617_10: Atha vā sattasaṅkhāre ottharitvā ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā vaṭṭasmiṃ hanati haratīti ogho,
anya-e0601n:617_11: ohaneti osīdāpeti vaṭṭasmiṃ sattasaṅkhāreti vā ogho,
anya-e0601n:618_3: Magganti gacchanti buddhā ca ariyasāvakā ca agataṃ disaṃ nibbānanti maggo.
anya-e0601n:618_6: Vuttañhi paṭisambhidāmagge “etena maggena buddhā ca sāvakā ca agataṃ disaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchantīti aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
anya-e0601n:618_7: Atha vā nibbānaṃ maggati gavesatīti maggo,
anya-e0601n:618_29: uḷumpo ca maggo ca maggoḷumpoti evaṃ rūpakasadisaupamā samupekkhatthavasena ca parapakkha sakapakkhatthavasena ca vacanattho veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:618_32: Dhammarājā hi aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya saṃsāroghaṃ taritvā nibbānatīraṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0601n:625_1: So hi bhagavā natthi bhayaṃ etassāti abhayoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:625_3: Tañhi nibbānaṃ natthi jātiādibhayaṃ etthāti abhayanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:625_4: Etasmiṃ pana dutiyavikappe taṃ padaṃ pārantipade visesanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:625_5: Pārapattanti ettha pāranti saṃsāravaṭṭassa paratīraṭṭhena vuccati nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:625_9: Atha vā pāreti samattheti taraṅgādayo vāretunti pāraṃ.
anya-e0601n:625_13: Jāti bhayādiṃ pāti rakkhati etthāti pāraṃ,
anya-e0601n:625_14: pāreti samattheti ettha vā jātibhayādayo vāretunti pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:625_18: Atha vā mutto moceyyantiādinā nayena pavattassa mahābhinīhārassa sakalassa saṃsāradukkhassa vā sabbaññutañāṇādiguṇānaṃ
anya-e0601n:625_19: vā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ patto gatoti pārapatto,
anya-e0601n:625_24: Tehi kammakilesehi pakārena janiyati nibbattiyatīti pajāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:626_1: Sattānaṃ saṃsāra bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇo,
anya-e0601n:626_4: Atha vā tāṇanti sattānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato paripālanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:626_5: So hi dhammarājā sattānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato dhammadesanāya magga phalanibbānasukhaṃ dadanto tāyati pāletīti tāṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:626_8: jātibhayādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇo,
anya-e0601n:626_11: Atha vā leṇanti saṃsārabhayaṃ passantehi nilīyanaṭṭhena leṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:626_12: So hi dhammarājā saṃsāranissaraṇatthikehi līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:626_14: Dhammarājā hi saṃsārabhayehi pīḷitānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:627_1: natthi etassa samo sadiso sīlādiguṇenāti asamo,
anya-e0601n:627_9: Dhammarājā hi sabbasampattisukhānaṃ dāyakattā sabbasattānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ asamaṃ saraṇaṃ avassayanaṃ parāyanaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0601n:627_12: Taranti uttaranti ettha etena vā najjasamuddādinti titthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:627_19: Yathā hi titthena najjādiṃ tarantā manussā pārimatīraṃ sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0601n:627_21: evaṃ seṭṭhabhūtena buddhatitthena saṃsāroghaṃ tarantā veneyyasattā nibbānapāraṃ sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0601n:627_24: Nītatthena pana eko seṭṭho hutvā nibbānapāraṃ taranti uttaranti etthāti eka tittho,
anya-e0601n:627_26: Khemaṃ nibbānapāraṃ taritukāmā veneyyasattā ettha buddhatitthe desitadhammaṃ sutvā desitadhammānurūpaṃ
anya-e0601n:627_27: paṭipajjitvā saṃsāroghaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya chinditvā khemaṃ nibbānapāraṃ sukhaṃ taranti,
anya-e0601n:627_28: ititasmā etthātipadena niddiṭṭho so buddho sabbasattānaṃ eko seṭṭho tittho nāma.
anya-e0601n:627_29: Na aññatitthiyā ekatitthā nāma hontīti attho.
anya-e0601n:628_0: Patiṭṭhanti sabbasattānaṃ mahādīpaṃ viya patiṭṭhaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_5: Dhammarājā hi sabbasukhatthikānaṃ sattānaṃ mahādīpo viya patiṭṭho paṭisaraṇo leṇo parāyano hotīti attho,
anya-e0601n:628_9: attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_11: Atha vā paraṃ pujjabhāvaṃ janetīti puññaṃ,
anya-e0601n:628_12: sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_15: Avasesaṃ apuññaṃ punāti sodhetīti vā puññaṃ, kusalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_17: Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṃ, kedārādi.
anya-e0601n:628_19: Bījāni vapantānaṃ manussānaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena bījaṃ rakkhatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:628_20: Atha vā khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti khettaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_24: Nītatthena pana puññabījāni vapantānaṃ sattānaṃ mahapphala bhāvakaraṇena khittaṃ vuttaṃ puññabījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti khetto.
anya-e0601n:628_25: Atha vā nibbānatthikehi puññabījāni khipiyanti vapiyanti etthāti khetto.
anya-e0601n:628_29: Yathā hi rañño vā amaccādīnaṃ vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño vā amaccādīnaṃ vā sālikhettaṃ yavakhettanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:628_30: Evaṃ dhammarājā sabbalokassa puññamahabbalabhāvakaraṇena puññānaṃ virūha naṭṭhānaṃ dhammarājaṃ nissāya
anya-e0601n:628_32: tasmā dhammarājā puññakkhettanti abhitthavitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:629_2: Ettha ca paramasaddo uttamatthavācako anipphannapāṭi padiko.
anya-e0601n:629_3: Atha vā paraṃ atirekaṃ ariyehi mānitabbanti paramaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:629_5: Pakārena ariyehi ramiyati etthāti vā paramaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:629_15: Dhammarājā pana veneyyasattānaṃ dhammadesanāya ca catupaccayappaṭiggahaṇena ca nibbānasukhaṃ detīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:629_18: So hi lokiya lokuttaradhammehi devamanussānaṃ rañjeti tosetīti dhammarājāti.
anya-e0601n:629_19: Atha vā pāramīdhammeneva buddhattaṃ patvā rājā jātoti dhammarājāti.
anya-e0601n:629_20: Pāramīdhammeneva jāto vā rājāti dhammarājāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0601n:630_1: Yo dhammarājā muha paṭighāsādiullolavīciṃ mohadosataṇhādisaṅkhātaṃ mahātaraṅga khuddakaūmikaṃ,
anya-e0601n:630_12: patiṭṭhaṃ sabbasattānaṃ mahādīpaṃ viya patiṭṭhaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0601n:630_16: dhammarājaṃ buddhaṃ lokiyalokuttara dhammehi pajānaṃ rañjāpanaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:637_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasamagāthāya dhammarājaṃ vanditvā idāni sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle iddhipāṭiherādīhi guṇehi
anya-e0601n:637_3: Ayaṃ pana matanayayayagaṇehi ca pañca yati chayati sattaya tīhi ca racitattā aṭṭhārasakkharehi yuttā kusumitalatā vellitāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:637_4: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mo to no yo yā kusumitalatā vellitākkhutvisīhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:637_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ akkhutvisīhi pañcayati chayati sattayatīhi mogaṇo ca togaṇo ca nogaṇo ca yogaṇo ca yā yagaṇadvayañca ce yuttā,
anya-e0601n:637_7: sā gāthā kusumitalatā vellitā kusumitalatā vellitā gāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:637_8: Ettha ca akkhasaddassa pañcindriyavācakattā akkhasaddo pañcasaṅkhyāvācakoti veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:637_10: Isisaddo vipassīādīnaṃ buddhānaṃ sattavidhattā sattasaṅkhyāvācakoti veditabboti.
anya-e0601n:638_0: Tattha pana parahitakaro yo munindo kaṇḍambamūle nisinno pāṭiheraṃ sīghaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0601n:638_1: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:638_3: Parahitakaroti attanā paresaṃ sabbasattānaṃ hitaṃ atthaṃ karonto.
anya-e0601n:638_10: So hi dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato pādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato paṭṭhāya attano sukhaṃ pajahanto sattalokassa
anya-e0601n:638_11: hitasukhatthāya kappasata sahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni samatiṃsapāramiyo pañcamahāpariccāge ca
anya-e0601n:638_12: karonto sabbaññubuddhabhāvaṃ pattakāle ca pañcacattālīsavassāni dhamma desanāya sattalokassa lokiyalokuttarahita
anya-e0601n:638_20: paccekamunivasena pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indoti munindoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:638_23: Kaṇḍanāmikena pasenadīkosalarañño uyyānapālena ropitassa setambarukkhassa samīpeti attho.
anya-e0601n:638_30: taṃ rukkhesu siñcanaṃ ṭināti jānātīti kaṇḍo,
anya-e0601n:639_3: Atha vā ābhuso vimhayo carati pavattatīti accheraṃ,
anya-e0601n:639_8: Andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na carati na pavattatīti accheraṃ,
anya-e0601n:639_11: Yathā hi andhassa pabbātārohanaṃ niccaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0601n:639_13: evameva bhagavato pāṭihāriyaṃ niccaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0601n:639_16: Tena vuttaṃ nettiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yaṃ abhiṇhaṃ na pavattati,
anya-e0601n:639_18: Atha vā accharaṃ paharituṃ yogganti acchariyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:639_20: Acchariyanti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ iyasaddalopena accheranti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:639_21: Vuttañhetaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:640_2: Atha vā parisamantato kulaṃ pakiṇṇaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakajālaaggijālavantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:640_3: Ābhuso kulati udakaggijālaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ karotīti ākulaṃ,
anya-e0601n:640_6: Ābhusaṃ kulati bandhati aññamaññanti vā ākulaṃ.
anya-e0601n:640_7: Atha vā āsamantato kulati yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakaggijālaṃ pavattatīti ākulaṃ,
anya-e0601n:640_9: Udakajālaṃ aggijālena aggijālañca udakajālena sammisso hotīti attho.
anya-e0601n:640_10: Ananti jīvanti etena sattāti aṇṇaṃ, udakaṃ.
anya-e0601n:640_14: Atha vā arati gacchati taṃ taṃ ṭhānanti aṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_3: Titthiya vādo hi natthi dinnantiādinayapavatto saṃsārato nissaritumappadānavasena jālasadisattā dujjālanti attho.
anya-e0601n:641_11: Kāyamoneyya vacīmoneyya manomoneyyaṃ etesaṃ atthīti vā muni.
anya-e0601n:641_13: Atha vā idhaloka paralokaṃ attahita parahitaṃ hitāhitañca munanti jānantīti munīti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:642_6: Bhagavato hi sāvatthinagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle kataṃ pāṭihāriyañca bhagavā pana tasmiṃ pāṭihāriyāvasāne tāvatiṃsapuraṃ gato,
anya-e0601n:642_7: tasmiṃ pārichattakamūlamhi paṇḍukambalanāmake silāsane sannisinno devānaṃ abhidhammakathāya desanā ca
anya-e0601n:642_8: sabbasammāsambuddhehi avijahitā dhammatāyeva hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:643_1: paṭipakkhe titthiye madditvā hinoti pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ.
anya-e0601n:643_4: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe titthiye harati apanetīti pāṭiheraṃ,
anya-e0601n:643_7: Paṭiharati apaneti sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni cittānīti vā pāṭiheraṃ.
anya-e0601n:643_9: Samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena paṭipacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā pāṭiheraṃ.
anya-e0601n:643_10: Paṭīti hi ayaṃsaddo pacchāti etassa atthaṃ bodheti.
anya-e0601n:643_11: Tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi añño āgacchi brāhmaṇotiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:643_12: Atha vā paṭipunappunaṃ udakaggijālaṃ abbocchinnaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ hutvā harati pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ,
anya-e0601n:644_1: Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthinagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle devānamindena
anya-e0601n:644_2: sakkena āṇāpitena visukammadevaputtena nimmite dvādasayojane ratana maṇḍape bhagavatā nimmite yojanappamāṇe
anya-e0601n:644_3: ratanapallaṅke ratanacaṅkame ca nisīditvā tiyojanike dibbasetacchatte dhārayamāne samantato dvādasayojanāya
anya-e0601n:644_4: parisāya atthādānaparidīpanaṃ titthiyamaddanaṃ uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
anya-e0601n:644_48: Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjaṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ ubbahanabhūtānaṃ yamakā yamakā vaṇṇā pavattanti.
anya-e0601n:644_50: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_52: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_54: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_56: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.
anya-e0601n:644_58: bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_60: bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_62: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
anya-e0601n:644_64: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vāti vividhaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanatthāya akāsīti.
anya-e0601n:644_65: Ettha ca pana yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho ce.
anya-e0601n:644_70: Titthiyamaddananti pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmāti kuhāyanavasena pubbe uṭṭhitānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:645_4: ettha ca paṭhamavikappe paramasaddo uttamavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko nipāto.
anya-e0601n:645_6: Devamanussānaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ ratiṃ janetīti paramaratijo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:645_8: Atha vā pakārena saddhamme ramantīti paramā,
anya-e0601n:645_11: Tesaṃ cittassa ratiṃ ramanaṃ janetīti paramaratijo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:645_13: So hi dhamma desanāya ca pāṭihāriyena iddhiyā sarīrasobhagga sampattiādīhi ca devamanussānaṃ cittassa
anya-e0601n:646_2: Dhammasaddo hi guṇe vattati buddhadhammātiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:646_8: Bhagavā etāya iddhiyā yathicchitattho iddho vuddho ukkaṃsagato hotīti attho.
anya-e0601n:646_9: Dhāreti pakāseti taṃsamaṅgino dabbanti dhammo, guṇo.
anya-e0601n:647_9: tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi cāti dasavidhā hoti.
anya-e0601n:647_11: Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti bahuko homīti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhāna vasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:647_12: Pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vā yakkhavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0601n:647_13: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetīti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikuppanā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:647_14: Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpaṃ manomayanti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare
anya-e0601n:647_15: aññasseva manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā manomayā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:647_16: Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbattā visesā ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:647_17: Ettha ca āyasmato bākulattherassa ca āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa ca āyasmato bhūtapālattherassa ca ñāṇavipphārā iddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:647_18: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvena nibbattā visesā samādhivipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:647_19: Ettha ca āyasmato sāriputtattherassa ca āyasmato sañjīvattherassa ca āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññattherassa
anya-e0601n:647_20: ca uttarāya upāsikāya ca sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya ca samādhivipphārā iddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:648_0: Paṭikūlādīsu appaṭikūlasaññī vihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:648_1: Pakkhidevādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kamma vipākajā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:648_3: Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccā nañca vinipātikānaṃ ayaṃ kammavipākajā iddhī”tiādi.
anya-e0601n:648_4: Cakkavattiādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:648_6: Rājā cakkavatti vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso assabandhagobandhapurise upādāya.
anya-e0601n:648_12: Vijjādharādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana vijjāmayā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:648_13: Ettha ca ādisaddena ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi dasseti.
anya-e0601n:648_16: Tena tena sammāpayogena tassa tassa kammassa ijjhanaṃ tattha tattha sammā payogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:649_1: Vitthāro pana paṭisambhidāmagge iddhikathāya ca visuddhimaggaṭṭhakathāya ca gahetabbo.
anya-e0601n:649_2: Tāsu pana iddhīsu bhagavato ṭhapetvā vijjāmayiddhiṃ avasesā atthīti veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:649_3: Atha vā bhagavato tīhi vijjāhi ca aṭṭhahi vijjāhi ca samannāgatattā sabbā buddhaiddhiyo santīti vijjāmayiddhipi labbhatīti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:649_4: Taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:650_1: Parahitakaro attanā paresaṃ sabbasattānaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ karonto,
anya-e0601n:650_3: kaṇḍambaṃmūle kaṇḍanāmikena pasenadikosalarañño uyyānapālena ropitassa setambarukkhassa samīpe sannisinno
anya-e0601n:650_4: vasamāno accheraṃ vimhāpanīyaṃ nayanasubhagaṃ devamanussānaṃ pasāda cakkhussa sobhanapattaṃ ākulaṇṇaggijālaṃ
anya-e0601n:650_5: parikiṇṇaudaka dhāraaggisikhavantaṃ parisamantato kulaṃ parikiṇṇaṃ aññamañña missakaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ
anya-e0601n:650_9: pāṭiheraṃ paccanīka paṭihārakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ udakaggiyamakaṃyamakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:650_12: paramaratijaṃ devamanussānaṃ uttamaratiṃ janakaṃ uttamānaṃ sādhūnaṃ cittaramanaṃ janāpetaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:650_13: iddhidhammehi acinteyyaappameyyehi buddhaiddhi guṇehi upetaṃ samannāgataṃ,
anya-e0601n:650_14: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ sirasā vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:653_1: Evaṃ ekūnavīsatimāya gāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni vineyyappāṇoghaṃ dhammadesanāya catusaccadhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:653_2: bodhaneyyādīhi navahi guṇehi thomitvā munindakkaṃ vanditukāmo munindakkotyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:653_3: Ayaṃ pana ya ma na sa ra ragaṇehi ca ekagarunā ca chayatīhi ca sattayatīhi ca racitattā ekūnavīsatakkharā meghavipphujjitāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:653_4: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “rasutvassehi ymā na sa ra ra garū meghavipphujjitā sā”ti.
anya-e0601n:653_6: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ rasutvassehi cha cha satta yatīhi ymā yagaṇamagaṇā ca na sa rara garū nagaṇa sagaṇa ragaṇa ragaṇa ekagaru ca ce yuttā,
anya-e0601n:653_7: sā gāthā meghavipphujjitā megha vipphujjitā gāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:653_8: Ettha ca rasānaṃ kasāva titta madhuralavaṇa ambila kaṭukavasena chabbidhattā rasasaddo chasaṅkhyāvācakoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:653_9: Utūnaṃ hemanta sisīra vasanta gimhavassānasaradavasena chabbidhattā utusaddo chasaṅkhyāvācakoti.
anya-e0601n:654_0: Tattha pana dayudayaruṇo ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo eko yo munindakko suddhe tibhavakuhare kamalakathitaṃ vineyyappāṇoghaṃ
anya-e0601n:654_1: dhammaraṃsīvarehi subodhesi byāpitakkitti nañca tilokekaccakkhuṃ dukhamasahanaṃ mahesiṃ taṃ munindakkaṃ
anya-e0601n:655_0: Imissā gāthāya ca atthakkameneva sukhajānanatthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma,
anya-e0601n:655_4: Atha vā udayapabbatato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya mahākaruṇā vāti attho.
anya-e0601n:655_6: Adayāti vuccati nikkaruṇatanti ettha hi karuṇāyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:656_1: Dayati hiṃsati kāruṇikaṃ yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanibbattiṃ na pāpuṇāti tāvāti dayā,
anya-e0601n:656_4: Dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi etāyāti vā dayā.
anya-e0601n:656_6: Dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhātīti vā dayā.
anya-e0601n:656_8: Atha vā dayanti gaṇhanti etāya bodhisattā saṃsāradukkhañca sabbaññutañāṇañcāti dayā,
anya-e0601n:656_10: Mahābodhisattā hi buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇakāle hatthagatampi arahatta phalaṃ chaṭṭetvā saṃsārasāgarato
anya-e0601n:656_11: satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsakaraṃ atibhayānakaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ pacchimabhave ca saha amatadhātupaṭilābhena
anya-e0601n:656_14: Tena vuttaṃ aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ “sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi,
anya-e0601n:657_0: Api ca dayanti anurakkhanti satte etāya,
anya-e0601n:657_1: sayaṃ vā anuddayati anudayamattameva vā etanti dayā.
anya-e0601n:657_5: Āsamantato ālokaṃ karonto uṇati gacchatīti aruṇo,
anya-e0601n:657_8: Dayāsaṅkhātato udayapabbatato uggatasūriyassa aruṇo yassāti dayudayaruṇo.
anya-e0601n:657_9: Atha vā udayapabbatato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya dayā mahākaruṇā yassāti dayudayaruṇo,
anya-e0601n:657_11: Yathā hi uggatasūriyassa aruṇo ālokassa ādi hoti,
anya-e0601n:657_12: evaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa pādamūle karopayātaṃ nibbānasukhamosajja mahākaruṇāya saṃsārasamuddato
anya-e0601n:657_13: satte samuddharitukāmo buddhabhāvāya sudukkarā dānādayo dasa pāramiyo ca pañca mahāpariccāge ca kappasatasahassādhikāni
anya-e0601n:657_14: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni akāsīti karuṇā buddhabhāvāya ādi.
anya-e0601n:657_15: Tasmā buddhasseva dayudayaruṇoti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:658_14: Vamadhātu gatiyaṃ bo. Assi. Vassa bo.
anya-e0601n:659_7: Ācariyā pana idha bimbasaddassa atthaṃ cakkamaṇḍalanti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:659_12: Ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ vitthāraṃ bimbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ assāti ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo.
anya-e0601n:659_13: Atha vā vitthiṇṇaṃ vitthāraṃ bimbaṃ cakkavāḷaparimaṇḍalaṃ viya vipulārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ assāti ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo,
anya-e0601n:659_15: Yathā hi cakkavāḷassa anantattā cakkavāḷamaṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:659_16: eva meva buddhassa sabbaññutañāṇaṃ anantārammaṇattā vipulaṃ mahantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:659_20: Tassa pana yo ekoti padacchedo kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:659_23: Yekoti pāṭhe pana lopasandhīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0601n:660_2: Ettha ca ekasaddo aññaseṭṭhāsahāya saṅkhyādīsu dissati.
anya-e0601n:660_3: Tathāhesa sassato attā ca loko ca,
anya-e0601n:660_4: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantītiādīsu aññatthe dissati.
anya-e0601n:660_7: Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyāyātiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:660_10: Asahāyo hutvā eti gacchati pavattatīti eko,
anya-e0601n:660_11: adutiyako hutvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ eti jānāti paṭivijjhatīti vā eko,
anya-e0601n:660_14: Atha vā eko bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena eko.
anya-e0601n:660_22: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti ekotiādinā āgatena mahāniddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:661_0: Api ca anantacakkavāḷesuyeva ekova buddho eti uppajjati vikasati vāti eko.
anya-e0601n:661_1: Vuttañhi ekanipāta aṅguttara pāḷiyaṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso,
anya-e0601n:661_2: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:661_5: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā ekova arahaṃ sammāsambuddho uppajjeyya,
anya-e0601n:661_8: Tīṇi hi khettāni jātikkhettaṃ āṇakkhettaṃ visayakkhettanti.
anya-e0601n:661_10: Sā hi tathāgatassa mātukucchiṃ okkamanakāle nikkhamanakāle sambodhikāle dhammacakkappavattane āyu saṅkhāravossajjane parinibbāne ca kampati,
anya-e0601n:661_12: Āṭānāṭiyaparitta moraparittadhajaggaparitta ratanaparittādīnañhi ettha āṇā pavattati.
anya-e0601n:661_19: ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇanti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:661_20: Imesu pana tīsu khettesu ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi.
anya-e0601n:661_28: imā tisso saṃgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ muñcitvā aññattha buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi.
anya-e0601n:662_0: Ettha ca ekissā lokadhātuyāti dasasahassi lokadhātuyāti idaṃ jātikkhettaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:662_1: Dasasahassilokadhātu hi imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0601n:662_3: Imesu pana tīsu khettesūti iminā dasasahassilokadhātusaṅkhāte jātikkhette koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷasaṅkhāte
anya-e0601n:662_4: āṇakkhette anantacakkavāḷa saṅkhāte visayakkhette cāti imesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ito cakkavāḷato aññesu
anya-e0601n:662_6: Tividhañhi buddhakkhettaṃ dassetvā imesu pana tīsu khettesūti ādhārabhāvena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0601n:662_9: Sati hi aṭṭhakathācariyo tassa padassa niddhāraṇatthe adhippete imesu tīsu khettesu āṇakkhette ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷantiādi vucceyya. Na.
anya-e0601n:662_11: Pubbanissayā cariyehi ca tassa padassa ādhārabhāvena atthayojanā katāti.
anya-e0601n:662_14: tadaṭṭhakathāyañca nettipāḷiyañca tadaṭṭhakathāyañca taṃ kāraṇaṃ āgatamevāti.
anya-e0601n:662_15: Taṃ aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ pana “na uppajjantīti pana atthīti na me ācariyo atthi,
anya-e0601n:662_17: Imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā kiṃpanāvuso sāriputta atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
anya-e0601n:662_18: vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhohaṃ bhante noti vadeyyanti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0601n:662_20: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyunti imaṃ suttaṃ āharantena
anya-e0601n:662_21: dhamma senāpatinā ca buddhakkhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:662_24: Ettha ca imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti iminā buddhakkhettabhūtato ito cakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:662_25: aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu buddhānaṃ anuppatti dassitā hoti.
anya-e0601n:662_26: Aññatthāti hi sāmaññena vuttepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttena imesu tīsu khettesūti saddantarasannidhānena anantacakkavāḷabhūto visesattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0601n:663_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte buddhā hi uppajjamānā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjanti.
anya-e0601n:663_2: Uppajjanaṭṭhāne pana vārite ito aññesu cakkavāḷesu nuppajjantīti vāritameva hotītiettha vākye imasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:663_4: Etena aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0601n:663_5: Yadipi hi aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā uppajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0601n:663_6: Evaṃ santesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṃ sabbadhammaṃ jānanto passanto amhākaṃ bhagavā aññacakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā uppajjantīti evaṃ vucceyya. Na.
anya-e0601n:663_7: Taṇhaṅkarādayo hi aṭṭhavīsati sambuddhā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu cakkavāḷesu uppajjantītivacanaṃ tepiṭake buddhavacane natthi,
anya-e0601n:663_9: Tasmā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu ananta cakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā nuppajjantīti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:664_1: Atthi pana katthaci añño buddhoti anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantañāṇaṃ pattharitvā olokento aññaṃ buddhaṃ na addasa.
anya-e0601n:664_3: yaṃ idāni attanā samaṃ na passeyya.
anya-e0601n:664_4: Yo jātadivasepi brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena attanā samaṃ apassanto aggohamasmi lokassāti appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi.
anya-e0601n:664_5: Evaṃ aññaṃ attanā samaṃ apassitvā cintesī”ti.
anya-e0601n:664_8: taṃ mahāsamayasuttaṭīkāyañca ekissā lokadhātuyāti sutte āgatanayena sabbattheva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dve buddhā nāma na honteva.
anya-e0601n:665_0: Apaṇṇakajātakaṭṭhakathāyañca “satthā upāsakā heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ paricchedaṃ katvā aparimāṇāsu
anya-e0601n:665_1: lokadhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhena sadiso nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:665_4: Imāsu dvīsu aṭṭhakathāsu ca anantāsu lokadhātūsūti ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsūti ca anantaaparimāṇa saddena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:665_5: Tehi dvīhi saddehi ṭīkāvacanena ca anantāsu lokadhātūsu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ anuppattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:666_0: Sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathāya yojanāyaṃ pana imesu panātiādinā koṭisatasahassa cakkavāḷato aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā na uppajjantīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0601n:666_2: Aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷeti ito cakkavāḷato aññesu sabbesupi tīsu buddhakkhettesūti atthe gayhamāne sati koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:666_3: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā na uppajjantīti viññāyati.
anya-e0601n:666_4: Yadi pana aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷeti ito aññasmiṃ jātiāṇākhettabhūte cakkavāḷeti atthe gahite koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:666_5: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhānaṃ uppatti bhaveyyāti viññāyati.
anya-e0601n:666_7: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”tiādipāḷiyā ca.
anya-e0601n:666_9: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve rājāno cakkavattī”tiādipāḷiyā saddhiṃ kathanato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:666_10: buddhānaṃ anuppatti viya aññissā lokadhātuyā cakkavattirañño anuppatti bhaveyya.
anya-e0601n:666_11: Kathāvatthuppakaraṇe ca koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhānaṃ uppatti na paṭisedhitā.
anya-e0601n:666_12: Tasmā āṇakkhettabhūtato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhassa bhaveyyāti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti.
anya-e0601n:667_3: Imissā pana sabbadisākathāyaṃ paravādīnaṃ parikappavacanamattameva atthi.
anya-e0601n:667_4: Tena vuttaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sabbadisā buddhā tiṭṭhantīti. Āmantā.
anya-e0601n:667_14: Katarasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā raṭṭhe vā janapade vāti.
anya-e0601n:668_1: Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā uparīti samantato lokadhātusannivesaṃ sabbalokadhātūsu ca buddho atthīti
anya-e0601n:668_2: attano vikappasippaṃ uppādetvā sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantīti yesaṃ…pe…
anya-e0601n:668_7: Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
anya-e0601n:668_8: Kinnāmo so bhagavātiādi sace tvaṃ jānāsi.
anya-e0601n:668_10: Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:668_12: seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānanti iminā paravādīnaṃ laddhiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:668_13: Tattha pana catūsu disāsu ca heṭṭhā ca upari ca iti evaṃ samantato lokadhātusannivesaṃ atthīti yojanā. Yesaṃ…pe…
anya-e0601n:668_17: Te sandhāyāti te paravādīpuggale sandhāya ñāṇena dhāretvā sallakkhetvāti attho.
anya-e0601n:668_18: Pucchā sakavādissāti sakavādissa sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantīti pucchā hoti.
anya-e0601n:668_20: Puratthimāyāti puṭṭhoti sakavādinā puratthi māyātiādinā pucchite sati.
anya-e0601n:668_21: Sakyamuninti sakyavaṃsa khattiyajātibhūtaṃ amhākaṃ gotamabuddhaṃ sandhāya.
anya-e0601n:668_23: Puna puṭṭhoti sakavādinā puna puratthimāya buddho tiṭṭhatīti pucchite sati.
anya-e0601n:668_24: Laddhivasenāti attano aññalokadhātuyaṃ buddho atthi ca uppajjati cāti micchāladdhivasena paṭijānātīti paravādī puggalo paṭijānāti.
anya-e0601n:668_26: Evaṃ sati tassa nāmagottādiṃ tvaṃ kathehīti sakavādissa codanāvacanaṃ dassetuṃ kinnāmo so bhagavātiādimāha.
anya-e0601n:668_27: Iminā ca ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:668_28: Tena vuttaṃ kathāvatthupāḷiyaṃ “kinnāmo so bhagavā kiṃjacco…pe…
anya-e0601n:669_0: Ettha ca pana sakavādinā kinnāmotyādinā pucchite paravādīpuggalo attano laddhiyā sabbalokadhātūsu uppajjamānānaṃ
anya-e0601n:669_1: buddhānaṃ nāmādiṃ ajānanto apassanto na hevaṃ vattabbeti paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0601n:669_2: Tasmā panettha sakavādī puggalassa laddhiyā aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ uppajjanābhāvo viññāyati.
anya-e0601n:669_4: Evaṃ santesu buddhassa matiṃ yathābhūtato jānanto passanto mahāpañño iddhimā dibbacakkhuādīhi chaḷabhiññehi
anya-e0601n:669_5: sampanno paṭisambhidā patto satthārā dinnamātikānayena kathāvatthupāḷiṃ desento āyasmā mahāmoggaliputtatthero
anya-e0601n:669_6: aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññabuddhānaṃ uppattiṃ katheyya ca. Nāti.
anya-e0601n:669_7: Tasmā ayaṃ kathāvatthupāḷi ca tadaṭṭhakathāvacanañca aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññabuddhānaṃ abhāvadīpane
anya-e0601n:669_8: sabbaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu vuttavacanehi daḷhataraṃ padhānavacanameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:670_0: Na pana buddhāeva aññānantacakkavāḷesu na uppajjeyyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:670_1: atha kho laddhabyākaraṇā mahābodhisattā ca paccekabodhi sattā aggasāvakamahāsāvakabodhisattā paripākindriyā
anya-e0601n:670_2: sāvakabodhisattā ca buddhakkhettabhūte imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjanti,
anya-e0601n:670_5: tesaṃ pana abhinīhāro pāramīsambharaṇaṃ ñāṇaparipācanañca tasmiṃeva samijjhati,
anya-e0601n:671_0: “Purimabuddhānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca nibbattiyā sāvakabodhisattānaṃ sāvakabodhiyā abhinīhāro
anya-e0601n:671_1: sāvakapāramiyā sambharaṇaṃ paripācanañca buddhakkhettabhūte imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpeeva ijjhati,
anya-e0601n:672_0: Etarahi pana apare ācariyā “āṇakkhettabhūtato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññesu cakkavāḷesu buddhā uppajjantī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:672_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷeti ettha aññasaddassa ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷantipadato aññassa
anya-e0601n:672_3: apādānassa asambhavato ca anantacakkavāḷesu bahūsu buddhesu uppannesu buddhassa anacchariyattā ca.
anya-e0601n:673_3: Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekapuggalo loke uppajjati acchariyamanusso”ti.
anya-e0601n:673_4: Aññaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ mayā heṭṭhā vuttanayenapi viññūhi viññātabbanti.
anya-e0601n:678_0: Vuttāsu dvīsu gāthāsu paṭhamagāthāya atthaṃ buddhassa anādhippāyena gahetvā micchāñāṇena aññānantacakkavāḷesu uppajjamānā buddhā asaṅkhayāti vadanti.
anya-e0601n:678_2: pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehi ca viruddhattā ca tassā gāthāya atthaggahaṇassa micchattā ca.
anya-e0601n:678_3: Imāya hi pāḷiyā gāthāya vā aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā uppajjantīti atthe gayhamāne aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0601n:678_4: imesu pana tīsu khettesu ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi,
anya-e0601n:678_5: na uppajjantīti pana atthīti vuttavacanena ca,
anya-e0601n:678_7: imā tisso saṃgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane…pe…
anya-e0601n:678_9: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti vuttavacanena ca ujukaṃ virujjhati ca.
anya-e0601n:678_10: Bhaddantamahā buddhaghosādayo aṭṭhakathācariyā taṃ pāḷiṃ na passantīti attano duggahitena aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ āpajjati ca.
anya-e0601n:678_11: Kiṃ panete tipiṭakadharā tikkhavisadajavana gambhīrādiñāṇikā aṭṭhakathācariyā na passeyyuṃ.
anya-e0601n:678_14: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana āgataṃ suttaṃ natthītiādivacanameva yuttataraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:679_0: Ettha ca buddhakkhettetipadaṃ tasmiñca disābhāgamhītipade visesanaṃ,
anya-e0601n:679_3: Loke cakkavāḷaloke dasavidhā dasa koṭṭhāsā disā honti.
anya-e0601n:679_4: Tattha koṭṭhāse yāyato yāyantassa gacchantassa me antakaṃ pariyosānaṃ natthi.
anya-e0601n:679_5: Buddhakkhette buddhassa dasasahassisaṅkhātajātikkhettabhūte tasmiñca disābhāgamhi mayhaṃ asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā
anya-e0601n:679_6: yamakā yugaḷā yugaḷā hutvā raṃsivāhanā raṃsivahantā raṃsimuñcamānā vā pabhā cakkaratanamaṇiratanādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:679_8: Etthantare dasasahassacakkavāḷantare raṃsijālaṃ raṃsisamūhena vipulo bahutaro āloko bhave ahosinti.
anya-e0601n:680_0: Bhagavā hi imāhi gāthāhi cakkavattirājakāle mayhaṃcakkaratanamaṇīratanādīnaṃ asaṅkhayā pabhā buddhakkhettabhūte
anya-e0601n:681_0: Vuttañhetaṃ buddhaapadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “disā dasavidhā loketi cakkavāḷaloke dasavidhā dasakoṭṭhāsā disā honti.
anya-e0601n:681_1: Tattha koṭṭhāse yāyato yāyantassa gacchantassa antakaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:681_2: Cakkavattikāle tasmiṃ mayā gataṭṭhāne disābhāge vā buddhakkhette buddhavisayā asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā.
anya-e0601n:681_3: Pabhā pakittitāti tadā cakkavatti rājakāle mayhaṃ pabhā cakkaratanamaṇiratanādīnaṃ pabhā ālokā yamakā
anya-e0601n:681_4: yugaḷā yugaḷā hutvā raṃsivāhanā raṃsimuñcamānā pakittitā pākaṭā.
anya-e0601n:681_5: Etthantare dasasahassacakkavāḷantare raṃsijālaṃ raṃsisamūhaṃ āloko vipulo bahutaro bhave ahosinti attho”ti.
anya-e0601n:681_6: Ettha ca paṭhamagāthāya pubbaḍḍhassa ekavākyabhāvato disā dasavidhā loketi cakkavāḷaloke…pe…
anya-e0601n:681_9: asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā pabhā pakittitāti tadā cakkavattikāle…pe…
anya-e0601n:681_11: Tasmā asaṅkhayātipadaṃ dutiyagāthāya pabhātipadassa visesananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:682_0: Jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pana evamassa sabbadhammesu appaṭihata ñāṇācāraṃ dassetvā idāni loke tādisassa aññassa abhāvaṃ dassento āha.
anya-e0601n:685_0: Tattha anantalokadhātūsu ekekissaṃ lokadhātuyā anantasattesu tena tathāgatena samo ekopi natthi.
anya-e0601n:685_1: Sace eko pana samo na bhaveyya.
anya-e0601n:685_2: Sabbe sattā ekajjhaṃ hutvā samā bhaveyyunti ce.
anya-e0601n:685_4: sabbe ekajjhaṃ hutvāpi iminā ekakena samā na hontīti adhippāyoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:685_5: Ettha ca anantalokadhātusūtiādinā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:685_6: Evaṃ pana mayā pathavojaṃ uddharitvā dassito viya dassitehi atidaḷhatarehi sādhakavacanehi ito cakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:685_7: aññacakkavāḷesu buddhā uppajjantīti micchāvādo sūriyo andhakāraṃ paṭihanati viya paṭihaniyati apaniyatīti
anya-e0601n:686_5: Atha vā munāti sabbadhamme saka sāmaññalakkhaṇādinā paṭivijjhatīti muni.
anya-e0601n:686_6: Munati hitāhitaṃ paricchindatīti vā muni, bhagavā.
anya-e0601n:686_14: Muni ca so indati veneyyasatte dhammena abhibhavati indo cāti munindo, bhagavā.
anya-e0601n:686_15: Atha vā munīnaṃ pañcamunīnaṃ indoti munindo, bhagavā.
anya-e0601n:686_16: Na kamati na gacchati pādena attano puññajavimānena gacchatīti akko, ādicco.
anya-e0601n:686_20: Atha vā yugandharubbedhappamāṇe ākāse arati gacchatīti akko.
anya-e0601n:686_23: Taṃ taṃ rāsito taṃ taṃ rāsiṃ arati yātīti vā akko.
anya-e0601n:686_24: Atha vā mahantajutatāya akkiyati abhitthaviyati tappasannehi janehīti akko, ādicco.
anya-e0601n:686_26: Munindo ca so akko cāti munindakko,
anya-e0601n:686_27: akko ādicco viya vā munindoti munindakko, buddho.
anya-e0601n:686_28: Yathā hi sūriyo attano sahassaraṃsiyā ekacakkavāḷe timirandhakāraṃ vidhametvā dine dine navayojanasatasahassappadesaṃ
anya-e0601n:686_29: koṭisahassappadesaṃ vā dasadisaṃ vā obhāsetvā virocamāno carati,
anya-e0601n:686_30: evameva bhagavāpi attano saddhammaraṃ siyā buddhakkhettabhūtesu dasasahassacakkavāḷesu vineyyānaṃ avijjandhakāraṃ
anya-e0601n:686_31: vidhametvā dine dine tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge veneyyasattasamūhaṃ catusaccadhammobhāsena jotayamāno virocanaṃ
anya-e0601n:687_4: Kamalasaraṃ viya tibhavasmiṃ vā bhavanti sattā etthāti bhavo.
anya-e0601n:687_11: Tayo bhavā ca te kuharo cāti tibhavakuharo,
anya-e0601n:687_12: kuharo viya tayo bhavāti vā tathā.
anya-e0601n:687_14: Kamala kathitanti uppalanti kathetabbaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alayati vibhūsayatīti kamalaṃ, uppalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:687_26: Taṃ assa atthi tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti pāṇo, satto.
anya-e0601n:687_28: Vineyyo ca so pāṇo cāti vineyyappāṇo.
anya-e0601n:687_29: Avayavena saha hanati gacchati pavattatīti ogho, samūho.
anya-e0601n:687_30: Avapubba hanadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇo. Avassa o.
anya-e0601n:688_1: Ettha ca dhammoti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne satte catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0601n:688_4: Caturiyamaggo ca nibbānañca nippariyāyato labbhati. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:688_6: nibbānassa ca nissaraṇappahānavasena tassa ārammaṇabhāvaṃ patvā tadatthasiddhihetuttā.
anya-e0601n:688_7: Caturiyaphalañca pariyattidhammo ca pariyāyato labbhati. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:688_8: phalassa maggena viddhaṃsi tabbānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanappahānavasena maggānukūlappa vattattā.
anya-e0601n:688_10: Atha vā kilese dhunāti kampati calati viddhaṃsetīti dhammo,
anya-e0601n:688_13: Ariyehi dhāriyati paṭivijjhiyati sacchikariyati ārammaṇa karaṇavasenāti dhammo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:688_18: Attano sabhāvaṃ dhāreti ca dhāriyati ca paṇḍitehi na bālehīti dhammo,
anya-e0601n:688_20: Dhammo ca dhammo ca dhammo ca dhammo cāti dhammo eka sesanayena,
anya-e0601n:693_1: Māṇava rāgavirāgaṃ rāgavigataṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ maggadhammañca anejaṃ ejāsaṅkhātataṇhāvirahitaṃ asokaṃ sokavirahitaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ phaladhammañca,
anya-e0601n:693_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ avirodhanaṃ madhuraṃ atthabyañjana sampannattā madhuraṃ,
anya-e0601n:693_5: imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyattidhammañca saraṇattaṃ saraṇabhāvaṃ upehi upagacchāhīti.
anya-e0601n:694_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahiyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito.
anya-e0601n:694_1: Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyā sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejama sokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:694_2: Kenaci paccayena asaṅkhatattā dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:694_3: Avirodhadīpanato pana atthabyañjanassa sampannatāya pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca appaṭikūlantiādinā
anya-e0601n:694_5: Vuttañhi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ettha hi rāgavirāganti maggo kathito.
anya-e0601n:694_8: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhā”ti.
anya-e0601n:694_10: Visesato pana pariyatti dhammo adhippeto. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:694_13: rasanti assādenti sattā etāyāti vā raṃsī,
anya-e0601n:694_14: rasadhātu assādane a ca ī ca.
anya-e0601n:694_15: Atha vā rasiyati sinehiyati taṃ janehīti raṃsī.
anya-e0601n:695_4: Dhammo ca so raṃsi cāti dhammaraṃsi,
anya-e0601n:695_7: Varo ca so dhammaraṃsi cāti dhammaraṃsivaro,
anya-e0601n:695_9: Subodhesīti catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhayamānena suṭṭhu pabodhesi vikāsetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:695_10: Yathā hi sūriyo attano raṃsiyā phusayitvā kuhara saṅkhāte sare jātaṃ uppalaṃ vikāseti,
anya-e0601n:695_11: evameva bhagavāpi attano dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaraṃsiyā kamalasarasaṅkhāte bhavattaye vasantaṃ puññūpanissayaṃ
anya-e0601n:695_12: paṭivijjhārahaṃ kamala saṅkhātaṃ vineyyappāṇoghaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhayamāno phaladhammena pabodhesi
anya-e0601n:696_3: Visesena vividhaṃ vā āpati vaḍḍhatīti byāpito.
anya-e0601n:696_12: Byāpito patthaṭo kittano thutighoso yassa soti byāpitakkittino,
anya-e0601n:696_14: Bhagavato hi tiloke devamanussehi sīlādiguṇehi ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotyādīhi guṇehi ca thomito kittisaddo
anya-e0601n:696_15: yāva bhavaggaṃ abbhuggacchatīti byāpitakkittinanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:697_1: Kāmarūpa arūpasaṅkhātānaṃ tilokānaṃ ekaṃ paññācakkhubhūtanti attho.
anya-e0601n:697_3: Tassa cakkhu viya eka bhūtaṃpaññācakkhu yassa soti tilokekaccakkhu,
anya-e0601n:697_5: Ettha ca ekacakkhusaddassa lopo hoti brahmassarotiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:697_6: Atha vā tilokassa ekaṃ paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti tilokekaccakkhu,
anya-e0601n:697_8: Tilokekaccakkhubhūtanti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ bhūtasaddalopaṃ katvā tilokekaccakkhunti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:697_9: Atha vā tilokassa ekabhūto paññācakkhu hutvā sabbadhamme cakkhati passatīti tilokekaccakkhu,
anya-e0601n:697_11: Bhagavā hi paññācakkhu mayattā sattesu ca taduppādanato tilokassa cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto hoti.
anya-e0601n:697_12: Vuttañhi madhupiṇḍikasutte “so hāvuso bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0601n:697_13: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti.
anya-e0601n:698_3: Dukkhamanti vattabbe gajjabandhattā chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ kakāralopaṃ katvā dukhamanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:698_8: Bhagavā hi puthujjanehi sudukkhamitaṃ iṭṭhā niṭṭhādiārammaṇaṃ sītuṇhādiṃ lābhālābhayasāyasa nindapasaṃsasukhadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:699_0: Mahesinti mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhādiṃ pariyesamānaṃ mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesamānaṃ vā mahante sīlakkhandhādike esati gavesati pariyesatīti mahesī,
anya-e0601n:699_4: Bhagavā mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esi gavesi pariyesīti mahesī.
anya-e0601n:699_5: Mahantaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ mahantaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ mahantaṃ vimuttikkhandhaṃ mahantaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesī”ti.
anya-e0601n:699_6: Mahante sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiya dhamme esati gavesatīti vā mahesī,
anya-e0601n:699_7: mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ esati gavesatīti vā mahesī.
anya-e0601n:699_8: Vuttañhi mahāniddese “mahante satipaṭṭhāne mahante sammappadhāne mahante iddhipāde mahantāni indriyāni
anya-e0601n:699_9: mahantāni balāni mahante bojjhaṅge mahantaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ
anya-e0601n:699_11: Atha vā mahesakkhehi sattehi esiyati gavesiyati pariyesiyati amhākaṃ kahaṃ buddhoti mahesī.
anya-e0601n:699_12: Vuttañhi mahāniddese “mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito gavesito kahaṃ buddho”tyādi.
anya-e0601n:700_2: udayapabba tato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya mahākaruṇā vā,
anya-e0601n:700_6: yo yādiso munindakko buddhādicco suddhe rāgādimalehi visuddhe tibhava kuhare tibhavasaṅkhātakamalasare,
anya-e0601n:700_10: subodhesi catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivedhayamānena suṭṭhu pabodhesi vikāsesi,
anya-e0601n:700_13: tilokekaccakkhuṃ kāmarūpaarūpa saṅkhātānaṃ tilokānaṃ ekaṃ paññācakkhubhūtaṃ,
anya-e0601n:700_15: mahesiṃ mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhādiṃ pariyesamānaṃ mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesamānaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:700_16: taṃ munindakkaṃ ahaṃ sirasā namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:707_1: Evaṃ vīsatimāya gāthāya munindakkaṃ vanditvā idāni pubbe anekajātiyaṃ bodhisattakāle jīvitapariccāgādīhi
anya-e0601n:707_2: ca dānādidasapāramiyo pūrentehi guṇehi ca thometvā jinaṃ vanditukāmo yo jino tyādimāha.
anya-e0601n:707_3: Ayaṃ pana raja raja raja gaṇehi ca garulahūhi ca racitattā vīsatakkharehi lakkhitā vuttagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:707_4: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “vutta mīdisantu nāmato rajā rajā rajā garullahū cā”ti.
anya-e0601n:708_1: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ rajā rajagaṇā ca rajā rajagaṇā ca rajā rajagaṇā ca garullahū ca ce siyyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:708_2: īdisantu īdisaṃ pana gāthā nāmato nāmena vuttaṃ vutta gāthā nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:709_0: Tattha pana yo jinoti yo buddho.
anya-e0601n:709_1: So hi devaputtakilesābhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccuvasena pañcamāre ajini jināti jinissatīti jinoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:709_2: Nanu ca buddhasāvakāpi pañcamāre jinattā jinā nāmāti ce.
anya-e0601n:709_3: Na bhagavato parūpa nissayavirahaniratisayavasena pañcamārajinattā bhagavāyeva jino nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:710_4: ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṃ niratisayaṃ taṃ bhañjanaṃ upādāya bhagavāeva mārabhañjanoti thomito”ti.
anya-e0601n:711_2: Tathā hesa ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti ettha bhave āgato.
anya-e0601n:711_3: Atthi visākhe nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātīti ettha nikāye.
anya-e0601n:711_4: Tiri nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosīti ettha paññattiyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:711_5: Jāti dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe.
anya-e0601n:711_6: Yaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ.
anya-e0601n:711_10: Yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jātoti ettha ariyasīle.
anya-e0601n:711_13: So hi jāyati yoni gatiādi vibhāgoti jātīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:711_14: Atha vā jāyanti nibbattanti ettha khandhādayoti jāti, bhavo.
anya-e0601n:711_17: anekā ca sā jāti cāti aneka jāti.
anya-e0601n:712_0: Saputtadāranti puttena ca bhariyāya ca sahitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:712_1: Attano kulaṃ punāti pavati sodhetīti vā putto.
anya-e0601n:712_10: Atha vā purisena bhogaṃ dīyatīti dāro.
anya-e0601n:712_12: Dākucchitā kārena purisena ramiyati etthāti vā dāro, bhariyā.
anya-e0601n:712_17: Akattari ca kārake saññāyaṃ ṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:712_23: Aṅgajīvitampīti hatthapādakaṇṇanāsacakkhādisarīrāvayavañca jīvitindriya paṭibaddhasakalasarīrañca aṅgati gacchati kāyeti aṅgo,
anya-e0601n:713_2: Tena bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇahetupi puttadāraaṅgajīvitampi alaggamānaso pariccajeti,
anya-e0601n:714_11: Bodhi ca bodhi ca bodhi sarūpekase savasena.
anya-e0601n:714_17: Bhagavatā hi puttadāraaṅgajīvitehipi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena sata sahassaguṇenapi bodhiñāṇameva piyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:715_0: “Na me dessā ubho puttā, maddī devī na dessiyā;
anya-e0601n:716_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā piye adāsaha”nti.
anya-e0601n:717_0: Alaggamānasoti puttadāraaṅgajīvitādīsu anallīyana citto hutvā laganaṃ saṅganaṃ laggo,
anya-e0601n:717_4: natthi laggo ettha puttadāra aṅgajīvitādīsūti vā alaggo.
anya-e0601n:717_7: Alaggo mānaso yassa soti alaggamānaso, jino.
anya-e0601n:717_10: Attho kāmo assa atthīti atthiko, ṇiko.
anya-e0601n:717_13: Bodhisatto hi pāramīpūraṇa kāle sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatā gatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
anya-e0601n:717_14: sīsaṃ kantitvā galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ
anya-e0601n:717_15: bhariyañca kheḷapiṇḍamiva anapekkho pariccajitvā dīyamānova sammāsambodhiñāṇaṃ laddhuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0601n:717_17: Pañca hi mahāpariccāge apariccajitvā buddhabhūtapubbā nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:717_18: Paccekabuddhāriyasāvakā pana puttadāraaṅgajīvitaṃ apariccajantāpi paccekabuddhāriyasāvakabodhiñāṇaṃ laddhuṃ samatthāva.
anya-e0601n:717_19: Tasmāyeva bhagavantaṃyeva saputtadāramaṅgajīvitampi bodhipemato alaggamānaso adāsiyeva atthi kassāti thometi.
anya-e0601n:717_24: jīvitapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge apariccajitvā buddhabhūtapubbā nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0601n:718_0: Evaṃ pañcahi mahāpariccāgaguṇehi bhagavato thomanaṃ katvā idāni dānādipāramīpūraṇaguṇena thomanaṃ kattu kāmo dānapāramintiādimāha.
anya-e0601n:718_1: Tattha dānanti tividhaṃ hoti cāgacetanā ca,
anya-e0601n:718_4: Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānanti āgataṭṭhāne hi cāgacetanā dānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:718_5: Abhayaṃ detīti āgataṭṭhāne viratī dānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:718_6: Dānaṃ deti annaṃ pānanti āgataṭṭhāne deyyadhammo dānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0601n:718_7: Tattha cāgacetanā deti vā deyyadhammaṃ denti vā etāya deyyadhammanti dānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:718_9: Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravasaṅkhātaṃ dussilyaṃ cetanaṃ dāti lunāti cāti dānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:718_13: Atha vā pāraṃ nibbānaṃ eti gacchati etāyāti pārami.
anya-e0601n:718_23: Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susilyavasena na vippakiratīti vā sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:718_24: sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti vā sīlaṃ.
anya-e0601n:718_27: Kusala dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena ābhuso dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0601n:718_28: Sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti sādhavoti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:718_29: sīliyati upadhāriyati sappurisehi hadayamaṃsantaraṃ upanetvāti vā sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:718_30: sīleti upadhāreti taṃ samaṅgī puggalaṃ apāyesu uppattinīvāraṇavasena suggati nibbānanti vā sīlaṃ,
anya-e0601n:721_0: Pisaddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho. Tena pañca mahāpariccāge sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0601n:722_1: Bhagavato hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhatthāya abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya anekajātīsu
anya-e0601n:722_2: sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamanto adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi,
