anya-e0601n:722_6: Bhagavā hi bodhisatta bhūto catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṃ parājetvā adhikaṃ lohitadānamakāsi.
anya-e0601n:729_0: Tattha ca soti so evaṃvidho bodhisatto.
anya-e0601n:729_4: Bhūmiṃ parājiyāti paṃsupathaviyā paṃsuṃ parājetvā attano sarīramaṃsaṃ adhikaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0601n:729_5: Meruppamāṇamadhikanti yojana aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassubbedhassa girirājassa pamāṇatopi adhikaṃ katvā.
anya-e0601n:729_9: Nayanaṃ adāsīti nettadānaṃ adāsīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:730_0: Tāsamiddhiyopayātamaggatanti tāsaṃ iddhiyā upayātaṃ aggatanti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:730_9: Atha vā aggati uttamabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhūtaṃ vā buddhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti aggo, jino.
anya-e0601n:730_12: Bhagavā hi anantalokadhātūsu sabba sattānaṃ aggo uttamataro seṭṭhataroti attho.
anya-e0601n:731_0: “Yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññīnāsaññino vā,
anya-e0601n:732_5: Dīpanti patiṭṭhahanti paṭisaraṇabhāvena sattā etthāti vā dīpako, jino.
anya-e0601n:732_9: Atha vā ekadīpakanti manussānaṃ paṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ samuddadīpakamiva sabbasattānaṃ paṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ekabuddhabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0601n:733_4: Soviya eko buddho hutvā eti gacchati pavattatīti ekadīpako, jino.
anya-e0601n:733_5: Yathā hi mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ manussānaṃ samuddadīpo paṭisaraṇo patiṭṭho hoti,
anya-e0601n:733_6: evaṃ jino saṃsārasāgare alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhe osīdantānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ ekabuddhabhūto paṭisaraṇo patiṭṭho hotīti ekadīpakanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:734_2: saputtadāraṃ puttena ca bhariyāya ca sahitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:734_7: atthikassa puttadārādiṃ kāmikassa yācakassa adāsiyeva pariccāgacetanāya adāsieva.
anya-e0601n:734_8: Dānapāramimpi tato dānapāramito paraṃ aññaṃ sīlapāramādikampi sīlapāramīādikampi,
anya-e0601n:734_10: tāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ iddhiyā samiddhiyā aggataṃ uttama bhāvaṃ seṭṭhabuddhattaṃ vā,
anya-e0601n:734_13: dīpakamiva ekapaṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vā taṃ jinaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:741_1: Evaṃ ekavīsatimāya gāthāya jinaṃ vanditvā idāni devādevātidevantyādīhi dasahi guṇehi thometvā munindaṃ vanditukāmo devādevātidevantiādimāha.
anya-e0601n:741_2: Ayaṃ pana ma ra bha na ya ya gaṇehi ca timuniyatīhi ca racitattā ekavīsatakkharehi yuttā ādyantayamakā saddharā gāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:741_3: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mrā bhnā yo yotra yena timuniyatiyutā saddharā kittitāya”nti.
anya-e0601n:742_1: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ mrā maragaṇā ca bhnā bhanagaṇā ca yogaṇo ca yena yagaṇena saha yogaṇo ca timuniyatiyutā
anya-e0601n:742_2: sattamakkharantetīhi yatīhi yuttā ca ce siyuṃ.
anya-e0601n:742_3: Atra imasmiṃ pakati chande ayaṃ gāthā saddharāgāthāti kittitāti.
anya-e0601n:742_5: Ekasmiṃ pāde sattamakkharante sattamakkharante yatīnaṃ tiparivattattā timuniyatiyutāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:743_0: Tattha ca devādevātidevanti rājasaṅkhātasammutideva catumahārājādikaupapattidevānaṃ atiuttamaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ visuddhidevabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0601n:743_2: Te hi mānussaissariyasampattīhi dibbantīti manussarājadevī kumārā devāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:743_4: Te hi dibbaissariyasampattīhi dibbantīti catumahārājikā devā vuccanti,
anya-e0601n:743_8: issariyadhanādisakkāradānaggahaṇaṃ taṃ taṃ atthānusāsanañca karontā voharanti.
anya-e0601n:743_11: Yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti devāti visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyaṃ āgatanayenapi veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:743_12: Atidevanti tesaṃ devānaṃ atiuttamaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ vā visuddhi devabhūtaṃ bhagavantanti attho.
anya-e0601n:743_13: So hi tesaṃ sammuti upapattidevānaṃ sīlādiguṇehi atirekattā atireko devoti bhagavā atidevoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:743_14: Devo devānaṃ atireko atiuttamo atiseṭṭho ativisiṭṭho devo devādevātidevo,
anya-e0601n:744_0: Vuttañhi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “devāti tayo devā sammuti devā,
anya-e0601n:744_4: Upapattidevā nāma catumahārājike deve upādāya tadupari devā.
anya-e0601n:745_0: Bhagavā pana nirātisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravija
anya-e0601n:745_2: ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāsarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya jutiyā anaññasādhāraṇāya ñāṇasarīragatiyā māravijaya
anya-e0601n:745_3: sabbaññuguṇaparahita nipphādanesu appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti
anya-e0601n:745_4: gamanīyato abhitthavanīyato bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitattā
anya-e0601n:745_5: tesaṃ devānaṃ atiseṭṭho atiuttamo devoti devādevātidevoti visuddhimagga mahāṭīkāyaṃ āgatanayenapi veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:746_2: Atha vā nidheti pariyosānaṃ karoti etenāti nidhanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:746_11: So hi anamataggasaṃsārabhavesu nibbattentānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ bodhimaṇḍe aggamaggañāṇasatthena samucchindi tattā punabbhavābhinibbatti natthi.
anya-e0601n:747_2: Pañcamāre bhañjati abhañji bhañjissatīti mārabhaṅgo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:747_11: Atha vā mārasenāya na bhañjiyatīti abhaṅgo.
anya-e0601n:747_13: Mārasenā bhañjituṃ na samatthoti vā abhaṅgo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:748_0: Dīpaṃdīpaṃ pajānanti ettha pajānaṃ dīpaṃ dīpanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:748_3: pakārena vā jāyanti nibbattanti paṭisandhicutivasenāti pajāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:748_5: Tañhi kusalākusale dhamme vibhajitvā dīpeti pakāseti jotetīti dīpanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:748_10: Yathā hi padīpo andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0601n:748_11: evaṃ paññā avijjandhakāraṃ hantvā dhammālokaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:748_14: So hi dīpeti pakāsetīti dīpoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:748_15: Munindo hi payirupāsanavasena gatāgatānaṃ vineyyasattānaṃ dhammadesanāya catumaggañāṇādipaññāpadīpaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:750_3: Tathā hesa bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddhotiādīsu rukkhe vattati.
anya-e0601n:750_4: Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇantiādīsu magge.
anya-e0601n:750_13: Bodhi ca bodhi ca bodhi sarūpekasesavasena.
anya-e0601n:750_14: Taṃ apajjiṃ agaminti bodhi patto, munindo.
anya-e0601n:750_16: Adhipattanti sadevake loke sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ gatanti attho.
anya-e0601n:750_17: Sabbadevamanussānaṃ adhikaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ patto gatoti adhipatto, munindo.
anya-e0601n:750_19: Yathā hi kukkuṭapotakānaṃ yo kukkuṭapotako aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbhido,
anya-e0601n:750_21: evameva bhagavā sadevake loke avijjā gatāya pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya
anya-e0601n:750_22: jātiyā jātattā ca sīlasamādhipaññādi sabbaguṇehi adhikattā ca appaṭisamattā ca sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:750_23: vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ appaṭisamabhāvañca patto gatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:751_1: Āgatānaṃ payirupāsanavasena āgatānaṃ brahma devamanussaparisānanti attho.
anya-e0601n:751_3: Te hi jhānādiguṇehi brūhanti vaḍḍhantīti brahmāti vuccanti,
anya-e0601n:751_5: Te hi na brahmā abrahmāti vuccanti,
anya-e0601n:751_9: Āgatā brahmā ca abrahmā cāti brahmābrahmāgatā, tesaṃ.
anya-e0601n:752_6: Uttamāya manāpabhūtavācāya dhammaṃ desetīti attho. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:753_1: Tañhi apāyādi dukkhaṃ pāpetīti pāpoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:753_4: Kusaladhammena hātabbaṃ caji tabbanti hīnanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:754_3: so hi lokayati patiṭṭhahati pavattati vā ettha puññāpuññaṃ tabbipāko cāti loko,
anya-e0601n:754_9: tesaṃ sattalokānaṃ abhiadhikaṃ ramanti etthāti lokālokābhirāmo. Munindo, taṃ.
anya-e0601n:754_10: So hi tilokānaṃ pūjānuggahādikaraṇavasena abhirāmaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti lokālokābhirāmanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:755_1: Devādevātidevaṃ sammutidevaupapattidevānaṃ atiuttamaṃ visuddhidevabhūtaṃ nidhanavapudharaṃ antimakāyadhāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:755_2: mārabhaṅgaṃ devaputtādipañcamāre viddhaṃsanaṃ abhaṅgaṃ mārasenāya bhañjituṃ asamatthaṃ,
anya-e0601n:755_7: bodhipattaṃ arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇaṃ gataṃ adhipattaṃ sadevake loke sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ gataṃ,
anya-e0601n:755_8: brahmā brahmāgatānaṃ payirupāsanavasena āgatānaṃ brahmadeva manussaparisānaṃ varagirakathikaṃ seṭṭhavācāya
anya-e0601n:755_9: dhammaṃ desamānaṃ pāpahīnaṃ lāmakaakusalakilesaṃ pahīnaṃ arahattamagga ñāṇena susamucchinnaṃ lokālokābhirāmaṃ
anya-e0601n:755_11: munindaṃ pañcamunissaraṃ taṃ munindaṃ satataṃ niccaṃ abhiṇhaṃ ahaṃ abhiname abhisakkaccaṃ namāmīti.
anya-e0601n:768_0: Sattappīno ca dīghaṅguli matha sugato lomakūpekalomo,
anya-e0601n:771_0: Nātho uṇhīsasīso itiguṇasahitaṃ taṃ mahesiṃ namāmi.
anya-e0601n:772_1: Evaṃ dvāvīsatimāya gāthāya munindassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni buddho nigrodhabimbotyādīhi tīhi gāthāhi buddhassa
anya-e0601n:772_2: dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasampannehi guṇehi thomitvā mahesiṃ vanditukāmo buddho nigrodhabimbotyādigāthāttayamāha.
anya-e0601n:773_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ buddhoti paṭividdhacatusaccadhammo paṭividdhaniravasesasabbadhammo vā.
anya-e0601n:773_1: Taṃ pana padaṃ nigrodhabimbo tyādīsu padesu tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:773_2: So hi cattāri saccāni bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissatīti ca,
anya-e0601n:773_3: niravasesasabbadhamme bujjhati abujjhi bujjhissatīti ca buddhoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:773_4: Tesu pana dvīsu vikappesu paṭhamavikappe budhadhātussa vāccaṃ catusaccadhammapaṭivijjhanaṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ mukhyena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:773_7: Tapaccayassa vāccaṃ tena mukhyopacārena upalakkhito aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkāraṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paṭicca buddhobuddhoti paññatto sattaviseso labbhati.
anya-e0601n:773_8: Dutiya vikappe budhadhātussa vāccaṃ sabbañeyyadhammapaṭivijjhanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ mukhyena labbhati.
anya-e0601n:773_11: Tapaccayassa vāccaṃ tena mukhyopacārena upalakkhito aparimāṇaguṇoghālaṅkataṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paṭicca buddhobuddhoti paññatto sattaviseso labbhati.
anya-e0601n:773_12: Kiṃpanettha budhadhātussa vāccabhūtaṃ ñāṇameva buddho nāma hoti.
anya-e0601n:773_13: Udāhu tapaccayassa vāccabhūto khandhasantāno buddho nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:773_14: Ñāṇena pana malakara kilesānaṃ savāsanānaṃ niravasesaṃ pahīnattā citta santāno suddho hoti.
anya-e0601n:773_15: Tassa pana suddhattā tassa nissayabhūto rūpakāyopi suddho hoti.
anya-e0601n:773_16: Tasmā tapaccayassa vāccabhūto arahattamaggañāṇādīnaṃ ādhārabhūto khandhasantāno nāmapaññattivohārena buddho nāmāti.
anya-e0601n:774_0: “Sabbesu dhammesu appaṭihatañāṇa nimittānuttaravimokkhādhigamaparibhāvitaṃ khandhasantānaṃ upādāya paṇṇattiko
anya-e0601n:774_1: sabbaññutapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paṇṇattiko sattaviseso buddho”ti.
anya-e0601n:775_0: Paramatthabhūte hi khandhasantāne vohārasukhatthaṃ satta puggalādivohāro āropito.
anya-e0601n:775_1: Evaṃ vohārappatto satto yāva bodhiñāṇatthāya na vāyamati,
anya-e0601n:775_9: Tasmā paññattisaṅkhāto khandhasantāno buddho nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:775_10: Vuttañhi mahāniddese “buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ,
anya-e0601n:775_18: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutañāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddhoti taṃ buddha”nti.
anya-e0601n:775_19: Atha vā paṭṭhānanayena vā nānantarikanayena vā ñāṇappadhāno suvisuddhakhandhasantāno buddho nāmāti atthopi yujjatevāti.
anya-e0601n:776_8: Nigrodhassa parimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalo bimbo sarīro yassāti nigrodhabimbo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:776_10: Yathā hi paṇṇāsahatthatāya vā satahatthatāya vā samakkhandhasākho nigrodho dīghatopi vitthāratopi ekappamāṇova hoti,
anya-e0601n:776_12: Yathā aññesaṃ kāyo vā dīgho hoti,
anya-e0601n:776_13: byāmo vā na evaṃ visamappamāṇoti attho.
anya-e0601n:776_14: Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo.
anya-e0601n:777_2: Atha vā mudeti modayati satteti mudu,
anya-e0601n:777_5: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karoti etenāti karo,
anya-e0601n:777_6: hattho carati gacchati etena taṃ taṃ ṭhānanti caraṇo, pādo.
anya-e0601n:777_8: Mudukaro ca caraṇo ca yassāti mudukaracaraṇo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:777_9: Sappi maṇḍe osāritvā ṭhapitaṃ satavāraṃ vihatakappāsapaṭalaṃ viya mudujātamattakumārassa viya ca niccakālaṃ muduhattha pādoti attho.
anya-e0601n:778_1: Brahmaghosoti brahmuno saro viya aṭṭhaṅga sampannasaravantoti attho.
anya-e0601n:778_7: so viya ghoso saro yassāti brahmaghoso, buddho.
anya-e0601n:778_8: Yathā hi mahābrahmuno pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā saro visuddho hoti,
anya-e0601n:778_9: evameva tathāgatenapi kataṃ kammaṃ vatthuṃ sodheti,
anya-e0601n:778_10: vatthussa suddhattā nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saro visuddho aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:779_6: Eṇimigassa jaṅgho viya jaṅgho yassa soti eṇijaṅgho, buddho.
anya-e0601n:779_7: Yathā hi eṇimigassa jaṅgho suvaṭṭo hoti,
anya-e0601n:779_10: Samantato samasaṇṭhitena maṃsena parikkhittāhi suvaṭṭitāhi sāli gabbhayavagabbhasadisāhi jaṅghāhi samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:780_1: Usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ aṅgajāto viya suvaṇṇapaduma kaṇṇikasadisena vatthakosena paṭicchannena guyhaṅgajātena samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:780_8: Kosacchādaṃ aṅgajātaṃ byañjanaṃ yassāti kosacchādaṅgajāto, buddho.
anya-e0601n:780_9: Bhagavato hi usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ aṅgajāto viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇi kasadisena kosohitavatthaguyhena byañjanena samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:780_16: So hi sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:781_0: Suppatiṭṭhitapādoti suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitapādo.
anya-e0601n:781_1: Samaṃ suṭṭhu bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhatīti suppatiṭṭhito, pādo.
anya-e0601n:781_2: Su pati pubbo ṭhā dhātu gatinivattiyaṃ ta.
anya-e0601n:781_6: Yathā hi aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapentānaṃ aggatalaṃ vā paṇhiṃ vā passaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ phusati vemajjhaṃ vā pana chiddaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:781_9: Tassa pana suvaṇṇapādukatalaṃ viya ekappahāreneva sakalapādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati,
anya-e0601n:781_11: Sacepi hi bhagavā anekasataporisaṃ narakaṃ akkamissāmīti pādaṃ nīharati,
anya-e0601n:781_12: tāvadeva ninnaṭṭhānaṃ vātapūritaṃ viya kammārabhastaṃ unnamitvā pathavīsamaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:781_14: dūre akkamissāmīti abhinīharantassa sineruppamāṇopi pabbato seditavetthaṅkuro viya namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0601n:781_15: Tathā hissa yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā yugandharapabbataṃ akkamissāmīti pāde abhinīharato pabbato namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgato.
anya-e0601n:781_16: So taṃ akkamitvā dutiyapādena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ akkami.
anya-e0601n:781_17: Na hi cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ visamaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0601n:781_18: Khāṇu vā kaṇḍako vā sakkharakathalā vā uccārapassāvo vā kheḷasiṅghaṇikādīni vā purimatarāva apagacchanti.
anya-e0601n:781_20: Tathāgatassa hi sīlatejena paññātejena dhammatejena dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ ānubhāvena ayaṃ mahāpathavī samā mudu pupphākiṇṇā honti.
anya-e0601n:782_0: Mūdo dātuṇṇalomoti muda odāta uṇṇalomoti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:782_1: Bhamukantare jāto saṇhasukhumo seto suddho uṇṇalomavantoti attho.
anya-e0601n:782_3: Atha vā mudeti mudayati satteti mudo, sukhumo.
anya-e0601n:782_11: Uṇṇasaddo hi loke lomasaddapariyāyoti vadanti ācariyā.
anya-e0601n:782_17: uṇṇā ca sā lomo cāti uṇṇalomo,
anya-e0601n:782_19: Mudo dāto uṇṇalomo yassa soti mudodātuṇṇa lomo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:782_20: Uṇṇālomaṃ pana bhagavato dvinnaṃ bhamukānaṃ vemajjhe nāsimatthakeyeva jātaṃ.
anya-e0601n:782_22: Sappimaṇḍe osāretvā ṭhapitasata vitatakappāsapaṭalaṃ viya mudaṃ.
anya-e0601n:782_23: Parisuddhaosadhitārakavaṇṇaṃ viya ca sippalitūlalatātūlaṃ viya ca vigatamalena odātaṃ uṇṇālomaṃ atthi,
anya-e0601n:783_0: “Uṇṇā kho panassa bhoto gotamassa bhamukantare jātā odātā mudu tūlasannibhā”ti.
anya-e0601n:784_0: Taṃ panetaṃ koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ upaḍḍha bāhuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:784_1: Vissaṭṭhaṃ dakkhiṇāvaṭṭavasena āvaṭṭitvā uddhaggā hutvā santiṭṭhati.
anya-e0601n:784_3: suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhammamānaṃ khīradhāraṃ viya aruṇappabhārañjite gaganatale osadhitārakaṃ viya ca atimanoharāya siriyā virocati,
anya-e0601n:785_2: So hi sundaravācaṃ gadati vadatīti sugatoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:785_4: Brahmuno uju uggataattabhāvo viya ujumeva uggataattabhāvo dīghasarīroti attho.
anya-e0601n:785_6: Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca brahmujugattoti brahmā viya ujugatto ujumeva uggatadīghasarīroti vivarati.
anya-e0601n:786_8: Āhito āropito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, sarīro.
anya-e0601n:786_9: Āpubba dhā dhātu ropane manipaccayo tupaccayo vā.
anya-e0601n:786_11: Atha vā sukhadukkhaṃ adati anubhavatīti attā.
anya-e0601n:786_16: Khyādīhi manimaca tovāti suttena padasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:786_17: Attāti abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca bhavanti etasmāti attabhāvo, rūpakāyo.
anya-e0601n:786_18: Anuṭīkāyaṃ pana “āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā,
anya-e0601n:786_19: soeva bhavati uppajjati na paraparikappito viya niccoti attabhāvo.
anya-e0601n:786_20: Attāti vā diṭṭhigatikehi gahetabbākārena bhavati pavattatīti attabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:786_21: Brahmuno ujumeva uggato attabhāvo viya ujumeva uggato attabhāvo yassa soti brahmujuggattabhāvo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:786_22: Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇusūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti.
anya-e0601n:786_26: eke mukhaṃ unnametvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti,
anya-e0601n:786_29: tathāgato pana ujumeva uggantvā dīghappamāṇo devanagare ussitasuvaṇṇa toraṇaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0601n:787_2: Ikkhati passati anena rūpārammaṇaṃ samavisamaṃ vāti akkhi, nettaṃ.
anya-e0601n:787_5: Nīlā atinīlā akkhi nettā yassāti nīlakkhi, sugato.
anya-e0601n:787_7: Nīlayuttaṭṭhāne panassa ummārapupphasadisena ativisuddhena nīlavaṇṇena samannāgatāni akkhīni honti.
anya-e0601n:787_11: Kāḷa yuttaṭṭhāne addāriṭṭhakasadisena kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatāni suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjarasadisāni khāyanti.
anya-e0601n:787_17: odāto ca vaṇṇo akkhilomāni ca bhagavato,
anya-e0601n:787_19: Taṃ nīlaṃ hoti sunīlaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ ummārapupphasamānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:787_20: Tassa parato pītakaṃ hoti supītakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ kaṇikārapupphasamānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:787_21: Ubhato akkhikuṭāni bhagavato lohitakāni honti sulohikāni pāsādikāni dassaneyyāni indagopakasamānāni.
anya-e0601n:787_22: Majjhe kaṇhaṃ hoti sukaṇhaṃ alūkhaṃ suddhaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ addāriṭṭhaka samānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:787_23: Tassa parato odātaṃ hoti suodātaṃ setaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ osadhitārakasamāna”nti.
anya-e0601n:787_24: Bhagavā pana tena maṃsacakkhunā caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakārepi samantā yojanaṃ passati divā ceva rattiñca.
anya-e0601n:789_0: “Tena bhagavā pākatikena maṃsacakkhunā attabhāva pariyāpannena purimasucaritakammābhinibbattena samantā yojanaṃ passati divā ceva rattiñca.
anya-e0601n:789_6: evarūpepi caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre samantā yojanaṃ passati.
anya-e0601n:789_7: Natthi so kuṭṭo vā kavāṭaṃ vā pākāro vā pabbato vā gaccho vā latā vā āvaraṇaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanāyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:790_5: Ṇvādimoggallāne pana “paṇa byavahārathutīsu hi paṇiyati vohāriyatīti paṇhi,
anya-e0601n:790_7: Dīghā paṇhi yassa soti dīghapaṇhi, sugato.
anya-e0601n:790_8: Yathā hi aññesaṃ agga pādo dīgho hoti.
anya-e0601n:790_9: Paṇhimatthake jaṅghā patiṭṭhāti paṇhiṃ tacchetvā ṭhapitā viya hoti.
anya-e0601n:790_11: Tathāgatassa pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā aggapādā honti.
anya-e0601n:790_13: Catutthe koṭṭhāse āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitā viya rattakambale geṇḍukasadisā paṇhi hoti.
anya-e0601n:791_3: Atha vā sukhayati saṇhabhāvenāti sukhumaṃ, saṇhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:791_10: Chada dhātu saṃvaraṇe ravapaccayo īpaccayo ca.
anya-e0601n:791_11: Sukhumā saṇhā amalā malavirahitā chavī yassāti sukhumamalachavī, sugato.
anya-e0601n:791_12: Bhagavato hi suvaṇṇasiniddhasaṇhasarīrattā kañcanasannibha tacattā ca rūpakāye padumapalāse udakabindhu viya rajojallaṃ vā malaṃ vā na limpati.
anya-e0601n:792_0: “Sukhumacchavī kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo sukhumattā chaviyā rajojallaṃ kāye na upalimpatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:793_4: Madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ gasenti anto pavesentīti rasaggasā, nhāru.
anya-e0601n:793_6: Atha vā rasaṃ gasati harati etehīti rasaggasā, nhāru.
anya-e0601n:793_12: Thomyo rasaggasaggī yassa soti thomyarasaggasaggī, sugato.
anya-e0601n:793_13: Tathāgatassa hi sattarasaharaṇisahassāni uddhaggāni hutvā gīvāyameva paṭimukkāni.
anya-e0601n:793_14: Tilaphalamattopi āhāro jivhagge ṭhapito sabbaṃ kāyaṃ anupharati.
anya-e0601n:793_15: Teneva mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa ekataṇḍulādīhipi kaḷāyayūsapasatenapi kāyassa yāpanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:793_16: Aññesaṃ pana tathā abhāvā na sakalakāyaṃ ojā pharati.
anya-e0601n:793_18: Idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ appābādhatāsaṅkhātassa nissandaphalassavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0601n:795_2: Tassa pana padassa samacattālīsaggadantotyādīhi padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:795_6: Atha vā uttamabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, danto.
anya-e0601n:795_10: Samacattālīsaṃ aggo uttamo danto yassāti cattālīsaggadanto, jino.
anya-e0601n:795_11: Uparimahanuke patiṭṭhitā dantā vīsati heṭṭhime vīsatīti samacattālīsadantā hontīti attho.
anya-e0601n:796_0: Samakalapanajoti kakacena chinditvā ṭhapito viya samadantoti attho.
anya-e0601n:796_3: Tasmiṃ lapane mukhe jātoti lapanajo, danto.
anya-e0601n:796_5: samako lapanajo danto yassāti samakalapanajo, jino.
anya-e0601n:796_10: Tathāgatassa pana ayapaṭṭachinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viya samā honti.
anya-e0601n:797_1: Gāthābandhavasena chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ pakārāgamaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:797_2: Dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhe paripuṇṇapiṭṭhitaloti attho.
anya-e0601n:798_3: Sarīrassa avayavabhāvena anati gacchati pavattatīti vā aṃso,
anya-e0601n:798_4: dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhanti antaraṃso,
anya-e0601n:798_7: Piṇadhātu pinane pūraṇe vā ṇa. Ṇassa no.
anya-e0601n:798_8: Dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhe pīnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ piṭṭhitalaṃ yassāti antaraṃsappapīno, jino.
anya-e0601n:798_12: Tathāgatassa pana kaṭito paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ yāva khandhā uggamma samussitasuvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya piṭṭhiṃ chādetvā patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:798_15: Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca “citantaraṃ soti antaraṃsaṃ vuccati dvinnaṃ koṭṭānamantaraṃ.
anya-e0601n:799_2: Cakkena aṭṭhasatapādacakkena aṅkito lakkhito pādo yena soti cakkenaṅkitapādo, jino.
anya-e0601n:799_5: Tathāgatassa pādataleeva vicitraṃ aṭṭhasata pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ atthi.
anya-e0601n:800_0: Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “heṭṭhā kho pana tassa bhoto gotamassa pādatalesu cakkāni jātāni sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabbākāraparipūrānī”ti.
anya-e0601n:800_1: Aṭṭhasatapādacakkalakkhaṇasarūpaṃ pana yo pādapaṅkajamuduttalarā jikehīti gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttamevāti.
anya-e0601n:801_6: Daṃsati vidaṃsati khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā etenāti dasano, danto.
anya-e0601n:801_9: Aviraḷo dasano danto yassāti aviraḷadasano, jino.
anya-e0601n:801_10: Aññesañhi kumbhilānaṃ viya dantā viraḷā honti.
anya-e0601n:801_12: Tathāgatassa pana kanakalatāya samussāpitavajira panti viya aviraḷā tulikāya dassitaparicchedā viya dantā honti,
anya-e0601n:802_1: Ettha ca mārajīti pañcamārajitavā buddho kattubhūto.
anya-e0601n:802_2: So hi pañcamāre jitavāti mārajīti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:802_3: Ussaṅkhapādoti pādassa upari ṭhitena saṅkhasadisattā saṅkhanāmikena gopphakena samannāgatoti attho.
anya-e0601n:802_6: Apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “saṃsuṭṭhuṃ khādanto khaṇanto gacchatīti saṅkhe.
anya-e0601n:802_7: Samuddajalapariyante caramāno gacchati caratīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:802_9: Pādassa uddhaṃ upari ṭhitaṃ saṅkhasadisaṃ gopphaka massāti ussaṅkhapādo, jino.
anya-e0601n:802_10: Vuttañhi brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “uddhaṃ patiṭṭhitagopphakattā ussaṅkhā pādā assāti ussaṅkhapādo”ti.
anya-e0601n:802_12: Tena tesaṃ pādā āṇibaddhā viya baddhā honti.
anya-e0601n:802_15: Tathāgatassa pana abhirūhitvā upari gopphakā patiṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0601n:802_16: Tenassa nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapita suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya niccalo hoti.
anya-e0601n:802_19: Puratopi pacchato ubhayapassesupi ṭhatvā passantānaṃ pādatalāni paññāyanti.
anya-e0601n:803_0: Tiṭṭhanto nonamantobhayakaramudunā jaṇṇukānāma santoti ettha tiṭṭhanto no namanto ubhaya karamudunā jaṇṇukāni āmasantoti padavibhāgo.
anya-e0601n:803_10: Ettha ca tiṭṭhanto nonamantoti iminā tathāgatassa akhujjaavāmanabhāvo dīpito.
anya-e0601n:803_11: Avasesajanā hi khujjā vā honti vāmanā vā.
anya-e0601n:803_12: Khujjānaṃ uparimakāyo aparipuṇṇo hoti vāmanānaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo.
anya-e0601n:803_13: Te aparipuṇṇakāyattā na sakkonti nonamanto jaṇṇukāni parimajjituṃ.
anya-e0601n:804_5: Bhojanaṃ khādati etena galenāti khandho, galo.
anya-e0601n:804_10: Vaṭṭo samaparimaṇḍalo khandho galo yassāti vaṭṭakkhandho, jino.
anya-e0601n:804_11: Yathā hi eke koñcā viya bakā viya varāhā viya ca dīghagalā vaṅkagalā puthugalā ca honti.
anya-e0601n:804_15: Tathāgatassa pana suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāliṅgasadiso khandho galo hoti.
anya-e0601n:804_17: Meghassa viya gajjato saro mahā hoti.
anya-e0601n:805_1: Tassa pana padassa gotaruṇapakhumakotyādīhi padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:805_2: Gotaruṇapakhumakoti taṃmuhuttajātaratta vacchassa cakkhubhaṇḍo viya vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍo,
anya-e0601n:805_4: Ettha ca pakhumakoti sakalaṃ cakkhubhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0601n:805_8: Akkhidale hi pana saddhiṃ akkhibimbanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:805_14: Atha vā akkhino pakkhadvaye jātanti pakhumaṃ, pamhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:805_18: Gotaruṇassa taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa pakhumaṃ viya pakhumaṃ yassa soti gotaruṇapakhumako, jino.
anya-e0601n:805_19: Gotaruṇassa taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa pakhumasadisaṃ vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍaṃ atthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:805_21: Hatthimūsikakākādīnaṃ akkhisadisehi viniggatehi gambhīrehipi akkhīhi samannāgatā.
anya-e0601n:805_22: Tathāgatassa pana dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya mudusiniddhanīla sukhumapakhumācitāni akkhīni honti.
anya-e0601n:806_4: Atha vā sūkaramahiṃsādayo satte hiṃsatīti sīho.
anya-e0601n:806_7: Atha vā sabbiriyāpathesu daḷhavīriyattā suṭṭhu īhati vāyamatīti sīho,
anya-e0601n:806_12: Sīhassa pubbaḍḍhe jāto kāyo viya paripuṇṇakāyo yassāti sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyo, jino.
anya-e0601n:806_13: Yathā hi sīhassa pubbaḍḍhakāyova paripuṇṇo hoti,
anya-e0601n:806_18: Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa pubbaḍḍhakāyoiva sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo.
anya-e0601n:806_19: Sopi sīhasseva na tattha tattha vinatunnatādivasena dussaṇṭhita visaṇṭhito.
anya-e0601n:806_22: Vuttañhetaṃ “manāpiye ca kho bhikkhave kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite yehi aṅgehi dīghehi sobhati,
anya-e0601n:806_28: Iti nānācittena puññacittena cittito dasahi pāramīhi sajjito tathāgatassa attabhāvo tassa loke sabbasippino
anya-e0601n:806_29: vā iddhimanto vā patirūpakampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0601n:808_2: Tassa pana padassa sattappīnotyādīhi padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:808_3: Sattappīnoti dvihatthapāda aṃsakūṭa ekagalavasena sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsikoti attho.
anya-e0601n:808_4: Ācariyā pana paripuṇṇadvihatthapāda aṃsakūṭa khandhasaṅkhātasattaṭṭhānoti atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0601n:808_9: Dve hatthapiṭṭhiyo dve pādapiṭṭhiyo dve aṃsakūṭāni ekagalo cāti sattasu ṭhānesu pīno paripuṇṇo maṃso assāti sattapīno,
anya-e0601n:808_11: Aññesañhi hatthapādapiṭṭhīsu nhārujālā paññāyanti aṃsakūṭagalesu aṭṭhikoṭiyo.
anya-e0601n:808_14: Tathāgato pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadattā niguḷanhārujālehi hatthapiṭṭhādīhi vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasuvaṇṇavaṇṇāliṅgasadisena
anya-e0601n:808_15: galena sīlārūpakaṃ viya cittakammarūpakaṃ viya ca khāyati,
anya-e0601n:809_1: Tassa pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:810_3: Aṅgati taṃ taṃ kāyaṅgaṃ parāmasati etāyāti vā aṅguli,
anya-e0601n:810_6: Atha vā aṅgaṃ kāyaṅgaṃ ulati gacchati parāmasati etāyāti aṅguli,
anya-e0601n:810_9: Samadīghā aṅguli hattha pādaṅguli yassa soti dīghaṅguli, sugato.
anya-e0601n:810_11: Yathā hi aññesaṃ kāci aṅguli dīghā hoti kāci rassā,
anya-e0601n:810_13: Tathāgatassa pana makkaṭasseva dīghahatthapādaṅguliyo mūle thūlā anupubbena gantvā agge tanukā niyyāsatelena
anya-e0601n:811_16: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jāto ekeka lomo yassāti lomakūpekalomo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:811_17: Yathā hi aññesaṃ ekekasmimpi lomakūpe anekāni lomāni jāyanti,
anya-e0601n:811_19: Tathāgatassa pana ekekasmiṃ lomakūpe ekekalomo jāyati.
anya-e0601n:811_20: Vuttañhi brahmāyusutte “ekekalomo kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo.
anya-e0601n:812_11: Sampanno ca odāto ca dāṭho yassāti sampanno dātadāṭho, sugato.
anya-e0601n:812_13: Tena kāci dāṭhā kāḷāpi vivaṇṇāpi honti.
anya-e0601n:812_14: Tathāgato pana sukkadāṭho osadhitārakampi atikkamma virocamānāya pabhāya samannāgatadāṭho hoti.
anya-e0601n:813_2: Kaniyati icchiyati manusse hīti vā kanakaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:813_6: Tacati maṃsaṃ chādeti saṃvarati vāti taco,
anya-e0601n:813_7: tacati dibbati suvaṇṇobhāsenāti vā taco, cammaṃ.
anya-e0601n:813_9: Kanakena suvaṇṇena samo sadiso taco yassāti kanaka samataco, sugato.
anya-e0601n:813_10: Yathā hi aññesaṃ taco koci nīlataco setataco pītataco hoti,
anya-e0601n:813_12: Tathāgatassa pana jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā nisadāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā ṭhapita ghanasuvaṇṇarūpakaṃ viya kañcanasadisataco hoti.
anya-e0601n:813_14: Ettha ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
anya-e0601n:813_15: kañcanena sannibhaṃ sadisaṃ tacamassāti kañcanasannibhattacoti vacanattho kātabbo.
anya-e0601n:813_16: Ettha ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇanti iminā tathāgatassa ghanasiniddhasaṇhasarīrataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:814_1: Nīlaṃ uddhaṃ aggā koṭi hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamāno viya ṭhitalomo,
anya-e0601n:814_2: nīlāni uddhaṃ aggāni koṭīni hutvā ṭhitāni lomāni yassāti nīlamuddhaggalomo, sugato.
anya-e0601n:814_3: Yathā hi aññesaṃ lomāni heṭṭhā aggāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0601n:814_5: Tathāgatassa pana lomāni āvaṭṭapariyosāne uddhaṃ aggāni hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamānāni viya tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0601n:814_7: Uddhaggāni lomāni jātāni nīlāni añjanavaṇṇāni kuṇḍalāvaṭṭāni padakkhiṇāvaṭṭakajātānī”ti.
anya-e0601n:815_1: So hi anaññabuddho hutvā sāmaṃyeva cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti sambuddhoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:815_2: Tassa pana padassa thūlajivhotyādīhi tīhi padehi tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:816_1: Gāthābandhavasena hi mududīghasaddalopaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:816_2: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mudujivhā dīghā thūlā vaṇṇa sampannā”ti.
anya-e0601n:816_13: Jīvitaavhāti vattabbe niruttinayena vitasaddalopaṃ katvā jivhāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:816_14: Thūlā mahantā dīghā mudukā jivhā yassāti thūlajivho,
anya-e0601n:816_16: Aññesañhi jivhā thūlāpi hoti kisāpi rassāpi thaddhāpi visamāpi.
anya-e0601n:816_17: Tathāgatassa pana mudujivhā dīghā puthulā vaṇṇa sampannā hoti.
anya-e0601n:816_18: So taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ āgatānaṃ brahmāyubrāhmaṇādīnaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ jivhāya mudukattā taṃ
anya-e0601n:816_19: jivhaṃ kathinasūci viya vaṭṭetvā ubhopi nāsikāsotāni parāmasati,
anya-e0601n:816_23: evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ jivhaṃ sandhāya thūla jivhoti thometi.
anya-e0601n:817_2: Sīhahanukoti sīhassa heṭṭhā hanu viya paripuṇṇa hanuko.
anya-e0601n:817_6: Sīhassa heṭṭhā hanu viya hanu yassāti sīhahanuko,
anya-e0601n:817_11: Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa heṭṭhimaṃ viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni honti.
anya-e0601n:818_0: Jālikappādahatthoti kusalena vaḍḍhakinā vātapāne sammāyojitajālaṃ viya cammena appaṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro.
anya-e0601n:818_3: Jālaṃ assa atthi tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti jālikaṃ,
anya-e0601n:818_9: Taṃ taṃ bhāraṃ haratīti hattho, karo.
anya-e0601n:818_13: Kusalena vaḍḍhakinā vātapāne sammāyojitāni jālasadisāni hatthapādaṅgulantarāni honti.
anya-e0601n:818_15: Ettha jālikappādahatthaṅgulantaranti vattabbe uttarapadalopena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:818_16: Cammena paṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro hi phaṇahatthako purisadosena upahato pabbajjampi na labhati.
anya-e0601n:818_17: Tathāgatassa pana catasso hatthaṅguliyo pañcapi pādaṅguliyo ekappamāṇā honti.
anya-e0601n:818_18: Tāsaṃ ekappamāṇa tāya yavalakkhaṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0601n:818_19: Athassa hatthapādā kusalena vaḍḍhakinā sammāyojitajālavāta pānasadisā honti,
anya-e0601n:819_1: So hi nāthati vineyyānaṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācati,
anya-e0601n:819_5: veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ vā āsīsatīti nāthoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:819_6: Vuttañhi saddanītiyaṃ “nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsisane cāti catūsvatthesu pavattatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:820_0: Tassa pana padassa uṇhīsasīsotipadena tulyaliṅgattabhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:820_1: Uṇhīsasīsoti rañño baddhauṇhīsa paṭṭo viya virocamāno pakatimaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhāto uṇhīsapaṭṭasīso.
anya-e0601n:825_0: Tattha ca avijjamānassa āgamā vaṇṇāgamo nāma.
anya-e0601n:825_4: Tattha tattha yathāyogaṃ visesatthayogo dhātūnaṃ atthātisaya yogo nāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0601n:825_5: Ettha pana nakārassa ṇakāraṃ katattā vaṇṇavikāroti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:825_9: Rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭena veṭhitasīso viya sīso yassāti uṇhīsasīso.
anya-e0601n:825_10: Atha vā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍalasīso yassāti uṇhīsasīso, nātho.
anya-e0601n:826_0: Vuttañhi brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “uṇhīsasīsoti idaṃ paripuṇṇanalāṭañceva paripuṇṇasīsañcāti dve atthavase paṭicca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:826_1: Tathāgatassa hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalaṃ nalāṭaṃ chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāya patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:826_3: Pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ viditvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0601n:826_11: Tathāgatassa pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapupphulasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:826_13: Dutiyanayena uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍala sīsoti uṇhīsasīso”ti.
anya-e0601n:826_15: yasmā buddhā cakkavattino ca paripuṇṇa nalāṭatāya paripuṇṇasīsabimbatāya uṇhīsasīsāti vuccanti.
anya-e0601n:826_16: Tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca uṇhīsasīsoti vutta”nti vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0601n:827_0: Itiguṇasahitanti iminā vuttappakārena nigrodhabimbotyādinā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaguṇena sampannaṃ.
anya-e0601n:827_2: Tena saha ito pattoti itiguṇasahito, mahesī.
anya-e0601n:827_3: Aññe hi dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi sampannā na honti,
anya-e0601n:827_4: cakkavattirājāno mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi sampannāpi ṭhapetvā kosohitavattha guyhalakkhaṇaṃ avasesehi sampannā honti.
anya-e0601n:827_6: Tasmā bhagavantaṃyeva itiguṇasahitanti thomanaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:827_7: Taṃ mahesinti sīlakkhandhādike ca nibbānañca esati gavesatīti mahesī.
anya-e0601n:827_8: Taṃ mahesiṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:829_1: Ayaṃ pana imāsu tīsu gāthāsu saṅkhepatthayojanā.
anya-e0601n:829_2: Buddho kattubhūto nigrodhabimbo nigrodhassa parimaṇḍalo viya parimaṇḍalasarīro mudukaracaraṇo saṇhahatthapādo,
anya-e0601n:829_5: kosacchādaṅgajāto usabhavāraṇā dīnaṃ aṅgajāto viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisena vatthakosena paṭicchannena guyhaṅgajātena samannāgato,
anya-e0601n:829_7: sugato buddho suppatiṭṭhitapādo suvaṇṇa pādukatalamiva bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitapādo,
anya-e0601n:829_8: mūdo dātuṇṇalomo bhamukantare jāto saṇhasukhumo seto suddho uṇṇalomavanto,
anya-e0601n:829_11: brahmujuggattabhāvo brahmuno ujuuggata attabhāvo viya ujumeva attabhāvo,
anya-e0601n:830_3: samakalapanajo kakacena chinditvā ṭhapito viya samadanto,
anya-e0601n:830_4: antaraṃsappapīno dvinnaṃ aṃsānaṃ khandhānaṃ antaraṃ vemajjhe paripuṇṇapiṭṭhitalo,
anya-e0601n:830_8: ussaṅkhapādo pādassa upari ṭhitena saṅkhasadisattā saṅkhanāmikena gopphakena samannāgato,
anya-e0601n:830_9: tiṭṭhanto ṭhitakova nonamanto anamamāno hutvā ubhayakaramudunā sukhumena hatthadvayena jaṇṇukāni jaṅghāni āmasanto parimajjituṃ sakkonto,
anya-e0601n:830_11: gotaruṇa pakhumako taṃmuhuttajātarattavacchassa cakkhubhaṇḍo viya vippasannacakkhubhaṇḍo,
anya-e0601n:831_4: atha tadaññaṃ loma kūpekalomo ekekalomakūpe ekekajātalomo,
anya-e0601n:831_6: kanaka samataco suvaṇṇena sadisacammo nīlamuddhaggalomo nīlaṃ uddhaṃ aggā koṭi hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamāno viya ṭhitalomo,
anya-e0601n:831_11: jālikappāda hattho kusalena vaḍḍhakinā vātapāne sammāyojita jālaṃ viya cammena appaṭibaddhahatthapādaṅgulantaro,
anya-e0601n:831_13: uṇhīsasīso rañño uṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocamāno pakatimaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhāto uṇhīsapaṭṭasīso,
anya-e0601n:831_14: iti guṇasahitaṃ evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaguṇena samannāgataṃ taṃ mahesiṃ buddhaṃ tīhi dvārehi ahaṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:833_0: Imissaṃ pana namakkārapāḷiyaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ buddhavacanapāḷiyaṃ āgatanayānukkamena na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:833_1: Gāthābandhavasena chandānurakkhaṇatthameva pana nigrodhabimbotyādinā akkamena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:833_2: Tasmā pātheyyavagge lakkhaṇasutte vuttaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇakkamaṃ saṅkhepena dassayissāma bahussutapaññāvaḍḍhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:835_9: ṭhitakova anonamanto ubhohi pāṇitalehi jāṇukāni parimasati 10.
anya-e0601n:835_31: uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā odātā mudutūla sannibhā 32.
anya-e0601n:835_33: Imāni pana bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni pāramīpuññakammena yathārahaṃ kammasarikkhakaṃ labbhantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0601n:835_34: Tāni pana kammāni pātheyyavagge lakkhaṇasutte vuttāni,
anya-e0601n:839_0: Loke tasmā vibhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ sādhavo patthayantā;
anya-e0601n:840_0: Iṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ vahantaṃ suranaramahitaṃ nibbhayaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:841_0: Lokānaṃ nandivaḍḍhaṃ dasabalamasamaṃ taṃ namassantu niccaṃ.
anya-e0601n:842_1: Evaṃ sugatantiādīhi pañcavīsativandanagāthāhi buddhassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni tassa vandane uyyojanaṃ karonto āha buddho buddhotighoso tyādigāthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:843_0: Tattha pana loke buddho buddhoti ghoso atidulabhataro buddhabhāvo kā kathāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:843_1: Ettha ca loketi manussaloke tiloke vā anantacakkavāḷa loke vā.
anya-e0601n:843_2: Buddho buddhotighosoti buddho buddho iti kittisaddo thutisaddo vā.
anya-e0601n:843_11: Buddho buddho iti pavatto ghoso thutighosoti buddhobuddhotighoso.
anya-e0601n:843_13: Dullabhataroti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ lakāralopena dulabhataroti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:843_22: Buddhā hi loke kadāci karahaci uppajjanti.
anya-e0601n:843_23: Tasmā buddho buddhoti ghoso atidulabhataroti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:843_24: Vuttañhetaṃ cūḷavaggakhandhake “ghosopi kho eso gahapati dullabho lokasmiṃ,
anya-e0601n:843_26: Yathā ca hi loke udumbarikapupphaṃ dullabhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:845_0: Vāyasānaṃ yathā khīraṃ, dullabhaṃ lokanāyaka”nti ca;
anya-e0601n:847_0: Kiñcāpi hi loke cakkavattirājūnaṃ uppajjamāno dullabho.
anya-e0601n:847_1: Ekasmimpi pana kappe cakkavattirājāno anekā uppajjanti.
anya-e0601n:847_2: Tathāgatā pana loke uppajjamānāpi ekasmiṃ kappe eka dviti catu pañca buddhāyeva uppajjanti,
anya-e0601n:847_4: Yasmā hi asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe tathāgatasuñño hoti.
anya-e0601n:847_5: Tasmā tathāgatasseva kadāci karahaci uppajjanato buddhobuddhotighoso atidulabhataro kā kathā buddhabhāvoti vutto.
anya-e0601n:847_6: Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā mahāparinibbānasamaye “devatā ānanda ujjhāyanti.
anya-e0601n:847_7: Durāvatamhā āgatā tathāgataṃ dassanāya kadāci karahaci tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā.
anya-e0601n:847_8: Ajja rattiyā paccūsasamaye tathāgatassa parinibbānaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0601n:847_9: Ayañca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato ṭhito ovārento otarento vā na mayaṃ labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgataṃ dassanāyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:848_3: buddho kadāci karahaci uppajjantīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:848_6: Buddho nāma pana anekāsaṅkhyeyyavārena vā anekāsaṅkhyeyyadivasamāsasaṃvaccharaṃ vā anekāsaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ
anya-e0601n:848_7: vā dasapāramiyo ca pañcamahāpariccāge ca pūretvāva bhavituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0601n:848_9: Atha kho pana antamaso kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dasapāramiyo ca pañca mahāpariccāge ca pūretvāva buddho bhavituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0601n:848_11: buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjantīti ca vuttanti.
anya-e0601n:849_0: Evaṃ buddhassa atidullabhatarattā ca kadāci karahaci uppannattā caeva buddhobuddhoti kittayantassa mahapphalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:851_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassā”ti.
anya-e0601n:852_0: Tasmāti yasmā buddho buddhoti ghoso atidullabhataro,
anya-e0601n:852_3: Te hi hitāhitaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ vā visesena bhāveti pakāsetīti vibhāvā, paññā.
anya-e0601n:853_4: Te hi saparahitaṃ sādheti nibbattetīti sādhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:853_6: Tassa pana padassa namassantūti padena kattubhāvena sambandho.
anya-e0601n:853_21: Atha vā asati bhavati phalabhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0601n:853_27: Buddho hi sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttarahitasukhaṃ dhammadesanāya dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0601n:854_0: Suranaramahitanti devehi ca manussehi ca catupaccayādīhi pūjitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:854_4: Atha vā suranti īsanti devissariyaṃ pāpuṇanti virocanti cāti surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:854_5: Sundarā rā vācā etesanti vā surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:854_16: Tathāgatassa aṭṭhasu parisāsu kenaci kāraṇena bhayaṃ hadayacalanaṃ kampanaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0601n:855_4: Atha vā dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhīti dakkhiṇā,
anya-e0601n:855_9: Atha vā dakkhiṇāya hitaṃ anurūpaṃ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:855_15: anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhādīhi ca paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ uttamadānaṃ visesena arahati,
anya-e0601n:856_10: dhammadesanāya ca loke sabbasattānaṃ pītiṃ vaḍḍhetīti attho.
anya-e0601n:856_11: Sabbasattānañhi buddhadassane dhammasavane ca titto natthi,
anya-e0601n:856_13: Vuttañhetaṃ apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pakatiyāeva hi buddhadassane puṇṇacandasamuddarājadassane atitto lokoti.
anya-e0601n:856_14: Kathaṃ pana sabbasattānaṃ buddhadassane atitto hotī”ti.
anya-e0601n:856_15: Buddhassa pana bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇādīhi sīlādiasādhāraṇaguṇehi ca adhika sampanno hutvā sabbadevamanussehi ativirocamānattā.
anya-e0601n:859_0: Dasabalanti aññehi paccekabuddhāriyasāvakehi asādhāraṇena dasakāyabalena ca dasañāṇabalena sampannaṃ.
anya-e0601n:859_1: Tañhi kehici viruddhehi kāraṇehi balanti na kampentīti balanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:859_2: Atha vā balanti jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti balaṃ,
anya-e0601n:859_5: Balanti bhāraṃ vahituṃ sakkuṇantīti vā balaṃ,
anya-e0601n:859_10: Idha pana sāmaññavasena vuttopi visesaṭṭhāniyattā bhagavato dasakāyabalāni ca,
anya-e0601n:859_12: Tesaṃ pana sarū patthaṃ nayanasubhagakāyaṅgantyādi gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0601n:860_1: Natthi samo sadiso puggalo etassāti asamo, buddho.
anya-e0601n:860_4: Niccanti satataṃ samitaṃ sabbakālaṃ nirantaranti attho.
anya-e0601n:861_2: buddhobuddhotighoso buddho buddhoiti kittisaddo thutisaddo vā,
anya-e0601n:861_7: vibhāvī medhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ nānappakāraṃ lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ hitasukhaṃ patthayantā yācantā,

anya-e0601n:864_0: Puññenetena sohaṃ nipuṇamati sato samparāye ca titto,

anya-e0601n:872_0: Pāsaṃso pemavāco sujanaguṇavidū māmako so bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:873_1: Evaṃ buddho buddhoti ghosotyādigāthāya buddhavandane uyyojanaṃ katvā idāni sugatantyādīhi gāthāhi buddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:873_2: vanditvā paṇidhiṃ karonto āha puññenetena sohantyādi gāthādvayaṃ.
anya-e0601n:873_4: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ soahaṃ etena puññena samparāye nipuṇamati ca sato ca…pe…
anya-e0601n:873_8: Etena puññenāti iminā buddhavandanapuññakammena attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0601n:873_10: Puññanti ca idha pana buddhapaṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā adhippetā.
anya-e0601n:873_11: Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
anya-e0601n:873_13: paṭibāhitvā tannidānānaṃ yathādhippetasiddhivibandhakānaṃ rogādiantarāyānamappavattiṃsādheti cāti attho
anya-e0601n:873_18: So hi samparāyitabbā upagamitabbā ettha sattehīti ca,
anya-e0601n:873_19: kammakilesavasena sattehi samparāyitabbā pāpuṇitabbāti vā etthāti ca samparāyoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:873_21: Atha vā kammavasena abhimukho sampareti gacchati pavattatīti samparāyoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:873_23: Iti kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentītiādīsu viya hi curādi gaṇavasena parasaddaṃ gatiyamicchanti saddavidū.
anya-e0601n:874_1: Saṇhasukhumaṃ atthantaraṃ paṭivijjhanasamatthāya paññāya sampanno ca vā.
anya-e0601n:874_5: Nipuṇā saṇhā mati paññā yassa meti nipuṇamati.
anya-e0601n:874_17: yathāsāruppasanto so cāti tividhena santosena santuṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:875_0: Dakkhoti taṃ taṃ kicce cheko ca kusalo ca vā.
anya-e0601n:875_1: So hi kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho.
anya-e0601n:875_10: Atha vā arati akuṭilabhāvena pavattatīti uju, avaṅko.
anya-e0601n:875_17: Uju ajjavā diṭṭhi mati diṭṭhuju visesanaparanipātavasena.
anya-e0601n:875_20: Ujudiṭṭhi ca ujupaññā ca yassa meti diṭṭhujjupañño, puggalo.
anya-e0601n:875_21: Avikalavīriyoti anūnavīriyo ca paripuṇṇavīriyo cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:876_4: Saṃvibhāgīti saṃvibhajanasīlo ca saṃvibhajanasampanno ca vā,
anya-e0601n:876_19: Saṃvipubba bhajadhātu vibhāge ṇa. Jassa go.
anya-e0601n:876_23: Paresaṃ yācakānaṃ annādidānavatthuṃ niccaṃ pariccajanakārīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:877_3: Tikkhā paññā me assa atthīti tikkho.
anya-e0601n:877_6: Paññāya ca sabba kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhattā mūlakāraṇattā ca tikkhoti patthanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:879_0: Paññāya vimatiṃ hantvā, santiṃ pappoti paṇḍito”ti.
anya-e0601n:880_0: Sūroti catūsu parisāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu ca vīro ca.
anya-e0601n:880_5: Atha vā abhiruachambhianutrāsabhāvena sūrati gacchati pavattatīti sūro.
anya-e0601n:880_7: Sīho viya parisamajjhe sūravīrasampanno cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:880_8: Sāsani kehi pana saddhammavidūhi sūrasaddassa nibbacanaṃ na dassitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:880_9: Kevalaṃ pana sūroti visiṭṭhasūroti atthavivaraṇamattameva dassitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:880_15: ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme dhāretīti vā dhito, samādhi.
anya-e0601n:880_19: Dhito samādhi attaṃ cittaṃ assa meti dhitatto.
anya-e0601n:881_1: attano ca parassa ca atthaṃ paṭipannako cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:881_2: Attano ca parassa ca hitaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ carati paṭipajjatīti saparahitacaro.
anya-e0601n:881_6: Dīgho jīvo jīvitaṃ assa meti dīghajīvi.
anya-e0601n:881_24: Ṇakārānubandhe lope kate yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa ñakāraṃ katvā dhaññanti rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0601n:881_25: Atha vā dhanaṃ sirīpaññā puññalakkhaṇasampadaṃ assa me atthīti dhañño.
anya-e0601n:882_1: Ettha ca vaṇṇo duvidho hoti sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇavasena.
anya-e0601n:882_2: Tattha sarīra vaṇṇo nāma rūpakāyassa pāsādikarūpasampannatā.
anya-e0601n:882_3: Guṇa vaṇṇo nāma sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇena ca dhutaṅgādipaṭipadāguṇena ca sampannatā.
anya-e0601n:882_7: Vaṇṇeti attano dabbaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, guṇo.
anya-e0601n:882_13: Ettha ca duvidho hoti yaso parivārakittiyasavasena.
anya-e0601n:882_14: Tattha yajiyati pūjiyati etena parivārenāti yaso, parivāro.
anya-e0601n:882_16: Atha vā yāti gacchati pāpuṇāti sāmikassa parivāranti yaso, parivāro.
anya-e0601n:882_21: Atha vā yāti gacchati pāpuṇāti sabbattha byāpananti yaso,
anya-e0601n:882_24: Yaso ca yaso ca yaso ekasesanayena.
anya-e0601n:883_0: Atibalavadharoti atibalavantadhārako ca ativiya kāyabalañāṇabalavantaṃ dhāretīti atibalavadharo.
anya-e0601n:883_1: Ajātasatturājādayo viya pañcahatthi dasahatthibalassa dhāraṇasamattho ca,
anya-e0601n:883_2: sāriputtattherādayo viya ñāṇabalassa dhāraṇasamattho ca bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:883_9: Khantupetoti khantiyā upeto samupeto samannāgato ca.
anya-e0601n:883_12: Tassanti tāya upeto samupeto samannāgatoti khantupeto.
anya-e0601n:883_13: Khantivādatāpaso viya khantupeto ca bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:883_14: Khantiyā hi dukkarattā sabbakusala dhammānaṃ padhānattā seṭṭhatapattā ca khantupetoti patthanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:883_15: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā”ti ca.

anya-e0601n:886_11: ca vaṇṇo vaṇṇasampanno ca yasassī parivārasampanno ca atibalavadharo atibalavantadhārako ca kittimā kitti

anya-e0601n:888_1: Evaṃ puññenetenatyādigāthāya samparāye paṇidhiṃ katvā idāni diṭṭhadhamme patthanaṃ kattukāmo saddho dātaṅgupeto tyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:888_2: Tattha saddhoti kammādi saddahanalakkhaṇāya saddhāya sampanno ca.
anya-e0601n:888_16: Bhagavatā hi sā saddhā “saddhāhattho mahānāgo”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:888_18: “Saddhābījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhī”ti ca “saddhāya tarati ogha”nti ca “saddhā bandhati pātheyyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:889_0: “Yesaṃ atthi saddhā buddhe, dhamme ca saṅgharatane;
anya-e0601n:890_0: Te maṃ ativirocanti, āyunā yasasā siriyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:891_10: Tasmā saddho ca bhaveyyanti patthanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:892_0: Sā ca pana catubbidhā hoti āgamasaddhā,
anya-e0601n:892_4: Tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ abhinīhārato āgatattā āgamasaddhā nāma.
anya-e0601n:892_6: Buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena okappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma.
anya-e0601n:893_0: Dātaṅgupetoti dātassa aṅgāya kāraṇabhūtāya dhanasampattiyā upeto samupeto samannāgato ca.
anya-e0601n:893_3: saddhā cāti tīhi aṅgehi upeto samupeto samannāgato ca vā.
anya-e0601n:893_17: saddhā cāti tīhi aṅgehi sampajjāmīti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:893_18: Vuttañhi itivuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saddhā deyyadhammo paṭiggāhako cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samukhībhūtakāleyeva hi dānaṃ sambhavatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:894_4: katapuññe puggale sevati nissayatīti vā sirī,
anya-e0601n:895_1: Ettha ca diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo.
anya-e0601n:895_4: Diṭṭho passitabbo dhammo sabhāvo assāti diṭṭhadhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:895_13: Lajjīsaddena hi lakkhaṇāhāranayena ottappampi gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0601n:897_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbo, sohāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti.

anya-e0601n:899_0: “Upakāro ca yo mitto, sukhadukkhe ca yo sakhā;
anya-e0601n:900_0: Atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo ca mittānukampako;
anya-e0601n:901_0: Etepi mitte cattāro, iti viññāya paṇḍito; Sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0601n:904_4: Iti evarūpassa ca kalyāṇamittassa dullabhattā kalyāṇamittena sampajjāmīti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:905_1: Kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0601n:905_6: Kusalābhiratoti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ padavipariyāyena evaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0601n:905_9: niccaṃ kusalapuññassa karaṇe abhiratacittasampanno cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:906_6: Gahaṭṭhānaṃ niccasīlavasena pañcasīlaṃ sati ussāhasamatthe uposathaṅgavasena aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ dasaṅgasīlañca
anya-e0601n:906_7: akhaṇḍaṃ acchiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ katvā rakkhituṃ sāmaṇerasīlavasena dasasīlañca,
anya-e0601n:906_8: bhikkhusīlavasena catupārisuddhisīlañca rakkhituṃ samattho cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:906_9: Bhagavatā hi “sīlavipattihetu vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:906_10: “Sīlasampadāhetu vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:906_11: “Sīlasampanno mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
anya-e0601n:906_14: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti ca vuttattā ca.
anya-e0601n:906_18: “Sīla sampattiñhi nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:906_23: “Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyana”nti ca vuttattā pañcasīlādirakkhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:907_15: Yo pana paccaye bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhati,
anya-e0601n:907_16: appaṃ dente appataraṃ vā gaṇhati na vā gaṇhati.
anya-e0601n:907_19: Yo pana tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti,
anya-e0601n:907_21: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti,
anya-e0601n:907_23: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
anya-e0601n:907_25: Imehi appicchaguṇehi sampanno ca ahaṃ bhaveyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:909_0: Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
anya-e0601n:910_0: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naranti.
anya-e0601n:911_0: Vuttadesanaṃ manasikaritvā appakodhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.

anya-e0601n:912_8: Atieva uju hadayaṃ assa meti ativujuhadayo.
anya-e0601n:912_9: Gomuttavaṅko ca candalekhāvaṅko ca naṅgalakoṭi vaṅko cāti tīhi vaṅkehi vigato hutvā ativiya ujucittasamannāgato ca bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:912_10: Tattha ca yo pāpaṃ katvāva na karomīti bhāsati.
anya-e0601n:912_12: Yo pāpaṃ karontova bhāyāmahaṃ pāpassāti bhāsati.
anya-e0601n:912_13: So yebhuyyena kuṭilatāya candalekhā vaṅko nāma.

anya-e0601n:949_3: Ettha ca padhānanayo nidassana nayo ca labbhati.
anya-e0601n:949_5: Tassa pana padassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0601n:949_18: tena kavīhi bandhitvā thiyati thapiyatīti vā gāthā,
anya-e0601n:949_22: Tena anekagāthāya buddhaguṇasaraṇe kā kathāvāti sambhāveti.
anya-e0601n:949_24: So hi atthānatthaṃ budhati jānātītibudhoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:950_2: Caturāpāyamuttoti nirayatiracchānapetaasurakāyasaṅkhātehi catūhi apāyehi vimutto ca.
anya-e0601n:950_6: Atha vā tisso sampattiyo ayanti gacchanti pavattanti etenāti ayo, puññaṃ.
anya-e0601n:950_9: puññakārīhi ayitabbo pavattetabboti vā ayo, sukhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:950_13: Sādhakatthadvayassa cāti sādhako atthadvayassa cāti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:950_16: So pana sādhako tyādīsu padesu yutto.
anya-e0601n:950_18: So hi sādheti nipphādetīti sādhakoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:951_6: upaddavā nāma pana soḷasavidhā honti jātibhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:951_25: Nitatthena pana jalati hiṃsati satte etenāti jālo. Upaddavo.
anya-e0601n:951_29: Lābhī hitasukhassa cāti hitassa ca sukhassa ca lābhī ca.
anya-e0601n:951_36: Atha vā suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:952_1: Naradevānaṃ adhipo ca catudīpissaropi vā bhaveyyāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:952_2: Naradevānanti narā ca devā ca naradevā, tesaṃ.
anya-e0601n:952_5: So hi attādhīnaṃ pāti rakkhati dhammena vā adhiabhibhavitvā pāti rakkhatīti adhipoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:952_7: narānaṃ adhipo issaro manussarājā ca devānaṃ adhipo issaro devarājā ca bhaveyyāti attho.
anya-e0601n:952_8: Catudīpissaropi vāti ettha pisaddo sambhāvanatthe nipāto.
anya-e0601n:952_15: uttarakuru cāti catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issaro cakkavattirājāpi bhaveyyāti attho.
anya-e0601n:952_16: Tattha pubbavidehoti sineruno pure bhavaṃ pubbaṃ,
anya-e0601n:952_17: vedena paññāya īhanti vāyamanti etthāti vedeho,
anya-e0601n:952_20: Imaṃ dīpamupādāya sineruno pubbadisabhāgattā pubbo ca so videho cāti pubbavideho,
anya-e0601n:953_0: Aparagoyānoti sineruno apare pacchime bhavo aparo.
anya-e0601n:953_3: Sineruno pacchima disabhāgattā aparo ca so goyāno cāti aparagoyāno,
anya-e0601n:953_10: dippanti jotanti ettha saddhammāti vā dīpo.
anya-e0601n:953_12: Tassa pana dviāpoti padacchedaṃ katvā dvidhā āpo sandati etthāti dīpoti bahubbīhisamāsopi yujjati.
anya-e0601n:953_13: Jambuyā lakkhito paññāto vā dīpo jambudīpo,
anya-e0601n:953_16: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena kaṃ sukhaṃ urumahantaṃ etthāti kuru.
anya-e0601n:953_22: Sineruno uttaradisabhāgattā uttaro ca so kuru cāti uttarakuru.
anya-e0601n:954_0: Evaṃ lokiyahitaṃ dassetvā idāni lokuttarahitaṃ dassento āha antime dehe…pe…
anya-e0601n:954_1: subbatoti antime dehe subbato bhāvanāyānaṃ āruyha aññaṃ taṃ setachattakaṃ dhārento samaṃ essatīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:954_9: Atha vā dihati upacayati etena puññāpuññanti deho,
anya-e0601n:954_18: Atha vā tadārammaṇaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti bhāvanā,
anya-e0601n:954_21: Sā ca samathavipassanā bhāvanāvasena duvidhā hoti.
anya-e0601n:954_22: Tattha idha pana aññaṃ setachattakanti saddantarasanniṭṭhānena vipassanābhāvanā adhippetā.
anya-e0601n:954_27: bhāvanā ca sā yānañcāti vā bhāvanāyānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:955_2: Aniccādilakkhaṇena hi vinā maggaphalanibbānaṃ patto nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:955_5: Tañhi paṭhamamaggena ādiṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā catusaccadhammaṃ avabujjhatīti aññanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:955_16: Aññaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ setachattakaṃ dhārento hutvāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:955_18: Tañhi sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samati vūpasamati nirujjhati etthāti samanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:956_1: Tattha imasmiṃ attabhāvepi arogo ca dīghāyuko ca sabbalokehi pūjito ca bhāvanābhi ratimano ca janappiyo ca manāpo ca bhaveyyāti yojanā.
anya-e0601n:956_4: Attāti bhavati etena abhidhānaṃ buddhi cāti attabhāvo.
anya-e0601n:956_7: So hi natthi rogo assāti arogoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:956_9: So hi dīghā jīvi āyu assāti dīghajīvikoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:957_3: Bhāvanābhiratimanoti samathavipassanā saṅkhātāya bhāvanāya abhiramaṇacitto ca.
anya-e0601n:957_5: Manāpoti sabbasattānaṃ cittavaḍḍhanako ca bhaveyyāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:958_0: Evaṃ chabbīsatiyā vandanagāthāsu ekagāthāmattampi buddhaguṇānussaraṇe phalānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbagāthāyo
anya-e0601n:958_1: vacasā dhāretvā buddhavandane anekāni phalānisaṃsāni dassetuṃ kā kathākhiladhāraṇeti āha.
anya-e0601n:958_2: Tattha kā kathākhiladhāraṇeti kā kathā akhiladhāraṇeti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:958_3: Sabbabuddhavandanagāthāya vacasā dhāraṇe kiṃ vattabbā yevāti attho.
anya-e0601n:959_3: Khayaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti vā khilaṃ, appakaṃ.
anya-e0601n:959_8: akhilāya sabbāya gāthāya dhāraṇaṃ akhiladhāraṇaṃ, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0601n:959_9: Chabbīsatiyā buddhavandanagāthāsu ekaṃ gāthaṃ vacasā dhārayitvā buddhavandane yathāvuttaphalānisaṃsāni labbhanti,
anya-e0601n:959_10: pageva pana sabbabuddhavandanagāthāyo vacasā dhārayitvā dine dine buddhavandaneti atthoti.
anya-e0601n:959_11: Iminā pana gāthāpañcakena yathāvutta phalānisaṃsaṃ ñatvā saddahako sammādiṭṭhiko kulaputto sabbabuddhavandanagāthāyo
anya-e0601n:959_12: vacasā dhārayitvā rattindivaṃ pubbaṇhakāle ca sāyanhakāle ca rattiyā paṭhamayāme ca pacchimayāme ca satataṃ
anya-e0601n:959_13: samitaṃ nirantaraṃ buddhaṃ vandeyyāti uyyojanaṃ dassetīti.
anya-e0601n:961_0: Iti porāṇācariyehi vanditassa namakkārassa saddatthanayehi chandālaṅkāranayehi ca saṇhasukhumasududdasa
anya-e0601n:961_1: gambhīrassa buddhassa duppaṭividhaguṇaparidīpakassa sappurisānaṃ cittapasannajanakassa sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye
anya-e0601n:961_2: asaṃhira visāradañāṇacārinā sāsanasodhakena bhaddantareva tattheravarena racitā buddhaguṇappadīpikanāmikā vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0601n:963_1: lañchitanāmikena piṭakattayapāḷiṃ silārūḷhaṃ kārayitvā pañcama saṅgītikaraṇena timahādhammarājena ratanāpuñjanti
anya-e0601n:963_2: sammate rājadhānībhūte nānākulasaṃkiṇṇe puññadhaññavantānaṃ sādhūnañca sīlasamādhipaññavantānaṃ bhikkhūnañca
anya-e0601n:963_3: nivāsabhūte buddhadhammasaṅgharatanākare candimasūriyā viya buddhasāsanujjotane mantale nagare iti parikittite
anya-e0601n:963_4: mahārāme dese vasantena upāsaka guṇasampannena nāmikena upāsakena ca tassupaṭṭhākāya nāmikāya upāsikāya
anya-e0601n:963_5: ca samakusalacchandaṃ katvā nibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya kārite manorame suvaṇṇena limpitattā suvaṇṇavatī
anya-e0601n:963_6: nāmike dvibhummike mahiṭṭhakavihāre aṭṭhahi disāhi āgatānaṃ sutesanabhikkhūnaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ
anya-e0601n:963_7: dine dine satataṃ nirantaraṃ vācentena adhivasantena sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye asaṃhiravisāradañāṇacārinā
anya-e0601n:963_9: ca agga mahāpaṇḍitāti ca laddhalañchitena mūladvādasasāsana karamahāgaṇassa jeṭṭhamahānāyakabhūtena sāsanāpruñño
anya-e0601n:963_10: ācariyoti vissutena sāsanasodhaka mahānāyakattheravarena porāṇehi tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi
anya-e0601n:963_11: buddhaguṇappakāsakehi buddhaguṇapadehi thomitvā vanditassa atthabyañjanena chandālaṅkāranayena ca pathavīsandhārakassa
anya-e0601n:963_12: udakakkhandhassa viya gambhīrassa pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapitassa vatthussa viya atiduddasassa satadhā
anya-e0601n:963_13: bhinnassa vālassa aggakoṭiyā viya atisaṇha sukhumassa puthujjanañāṇena buddhassa duppaṭividhaguṇaparidīpakassa
anya-e0601n:963_14: namakkārassa līnatthappakāsanā buddhaguṇappadīpikanāmikā saṃvaṇṇanā tāsu tāsu aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu āgataṃ
anya-e0601n:963_15: saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ nissāya paññāpāṭavatthāya sāsanavuddhiyā ca katā.
anya-e0601n:969_0: Esā ca saṅkharontena, yaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
anya-e0601n:973_0: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva pajaṃ imaṃ;
anya-e0601n:974_0: Sabbe sattā sukhī hontu, jotentu jinasāsanaṃ.
